0.root_title:
Back in the decentralized social media Game!💪🏾⠀
It all started with Steemit a few ...
0.body:
... Years ago. For me, it was the entrance for the whole blockchain and cryptocurrency world. On Steemit, I was really active, but some changes in my life forced me to take a step back.⠀ ⠀ I followed Appics from the very beginning, and it was such a long road🏃🏾 , and this is not the end. I would say it’s just the beginning. At least I hope so 😅⠀ ⠀ It makes the communication for me a lot easier with this community compared with writing a whole blog post. No offense blog posts are great, and I try to write some in the near future.⠀ ⠀ Is this here the start of something great?🌙⠀ What do you think?⠀ ⠀ _______________________⠀ ⠀ Zurück im dezentralisierten Social Media Spiel!⠀ Alles begann mit Steemit vor paar Jahren. Für mich war es der Eingang für die Welt der Blockchain und Kryptowährungen. Auf Steemit war ich lange Zeit sehr aktiv, die Änderungen in meinem Leben zwangen mich dazu, ein wenig vom Gas zu gehen.⠀ ⠀ Appics verfolgte ich vom ersten Tag an, habe auch einige Beiträge dazu verfasst. Es war ein langer Weg bis hierhin und es ist noch lange nicht das Ende, sondern erst der Anfang. Zumindest hoffe ich das.⠀😅 ⠀ Diese Art der Kommunikation ist für mich leichter zu bewerkstelligen, als das Schreiben von Blog Beiträgen. Nichts gegen Blog Beiträge, ich finde sie nach wie vor super. Werde auch versuchen in naher Zukunft selbst wieder welche zu verfassen.⠀👨🏾‍💻 ⠀ Ist das hier der Beginn von etwas Großem?⠀🌟 Was glaubst du?

[![3c3af423c6403027d7db5ebfa85bd6fd](https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/appics-content/3c3af423c6403027d7db5ebfa85bd6fd-640)](https://appics.com/referenced.html?ref=steemit.com&type=image&id=54848&url=https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/appics-content/3c3af423c6403027d7db5ebfa85bd6fd-640&caption=Back%20in%20the%20decentralized%20social%20media%20Game!%F0%9F%92%AA%F0%9F%8F%BE%E2%A0%80%0AIt%20all%20started%20with%20Steemit%20a%20few%20Years%20ago.%20For%20me,%20it%20was%20the%20entrance%20for%20the%20whole%20blockchain%20and%20cryptocurrency%20world.%20On%20Steemit,%20I%20was%20really%20active,%20but%20some%20changes%20in%20my%20life%20forced%20me%20to%20take%20a%20step%20back.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AI%20followed%20Appics%20from%20the%20very%20beginning,%20and%20it%20was%20such%20a%20long%20road%F0%9F%8F%83%F0%9F%8F%BE%20,%20and%20this%20is%20not%20the%20end.%20I%20would%20say%20it%E2%80%99s%20just%20the%20beginning.%20At%20least%20I%20hope%20so%20%F0%9F%98%85%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AIt%20makes%20the%20communication%20for%20me%20a%20lot%20easier%20with%20this%20community%20compared%20with%20writing%20a%20whole%20blog%20post.%20No%20offense%20blog%20posts%20are%20great,%20and%20I%20try%20to%20write%20some%20in%20the%20near%20future.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AIs%20this%20here%20the%20start%20of%20something%20great?%F0%9F%8C%99%E2%A0%80%0AWhat%20do%20you%20think?%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0A_______________________%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AZur%C3%BCck%20im%20dezentralisierten%20Social%20Media%20Spiel!%E2%A0%80%0AAlles%20begann%20mit%20Steemit%20vor%20paar%20Jahren.%20F%C3%BCr%20mich%20war%20es%20der%20Eingang%20f%C3%BCr%20die%20Welt%20der%20Blockchain%20und%20Kryptow%C3%A4hrungen.%20Auf%20Steemit%20war%20ich%20lange%20Zeit%20sehr%20aktiv,%20die%20%C3%84nderungen%20in%20meinem%20Leben%20zwangen%20mich%20dazu,%20ein%20wenig%20vom%20Gas%20zu%20gehen.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AAppics%20verfolgte%20ich%20vom%20ersten%20Tag%20an,%20habe%20auch%20einige%20Beitr%C3%A4ge%20dazu%20verfasst.%20Es%20war%20ein%20langer%20Weg%20bis%20hierhin%20und%20es%20ist%20noch%20lange%20nicht%20das%20Ende,%20sondern%20erst%20der%20Anfang.%20Zumindest%20hoffe%20ich%20das.%E2%A0%80%F0%9F%98%85%0A%E2%A0%80%0ADiese%20Art%20der%20Kommunikation%20ist%20f%C3%BCr%20mich%20leichter%20zu%20bewerkstelligen,%20als%20das%20Schreiben%20von%20Blog%20Beitr%C3%A4gen.%20Nichts%20gegen%20Blog%20Beitr%C3%A4ge,%20ich%20finde%20sie%20nach%20wie%20vor%20super.%20Werde%20auch%20versuchen%20in%20naher%20%20Zukunft%20selbst%20wieder%20welche%20zu%20verfassen.%E2%A0%80%F0%9F%91%A8%F0%9F%8F%BE%E2%80%8D%F0%9F%92%BB%0A%E2%A0%80%0AIst%20das%20hier%20der%20Beginn%20von%20etwas%20Gro%C3%9Fem?%E2%A0%80%F0%9F%8C%9F%0AWas%20glaubst%20du?&category=crypto&hashtags=steemit+appics+socialmedia&author=modernpastor&profileImageUrl=https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/appics-content/profileImages/54-1572941065429-640&permlink=appics-v1-appics-im-54848)

[![Powered by APPICS - visit us at appics.com](https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/appics-staging/steemit_banner.gif)](https://appics.com/referenced.html?ref=steemit.com&type=image&id=54848&url=https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/appics-content/3c3af423c6403027d7db5ebfa85bd6fd-640&caption=Back%20in%20the%20decentralized%20social%20media%20Game!%F0%9F%92%AA%F0%9F%8F%BE%E2%A0%80%0AIt%20all%20started%20with%20Steemit%20a%20few%20Years%20ago.%20For%20me,%20it%20was%20the%20entrance%20for%20the%20whole%20blockchain%20and%20cryptocurrency%20world.%20On%20Steemit,%20I%20was%20really%20active,%20but%20some%20changes%20in%20my%20life%20forced%20me%20to%20take%20a%20step%20back.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AI%20followed%20Appics%20from%20the%20very%20beginning,%20and%20it%20was%20such%20a%20long%20road%F0%9F%8F%83%F0%9F%8F%BE%20,%20and%20this%20is%20not%20the%20end.%20I%20would%20say%20it%E2%80%99s%20just%20the%20beginning.%20At%20least%20I%20hope%20so%20%F0%9F%98%85%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AIt%20makes%20the%20communication%20for%20me%20a%20lot%20easier%20with%20this%20community%20compared%20with%20writing%20a%20whole%20blog%20post.%20No%20offense%20blog%20posts%20are%20great,%20and%20I%20try%20to%20write%20some%20in%20the%20near%20future.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AIs%20this%20here%20the%20start%20of%20something%20great?%F0%9F%8C%99%E2%A0%80%0AWhat%20do%20you%20think?%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0A_______________________%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AZur%C3%BCck%20im%20dezentralisierten%20Social%20Media%20Spiel!%E2%A0%80%0AAlles%20begann%20mit%20Steemit%20vor%20paar%20Jahren.%20F%C3%BCr%20mich%20war%20es%20der%20Eingang%20f%C3%BCr%20die%20Welt%20der%20Blockchain%20und%20Kryptow%C3%A4hrungen.%20Auf%20Steemit%20war%20ich%20lange%20Zeit%20sehr%20aktiv,%20die%20%C3%84nderungen%20in%20meinem%20Leben%20zwangen%20mich%20dazu,%20ein%20wenig%20vom%20Gas%20zu%20gehen.%E2%A0%80%0A%E2%A0%80%0AAppics%20verfolgte%20ich%20vom%20ersten%20Tag%20an,%20habe%20auch%20einige%20Beitr%C3%A4ge%20dazu%20verfasst.%20Es%20war%20ein%20langer%20Weg%20bis%20hierh 0.body:
... different things caught my attention. In my personal life and also in my professional life. Of my priority list, Steemit went all the way down👇🏾 because other things were much more important. I was still observing what is going on from a distance. Definitely, a lot of stuff happened also here. I saw just today that appics released a new version, which is fantastic. 👍🏾 Still waiting for my tokens,😁 I think I will tell you slowly what happened the last time. I hope you're all doing good? ⠀ ⠀ Es ist einiges an Zeit vergangen, seit ich das letzte Mal hier online war. So viele verschiedenen Dinge brauchten meine Aufmerksamkeit. In meinem persönlichen Leben, wie auch im Berufsleben. Auf meiner Prioritätenliste ist Steemit weit nach unten gerutscht, weil andere Dinge einfach wichtiger waren. Dennoch habe ich alles aus der Ferne beobachtet und auch hier ist einiges geschehen. Erst heute sah ich das appics eine neue Version rausgebracht hat, was ich toll finde. Warte immer noch auf meine tokens. Ich denke, ich werde demnächst Stück für Stück erzählen, was bei mir alles so geschehen ist. Ich hoffe euch geht es gut soweit?

0.root_title: The STEEM Story Was Already Written!
0.body:
![The story was already written.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmd59UPBHcn2zpW7kadjwXDHgwnwSFfQswzhyV1LXfZRbE)



The STEEM story was already written.

**What do I mean by that?**
The whole cryptomarket is a deep, deep cold winter or a dry desert.
![Depositphotos_96329070_xl-2015.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTwVHjgFdVwJ6QjgssUp93SxbbjLGdxxDr8SZobCccBkY)

Also here we just have a typical and normal life cycle. But the end of the ​story is already written we just don't know it yet.

![One of teh biggest mistakes.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmcn1zGe3q9amhXNbgXxg1hiy9q5GS31tsVuvJBNgrz7iS)


Its a fact that most of the time we only ​see, or focus on a ​specific part of a success story. Think about it for a moment. Think about a celebrity you like or an athlete. Maybe you have some examples near you, your wife, your friends or other acquaintances. 
_____
When we see successful people or a successful​ group of people, we find this fantastic, on the other hand, we often find quick reasons for their success. 

Meaning *if I would have been in that situation than I would have also been successful.*
People don't see what it has cost for some people to be where they are. Same goes for some companies. 
_______
People often **overlook** the challenges people faced, their *anxieties*, their *doubts*, the *pressure* of other people. But they decided to stick to something, not to give up, not to lose hope. This is something I see here. People are holding on to STEEM. 
____
When this ship sets sails, I am not saying that it will but I hope so. People will come back watching you and saying maybe something similar: *If I would have been here when the price was so low ma account would be more significant.*

What they don't see is that you never knew that this would indeed turn out well. You believed in it, and you also had maybe objective reasons to believe, but you never knew. **They don't see the uncertainty that came with it.**
_____
**But exactly these moments makes a great story.**
Remember again some people you find successful. Several people come directly into my mind when I think about success​. They also faced challenges they doubted. People told them to give up to look up for something different. 
____
*"Save yourself as long as it is possible!"*
This story already exists so often. It's not a new situation we see here.
What you are facing right now other people already experienced in their own context.
But let me tell you this: If you are able to hold on and the ships set sails STEEM will not only be a victory for you. It will be much more. **A part of yourself.**

This counts of course also for other areas of your life ;)

0.root_title: The Reasons Why I Wasn't Active Here!
0.body:
![What I was doing!.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmWQrBsjPTpguoi8GRh3jyEgSyBMsYxft1QmDaaYWtphGR)


Ok, guys let me tell you what I was doing the last months.
I will make it really short!

Besides being married being a father and professional football player, I am also among other things an Amazon FBA Merchant. 
_____
There were some difficulties I had to take care of and also preparing the second product I will launch in January 2019. I am not the best at multitasking believe me😁, so that's why I need to focus on one thing at a time.
**But that's not all.**
______
My wife is launching her beauty cream next year, and this process is really demanding. Researching for the right ingredients finding the proper cosmetics manufacture takes a lot of time. 
Then I got an injury again, but it's not so dangerous thank god. 💪🏾
______
Because of that, I​ didn't have the time for contributing on Steemit.
Now, most of everything I told you is already set and doesn't take so much attention. I will not say that I will definitely be active in the same way as before, but I will try my best. ✌🏽
_____
These are the reasons why I wasn't present here and not because I ditched Steemit no way ;)

I also have plans for this Blockchain here.

Let's keep steemin.

P.S I watch @neds Livestream on Youtube. Was lovely to see all Steemians in the comment section.

0.root_title: Football Can Be Soooo Brutal
0.body:
![Football Can be so brutal.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSSDtoEMBABaPGUxBNx8mVq917BDRdnPApfjMLqCenoDi)

Football can be so brutal. And I am not talking about physical brutality. I mean emotional brutality. In the eleventh run, we didn't make it into the Champions League. Yesterday we played as many of you already know 2:2 against Red Star Belgrade and with that outcome we are out.

![Not everyone .png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmU19jG4Hn47wHrCqhPvyzwsNB3yBs3n9wtypWgSFmzNA6)


This is the basic in competitive sport. That's why the athletes are training hard to bring themselves in better conditions as the component. Physically and mentally. There will always be someone who has to lose. But honestly, no one wants to be the loser. And for me, there is a difference if you lose one game in the regular league or when you lose a game like yesterday. Added to that the fact is that we played much much better, where in front with two goals and lost everything in just 2 minutes. Don't ask me how this happened I don't know.

When you try it eleven times, and you never make it happen it truly hurts.

Why, why, why is firing in our heads looking for answers. It feels like someone is hammering on your soul. 
And precisely that is also a part of the competitive sport a brutal reality which has the power to break someone to take his joy from this sport. I saw this already a lot of times and it happened already with me too. But when we think rationally its just a game. But for athletes it isn't. It's more than that. Especially when you do it already for a long time. The athlete within you became a part of your identity which can be good but also bad. More about that in a different story.

![What Is The Left at the end.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmcCmsCTBTcTEnabkXN9823ZdMhcZN5Jj9i46aUYDyAD3E)


For me, it's not the first time, and I will play my part to be a blessing for my teammates. Encouraging them to look forward, the past is set in stone there is nothing to change anymore. It is also a fact that the next game is already waiting on Sunday. Not much time to be sad. A helpful thing in my opinion. The circumstances force you to leave the cave of self-pity. But a win on Sunday can change the direction immediately. 

![IMG_3519.JPG](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmY6Q3He3DQrxBChjirbHMUu2gWpN5GrcmDmkAGqs6dHM9)
0.title: Football Can Be Soooo Brutal
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: A Way of Finding Good Content!
0.body:
![Finding Good Content.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTKc5bA8SJQifLshugUzfGdb4ah4qck8RdEwFGdK8ZynB)


I came across a useful method which is probably helpful for many of us here. Maybe you already read the post like that and you're already aware of how you can discover new exciting content. For those who didn't take notice so far, this will be helpful.

Especially when people are complaining not to find good content here. This may help. 😉

![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

With a simple method, you can see the feed of other people here. Means you can see what content appears in the feed of someone else.

Instead of fighting through the jungle using the search function or the comment section where sometimes people drop a link you can just see what one of your favorite Steemian consumes.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

And that is an important aspect!
When you have some favorite authors here and you are following them implies in most cases that they are delivering something​ on a regular basis. If this is the case, the probability is high that they not only **produce** but also **consume** on this platform. I don't think that someone is only publishing and never reading someone else stuff. 

This leads to the point that this method makes in my eyes only sense when you use it by active users on the platform here. I tried it already and started stalking what other people are consuming here. Let me show you how simple that is. And it is really simple.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Just put the username of the person you want to see the feed and ad **/feed** at​ the end of the URL
If you would like to see my feed it would be https://steemit.com/@modernpastor/feed that's it!
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Just change my username with the author of your choice and see what he//she is getting and possibly consuming. Definitely, a way to find new content if that is a concern of you.

Thanks to @meno who reblogged the post of @tcpolymath where I found out about this.
0.title: A Way of Finding Good Content!

0.body:
![When The Majority.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXRpiaHDd4NKBcMeWH6v9SKNSrAQ2sNdB61DcgnyNwjq5)

What's up Steemians. I hope you are doing all well? 😁
One week past since my last contribution but I think most of you probably figured out why.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I was preparing myself for the Champions League Playoffs against Red Star Belgrade. On Tuesday we played there in an empty stadium without any fans. Weired conditions.

Some of you know that the game ended *"only"* in a standoff.
When I say only, I mean that some people would interpret it like that. 
The expectations reinforced because of our good start in the season let people believe we should crush every opponent. And when this doesn't happen everything is terrible and every good thing in the recent past is also forgotten. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Every time I have to laugh when I see a report of the media how they are analyzing the whole situation. Something we as athletes had to deal from the very beginning. Often, and I mean often the majority of people sees things differently. Which is not a bad thing in general. The questions are how accurate it is.

**Let me give you another example:**

Steem! When you try to explain Steem to another crypto fanboy in most cases he is already prejudiced and can't take the good advantages and or reasonable arguments for the Steem ecosystem. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Someone who is more in detailed involved is able to draw you a more profound picture. It doesn't mean that he or she is definitely right about what he is saying, but you can be sure that this information is accurate. This person knows what he/she is talking about knows the quirks and flaws. 

**So here is what I think:**

Of course, we had the goal to score at least one goal there. Yes, I think it was maybe not the best game of us, and yes, we also had a bit of luck that we didn't get one. 

But reviewing the whole game let me confidently say that we are the better team. And now next Wednesday we have a final in our stadium. Either or! Nothing in between. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I see it precisely that way, and I am excited about it to have this challenge. Even if the majority of people sees something different, it doesn't mean they are right.

I hope your last week went well for you? :)
Today is my free day, and now I will browse a bit through the Steemit Ocean
0.title: When The Majority Sees It Differently!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Adjusting My Voting List? Desire To Support Awesome Content Creators!
0.body:
![Adjusting my voting list.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPK7naYTzSM8av8NurMu3hqqKxWXLuqLQidc2fUxMEskh)

Sadly I see that people I put on my voting list are no more really active. I observed it now for two weeks. Of course,​ this counts not for all on my list, but most of my voting power stays nearly the same which is not the purpose.
_________
I think I have to make some adjustments. 
The goal is, of course, supporting active people here otherwise the power would be in vain when it doesn't come to action. I don't want to force someone. 
_________
Maybe when I see it from a different perspective, there is place for more people to join the list? 

I will have again a closer look starting with my eager commenters. 

As I said in a previous post, now is an excellent time to accumulate more STEEM. And we don't need to think in large quantities. One STEEM more today can make a significant difference in the future.

0.root_title: Time To Get Serious! SMT Release Date.
0.body:
![Time to get ser.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPyjpf3LAkfquXAhRRxQ1FAakng1nRNHGUZBvgZvF3k9S)


The first time I heard about SMT'S I didn't realize which great thing it actually is. Giving ordinary people like you and me or a group of people the possibility to create their own token.
_________
As I heard about Appics the first time, it was the trigger that led me to dive deeper into SMT's and what they actually are. And no, I never see myself as an expert. I am still a learner. 
_______
Back then I could better understand the hype about SMT's and I got excited about it. But it was still just an announcement of an idea. An explanation of what can be realized with that but nothing more. Nothing concrete. The last months, I doubted if the Smart Media Token protocol will ever be released. 

Now, we have an official date! And that is great. And all of us should be excited in my opinion. 
According to Steemblog the date is set for the TestNet is planned for January 2019 and the launch for the MainNet is planned for March 2019. I
______________
A great message in the current bloodbath.
@exyle mentioned in his [vlog](https://dlive.io/video/exyle/93c4c5fb-a059-11e8-abf5-0242ac110003) this morning that he asked the founder of Dlive if the current market situation affects the development of Dlive in a negative​ way. It doesn't! They are working despite the current market situation. Which means that there is faith reaching beyond the status quo. And the latest announcement is in my opinion proof of that which spread hope that the STEEM Blockchain is on the right way. 
___________
We have now an actual date; we can set it into our calendar and wait until then. I think that successful SMT's will bring sustainability to the STEEM blockchain. And then things will get really serious. This blockchain is evolving to its next level. There is a light shining in dark times.
0.title: Time To Get Serious! SMT Release Date.

0.root_title: Ohhhh, STEEM!
0.body:
![Oh STEEM.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRwZxontVxrXXepfr373t31qVUnDLj6umHEz3PkNSebFH)

This morning when I looked at the cryptomarket, I was stunned. 
Seeing Steem so down, speaking of 0.80$ is something which I thought was nearly impossible. But it happens, and when it happens till then, it could also go lower.
_______________
Haha...life is showing us again a lesson: **No one knows where this journey is going**. Things happen unexpectedly, and it's our responsibility to handle it the right way for our own good. And how we treat this could look different for you and me. 
___________
I was sure that I would find some posts about the current market situation here on Steemit. Yes, we are talking about the whole cryptocurrency market, but we all know that seeing our beloved STEEM so down hurts much more as Bitcoin for example. At least for some or the most of us.
_______
Defeats always mean new opportunities. I don't want to go much into detail I think you are well aware of what I am talking about. Believers need to make their moves now. Now is the period of accumulating more through your activities here on STEEM. Now is the time, when others are fearful or hiding or have something better to do you use your the chance which is given to you now.

0.root_title: Big Step Towards Europe!
0.body:
![BIg step steemit.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUJSFPjy35BiHxQ9pGEz1i4aet3jjXy2XDsYcmX4N92kU)
______
*For the sake of transparency: This post appeared​ first on [Scorum](https://scorum.com/en-us/football/@rayyabo/big-step-towards-europe)*
______
On Wednesday​ we made a significant step towards the Champions League which is our primary goal for this season. At home, we defeated Shkëndija with 3:0. We brought ourselves in a good position for the second leg next Tuesday.

Yes, I have to step back. Even when we win the next game, there is still one more round to conquer, and that's where the nightmare happens. You have to know that in the previous history the club never qualified for the champions league. We often failed in the playoffs, and that's why in the whole city this nightmare is indeed present. The horror of playing good but failing to reach the Champions League. Not an easy task to free ourselves mentally from the past.
![IMG_3380.JPG](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmb1ZaaBbvE1UGh74W8iLtAjbT3dCMvnbhTjV8vBH3VeeT)

We started very good in this season in all three competitions; The standard Austrian league our daily bread, the cup competition and now the international qualification. And I have a good feeling that this year we will make it. We are working for that and everyone is giving his best.

Many games are waiting for us now and being in three different competition is exhausting. But it is also great not to wait too long for the next match. There is always some good and bad components.

![IMG_3383.JPG](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVoqxgUhy1qPyzngo6HLZot7RiNJyVfjxZ4mCcacAJt5m)
0.title: Big Step Towards Europe!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Work While Others Are Sleeping! Accumulate STEEM Now!
0.body:
![Work while others are sleeping.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUeZHrKUWjHfJphYCyzm4g33Sdip46qWPSD7KLBeUJT6C)

How we see at things determines the effect something has. In most cases, it's always a matter of perspective. I know people who proved that a lot of times and I asked myself how this is even possible. 

In tough conditions​ and circumstances​ to stay full of hope, joy and zeal​. Some experiences why I love to talk much about motivational stuff or things which can have an immediate an impact on your life. Looking  to connect those messages with something palpable.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Currently, the overall crypto market doesn't look bright. And STEEM is no exception. Led by this fact people are powering down, the activity is going down, and one Steemian called the current situation a *Mass exodus*. 
Fact is that the crypto market doesn't look bright right now, but its the whole market in general. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

If we change the perspective regarding STEEM this current status quo could be a big chance. I don't know if you are aware of that but if fewer people are active on this blockchain that means that there is more in the reward pool to be distributed to fewer people. When we change the perspective in one direction then is now the time to dive deeper into the Steemit Ocean. To take this opportunity to gather more STEEMPOWER which can make one day a big difference.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

When the success story comes, people will maybe say: **If I would have been in that time then...**
I can imagine that some people who could say this one day are already among us.

**Use your chance while others are hiding the dessert.** 
*It's too hot; it's not worth it right now.*

People who change their perspective now or in similar times will hopefully see one day that it was worth it.


![Keep in Mind.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQ38NZpya4egjmGHmU7JCXi8iVrHbu5qpwAyRkNtEtjAv)


Keep in mind that we are not paid in USD or another fiat currency. It happens fast, and I made this mistake in the beginning too. Looking at the USD value will lead us to the wrong thinking. The USD payout might be less, but STEEM will stay the same. And when there are less active users, there are more STEEM units to share among them. The low price should motivate you to hit the accelerator.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

For a more technical explanation of that, I recommend reading that post [here.](https://busy.org/@therealwolf/the-power-of-positivity---thinking-long-term)

![Investing.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUByLtzbgZfWNVG4VCiCHy77NbEjVzfuwxuvBCv8PxybC)


I mean everyone who is buying STEEM. And the amount doesn't matter. Don't think that only people which a bunch of money are investors in STEEM.

When you plan to buy STEEM do it in times, we have now. I don't have to explain what the benefits are when the price will increase again. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

After the all-time high, some people or the most hoped that STEEM would stay forever at that mark or go even further( Hopefully,​ it will one day). But because the crypto market is highly volatile, we have to count with some of those more significant pullbacks. **And that is the time to buy.**

Ok, maybe you don't have money laying round to invest immediately. Let me tell you this: **the next time prepare already dough for precisely that kind of scenario**. This is exactly what I did. At the beginning of the year, I made the plan when this scenario might happen I have already something prepared for it. Now I can make a calm decision and for the case,​ I invest,​ I will surely not cry or regret because​ it is meant for that purpose​. But if I don't becasue I decided for something different it also alright.

![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Six months ago I wrote about this effect in that post: [How To Turn A Loss Into A Win.](https://steemit.com/life/@modernpastor/living-a-good-life-1-how-to-turn-a-loss-into-a-win)

The scenario is different, but the core message is the same. People treat money differently depending on where it comes from. And now I add: **For what they prepare it for**. That is called **Mental Accounting.**
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

**Why am I saying that?** Because investing will always be a risk. Buying at this price will minimize the risk but never take it completely. When you already prepared​ money for the purpose of investing it will be a help for the case it will be lost. I don't think that it will be with STEEM, but no one knows.  ;)

And again it doesn't​ matter if we speak about 10$, 100$, 1000$, 10000$ or more.

Now is a good time to invest, and primarily I mean your​ activity here.​
Differences happen in times like that.
0.title: Work While Others Are Sleeping! Accumulate STEEM Now!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: The Rise Of The STEEMPRENEURS!
0.body:
![The Rise of Steempreneurs.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmS2T3rwDkPvL2K3pD5zoYEXBw8NZAeU8N7ER36fQqSNER)


A few​ days ago I asked you what you would do if you would have 50.000 Dollars to invest. First of all that so many people shared their view if they would have that significant amount of money was amazing. I think one my post with the most comments so far.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I thought that most of the people would give an answer concerning STEEM. But I was wrong.

Many People would try to start their local business without any connection to the world wide web. Especially from my African brothers and sisters, I got to know that real estate in these countries seems to be a profitable business. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I interpret it that way: **People see Steemit as a source of acquiring more money to use it for their own business ideas.** As in many cases raising the required capital is often the biggest hurdle someone needs to conquer.

![Steempreneurs.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVMPj6F4oiRiZsh42bRZyQLZCGJcBVo5L26RAbzJzXMUF)

On the other hand, there are people focused on STEEM and the blockchain realm. Of course, STEEMPOWER was mentioned a lot which could be in the future a  much more valuable asset. But not only that; finding developers to realize something and people who know how to code are already in the middle of their own application. @flauwy for example with his 1UP project.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

STEEMonsters and STEEMpress have for me ushered the era of STEEMpreneurs 

Also, @exyle mentioned in one of his vlogs in the last days that he believes that projects on the STEEM blockchain will outgrow the individual blogger. Time will tell if it will be like that. But according to the signs we see right now, this could really happen. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Maybe there has to be a switch in the minds of content creators?
 **What do you think?** 

For me,​ there will always be a place for content creators. Daily, exciting, helpful content is the force which will make people come over and over again back to the platform to inform themselves about different topics. Talking from the social network​ perspective​. But because everything is still new and early I think it couldn't be wrong to swim with the stream and to adapt to a new rhythm when the rhythm change. 

 Changes always bring new opportunities.

0.root_title: Why You Should Put STEEM On The Bench!
0.body:
![Put Steem on the bench.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSJ4EkkvU285jx4FuvMuHLKp43y4AusgEf8n7sHwcCeZv)


Believe me when I tell you that you should put STEEM on the bench. It would be beneficial for you now and in the future. When I am Saying on the bench, I mean exactly the team sportive meaning. But which player in a team sport likes to sit on the bench watching their competitors playing all the time?
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

No one, and when you say yes, there is something wrong. But I tell you that you should put STEEM and maybe yourself on the bench. And I tell you it will be beneficial for you. I will explain you why.

![Longterm game.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYn5z7BooVE7LAY35f8x5mgEcywpiaW9NHyEX9Lk1k3ut)


You probably read a lot that STEEM is a longterm game. When I am talking about STEEM I mean the Blockchain and also applications accessing this Blockchain like Steemit, Dtube, and Dlive for example. 

So maybe you agree that STEEM is a longterm game, but that doesn't mean because you affirm that with your head but it's a different thing to act like that. Saying, believing STEEM is a longterm game and living like that are two different pairs of shoes.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

You have to shift your mind into this alignment. And as often things are easier said than done. Here comes in why I said you should put STEEM and yourself on the bench. No better to say you have to put yourself on the Bench and STEEM is acting on the field.

![Advanatge of sitting on the bench.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmb4HDaT1dEskyoongL6dGrpFiu9j5JY6nDZLMhnAXiQB1)


Athletes who are sitting on the bench are forced to play the longterm game. Attention! **That doesn't mean that they are passive.** The opposite is the case. Those players have to work more than the players on the field. They want to increase the probability to get in and show what they can. They are waiting that the coach says: **It's your turn**. And when this moment happens, they need to be **ready**. 

But till that moment a long time can be in between. The athlete never knows when the moment will be, but he believes that the moment will come one day and he works for that. When the chance comes, and he takes it can lift him into new dimensions.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Those athletes know exactly what it means to play the longterm game. Not necessarily because​ they want, more because​e they have to learn it to make the best of it for their own sake.

What I want to say is that every one of us should learn and evolve this mindset. That counts also for other areas of our lives. STEEM is still young still in beta, and it's doing well, but not there where we all want to see it regarding functionality and price. But playing short-sighted will not bring you far.

Imagine an athlete would say to himself: **I work now for one month. I give the coach one month to put me in. In that time I will put everything I have into the training showing that I deserve a chance. When he doesn't give me that chance than I don't care anymore.**
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Imagine this athlete stops after one month. The following month he is coming late to the sessions he is showing that he's pissed, in the sessions, he is just giving 30 percent a real I don't care attitude. 

At the end of this month the coach brings him in, and he failed like someone who has no talent. Someone who can't make a simple pass. He was so strong with his mouth. Now the coach takes someone else, someone who had the longterm view and he is succeeding. **Who is the poor one now?**

Being short-sighted​ will not bring you far on this blockchain and in other areas of your life.

![Being Short sighted.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmV6TbSQbU9Gv19ac6ADNUSXRUCwZqUpduk8NbWuhSB2a6)


**Are you just focused on the rewards?**
**Do you want to maximize everything in the shortest amount of time?**
**Are you always complaining about that and this?**

If you answer these questions with yes, I would say you are short-sighted.

Playing longterm means that you will probably walk through the desert.
It's dry you don't have much to drink the sun is burning you, the whole journey hurts. But in your heart, a vision is beating, and you are working towards that vision.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Yes, you don't have everything in your hand, but for the case, that STEEM is performing on a level which is not compared to now, you are ready to go on the field and shine. All you worked for is showing right now.

![How could that look?.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmcRATgZg5y1zd9WLh49MjMjMqNdEy1ffEJ57eQ4tmSFpU)


**You've accumulated as much as SP during that time?**
**You build your name in the Steemit Ocean. People know you for a specific topic.**
**You've built essential relationships over time with different people.**
**Maybe you started yourself a project built on STEEM?**

Just a few examples.

Playing the longterm game can hurt my friend.
Going towards an uncertain future can be hurtful.
In the end, you could be empty-handed. But on the other site, you could shine like a star.

Seeing yourself on the bench could help you to implement the longterm mindest.
0.title: Why You Should Put STEEM On The Bench!

0.root_title: Investing In People!
0.body:
![investing in people.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZjX8zL8WJAZ4bQiyorYvGaCprb7cQkQcC9WPMFArgiut)


Let me tell you how I plan to use my Steempower in a new way. You can believe me for me it is a new way for other it may be usual. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Since the beginning, I was using my Steempower always to upvote manually. There was a time where I tried an automation tool for the sake of learning how it works. But I didn't feel comfortable with it. Also, I read a lot of posts preaching that we should upvote manually because only in that way it would be ethically right. I don't want to debate this question right now, but I also believed that its "good" to upvote manually and not with an automated tool.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

With that method its almost impossible to upvote every post you want and it would take a lot of time to go through your feed(depending on how much you folllow) to see the new content, read it and upvote it. Manually upvoting is in my opinion better when you are online, you see and read an interesting post and you give it an upvote. But you missed contributions which came earlier or will appear later.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I was convinced that manually upvoting is the best way to go because I was only **content focused**. Yes, I believed that only the content counts. Let me say it directly: **I don't think that anymore!**
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Let me clarify what I exactly mean; Content is one of the most significant forces that drives that community and act as a magnet for other people. When a blogging platform don't have worthy content to consume why spending time on it? We need good content, and that should be rewarded. Content is one way we get in touch with new people here. The material on Steemit, Dtube, and Dlive matters a lot and should never be neglected when it comes to your decision what you want to upvote. Great content creators deserve to be rewarded.

![buuuut.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXPyVhF66cXYjuWqnE4wzboQsKnMptVG4aWzp9YUyL3wc)


During the time spent here, I got a new perspective regarding automatically upvoting people. Let me better say: People you already got to know, you already build some kind of connection.

![Investing in people 2.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUfukfrVoBCNBTy6MTiu4m3ojQL2pKAnL5fVTqNtapmzF)


I plan to put more people on my upvoting list. The reason behind it is that I believe with that move I **invest in people, ​not in the content.**
Don't get me wrong, of course, the content is relevant but more important is the person behind that content. And this person should be empowered regardless if I like their content every time​. I see it that way. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

Empowering people I build already a connection to or better to say they with me by constantly​ engaging with me through comments. I already started with a few people, and I think its the right way, investing into the person which is well chosen. Many great content creators are trying to get noticed by meaningful comments. It doesn't mean that I agree with everything they write, but that should not be the primary decision criterion. 

I don't want to make it too long. The quintessence is; I will put more people on my automated list because I believe they deserve it. 

![Attention.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmW5R2MoCzVTrJZGN6USCTzmEBtvXuD7LSfa3mRsJvBguV)


Read this carefully when you notice that you are one of them.
**Don't think this will be forever! Don't take all upvotes for granted. Don't sit back and relax from now on. I don't commit myself to that. It can be that I change people based on my judgment. Keep that in mind, please. It's important!** I hope with that to give my part to the community and helping other people here.

**What do you say about automated upvoting tools?**
0.title: Investing In People!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Finally I Can Test it! The First SMT!
0.body:
![Finally I can test it.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbtY8kJy27eBBWK2s3yeoChduQRr3Yz6Gb4Ae6BesnUih)


A different post was planned as I wrote in my previous post but I have to prefer this short one here.

Today I was invited to the Appics Testnet. Finally, I am also able to test the first SMT application. A lot of time has passed since the ICO.  From what I can say right now is that it looks promising. The design is noble even without the latest design update. Of course, it is not a finished product right now, but that is not the purpose of a testnet. The next time I will post a picture will be via Appics.
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

From the very beginning, I was convinced that this application could be a huge benefit for the STEEM blockchain. I wrote several times about Appics. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

For those who don't know what Appics is: **It's the first SMT(Smart Media Token) based application.**Simply explained; Its a decentralized version of Instagram having their own token called XAP. Do you know **Steepshot?** It's already​ running and basically the same. The difference between Appics and Steepshot is that Appics is an SMT and with that operating as an independent application but still on the same Blockchain. 
![Gold trenner.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTYi2SqNewT5mznq5DSw4saxreThhmoUmUuo5aqDK5bnh)

I hope that the SMT protocol will be finished developed soon. SMTs could be a real gamechanger. They could open new possibilities for the STEEM Blockchain. But like everything, all applications have to prove themselves first. 

**Did you hear​ already about Appics? What do you think about that?**
0.title: Finally I Can Test it! The First SMT!

0.root_title: Almost 1 Year On STEEM! Way To Orca!
0.body:
![Way To Orca.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZA9zoh7TA5D7rxq2dDvw1GaAUdZhoLJa9Ct4EjnmdoYm)

In a few days, I am one year here on Steemit. 
If someone had told me that I would be still around in the way I am, I would have doubted it.
_______
In the beginning, I was curious​ about the promise of a social network that pays you. It was tempting because I have a blogger past and that combined with cryptocurrency was something I had to try.
______
Soon I realized that there is a lot to learn about this platform. Later I understood that it is more learning about the STEEM Blockchain itself.

I wasn't sure that's why it took a bit before I invested a small amount of money. I started blogging and met new and exciting people. During that time I learned more and more about the STEEM Blockchain.
![more serious.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZKuGD5FKvGhpjmCnkQkJSNnuz2ijYk1vAAu4XeytFLmh)

Then a time came where I wanted to be a bit more serious. With that I mean I wanted to be at least a dolphin. I collected enough trust to make this move and when it wouldn't work; it would be not a problem at all. Because I could afford it to lose.
________
Most of the time here on Steemit and later Dtube and recently Dlive I swam as a dolphin. In the beginning, there was no significant change in my eyes. It took some time as I noticed that my curation rewards increased 😁
________
I learned more and made deeper and new connection with people. 
There were also times where I was utterly inactive because of my profession. Coming back after a particular time was always exciting.

![Status Quo.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPA86emVrzTPby1rYgn5vXBQT28DK93Szwz8MpqPzUvuf)


No one knows where this ship will go. The wrong promises of; **Get Rich Quick via Steemit** are definitely false and draw a wrong picture. Even now everything is in beta, but we already saw some innovative movements which could give a taste of what this blockchain with the right people is capable of. But no one knows precisely where we all will be in few months or a year. But I am glad to be a part of it and to experience the journey of the whole.
__________
During the year I gained more and more trust and invested more and more into Steempower. For me, this could be one of the most valuable assets in the future. 

What I like compared to other assets is that STEEMPOWER can work for you even when you are not active. There are several ways, and yes, I know that not everyone is happy with that. And I respect that. On the other hand, I respect those who use that kind of possibilities including myself.

For example,​ during my preseason it was good to know that my Steempower is working for me.
![Way To Orca 1.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZsGYvmaoGWaUJ3i481ZWyE6sYbB9YTQXTQnVoeCcSA9s)

And now I am standing close to become an Orca. Yes, most of it is invested not earned. And this step for me is much more severe. As I said above, I believe if the STEEM blockchain succeeds steempower will be a valuable asset. 
__________
Here I want to mention one Steemian all of you probably know.
@exyle is someone who teaches people about the blockchain, and he shares his vision he has for this blockchain, not in a fake promising way. No, what he says everyone has to filter and decide for himself if these pieces of information are trustworthy. But for me, they make sense. 
________
In my cryptocurrency portfolio, STEEM is the only one I use regularly. It has a use case within the community. I am dealing with it on a daily basis. But nevertheless its a risk and an act of faith. We are playing on the uncertain ground. Time will tell if this is indeed a lifetime opportunity which comes maybe only once in life.
________
My goal is to accumulate as much SP as I can and to use it not just for me. And honestly, it should also be your goal when you have faith. For that I am more active again I use my power differently, and what I exactly mean by that I will show you in my next post.
0.title: Almost 1 Year On STEEM! Way To Orca!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: What I Would Like To See Built On STEEM
0.body:
![What I would like to see.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmfSGxPCHbdqfAP4ooKDDWdYQ59nPJf1PRU9RFZSzTUgeP)

What I would like to see on this Blockchain of opportunity.

Maybe or for sure you already heard now quite a lot of times that our beloved STEEM Blockchain is also called the Blockchain of opportunities. Well let me say that it has the potential to be it or to become it but at this moment it isn't from a rational perspective. From an imagination perspective, it is. To be the Blockchain of opportunities the STEEM blockchain needs to be stable for a more extended period. It requires to establish itself in the Blockchain world. But we all believe that this will happen.
__________
That is not the point I am after. I'm sorry I digress.
I enjoy seeing what we already have on this fantastic blockchain all these Dapps which could evolve into major players. The realm of social media one of the biggest markets is already staked with Steemit itself, Dlive, Dtube, Steepshot and more to come in the future for example Appics.
___________
From that point of view, it would be in my opinion essential to cover all applications we already have in a centralized version. What do you think?
______
I think for example of a decentralized version of Whatsapp or let me better say Facebook Messenger. I personally would like to see such an application, mobile-oriented and built on STEEM. 
_________
I know we have our beloved discord which is a great app to communicate. Nothing against that I like it and I use it myself, and it has a substantial reason to exist. But when we already have a decentralized version of some important applications why not make the glass full?
_______
A mobile first oriented Messenger is one of those I would like to see in the future. Maybe even as SMT. And I think that probably more people had this idea and maybe people are already working on something like that. Honestly, I would do it myself, but in my current situation, I don't have the mental capacities to start a project like that. 
_________
Imagine a mobile STEEM Messenger where you could reward every single message you send to someone else. Theoretically spoken not only that when I think about the Facebook Messenger, but this mobile platform could also evolve to a mobile ecosystem, creating customized games for example or other mobile-oriented​​ dapps for that.

Just some thoughts I have.
**What would do you like to see on this Blockchain?**

0.root_title: Did You Hear From That? A Sports Platform In Steemit Manner.
0.body:
![Scorum did your hear.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVJ4f8GsziWxXSJM6FTGTFdUzhNujh8Pt7VZ1FR83cSgb)
 

I kind Steemian told me about this project which is a similar build to​ our beloved Steemit. Basically, it's the same regarding functionality and how the system works with one difference. **Scorum targets only People who feel a connection to sport.** Its a niche but a really huge niche!
<center>![kk-3-430x240.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYF8T7qCd3aMQ7DMeCWyKyFtdkbmazkVWtrvugxFi33xA)</center>

As I said before for Steemians the system is familiar. You can blog, and you can get rewarded via upvotes. The same mechanism we have here on Steemit are integrated there. Means also that someone with more Scorum Power(Steempower) will have a ​more significant influence. Not only that they plan to implement some interesting​ features as well. For example analytic tools for authors, an own picture database for use and more. Tools a sports​ journalist need.
___________

What I like is that you give power or the possibility to ordinary people. 
There are a lot of people who have vast knowledge about a specific sport but never get heard. **How is the question?** In the sport industry, big media companies are dominating and establishing certain opinions. And believe from experience in most cases they are wrong. Scorum could be a place where sports journalism can get a new face by empowering people to share their opinion and building a community. Honestly, I had already an Idea like that in mind, and I am glad that someone is doing it. Because​ its necessary​.
_________
I know what you probably want to know. No, Scorum is not built on the STEEM Blockchain. They use their own Blockchain. But besides that, I find that the project could be interesting for sports enthusiasts. It is right now at​ an early stage and that is visible when you visit the site. But for a sports blogger joining at this time could be an advantage. Just a quick overview from my side.

For more information feel free to visit their site.

https://scorum.com/en-us​

0.root_title: What Instagram Doesn't Have!
0.body:
![What Instagram doesnt have.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYbrRA48DQocASVsFmfxnZ2igSMZJhiBDVwtmcgEw8P2d)

I mentioned now more often that during my absence I used Instagram quite often for sharing my updates regarding the preseason. And I am still doing it. 
![Ray Leica Portrait (1 von 1).jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXvyFQXDeh3dxBmZ1hdUoTmYi77VdgMQHQpLJCHTQB3Rd)


Instagram reached 1 Billion users and is continuously growing. I like Instagram because it is simple to use. But when I compare what I feel using Instagram and writing this post for the STEEM Community, there is something which is really precious. 

Instagram is already established same as youtube, but that doesn't mean that it will last forever. And they are continually improving themselves to stay attractive. Many People are trying to become Instafame and trying building a community there.

On STEEM the adventure is like a drug! ​Being on the road breathing this air around you which can change when you​ reached a different destination​. Everything is still in early stages, and no one knows where this whole thing will be in few months, in a year or few years.
____________
I am back, and the Market starts to rise. 😉 A good​ sign isn't it? Just kidding 🙈
Being a part of this adventure is something precious, Instagram and other major platforms​​ can't deliver. For that,​ they are too established. STEEM is like a baby that is evolving, and you see every step, and all of us are hoping that our baby will grow into mature men. And if that happens, read correctly; if that happens ​our bonds with that blockchain will be deeper connected as never before.
_______
That feeling I never had and have when I post on Instagram. Again I like it and I am using it, but there is not that adventure we are experiencing here. 
I am so excited to see how things will turn out and I guess you're excited too?
​

0.root_title: Let's Talk About STEEMIT GOALS & IGTV!
0.body:
![STEEm Goal & IGTV.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmURxGkKakBLnr4iCCUZhuCyHDAuhREZuyg22E35o6wHkE)


Whats up Steemians, How are you doing? I hope you're all doing good. I was a bit inactive the last days, but this was not because of this painful bear market. Better to say, it's painful depending on a specific point of view. I see this as a tremendous opportunity to enter in STEEM at a much lower price. 
![Steemit Goals.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmaNxBK37fmaEtjcAipvM7J4LJtqzgs1oRR4yBXam5Psmb)

Before I read a post of @dandesign86 Check out how his [thoughts](https://steemit.com/steemit/@dandesign86/if-you-re-a-minnow-it-s-time-to-move) are regarding the current market situation.
___________
At the moment when I took STEEM more serious, I wanted to become an Orca here. That is my personal goal. And right now it looks that I will achieve this goal sooner than I thought.  But on the other hand, I have to admit that sometimes I had some doubt about this Blockchain. I think we all have them occasionally.
_________
The reason why I was inactive is that I was back in Germany visiting my parents. There where I grew up, where all started. For two years I wasn't there. My parents were during this time often here by me in Salzburg, but being again at the place where all started is something unique. Old memories are popping up; old people are contacting; it was just refreshing.
________
![IGTV.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmWyzXK6hRTvSdzn52vpLCVXiaVRyuyQFjrEoB48Y1Src7)


Maybe not many of you are aware what the centralized social networks are doing, but Instagram launched an application called Instagram TV which is claimed as the future of television.
________
The videos there are all vertically in the way how we look most of the time on our phones. Youtube is full of videos if this new application is a serious competitor to Youtube. Well I cant answer this question I think no one can; time will tell, but for me, this is a smart move. Video is the most engaging form of content and to optimize is for the smartphone (mobile first) is as I, in my opinion, a smart move. I tried this new feature out and created my frit IGTV.
________
Honestly, I hope we will see this kind of innovation build on the STEEM Blockchain. There was one female Steemian who made a Dtube video saying that a decentralized version of Vine would be beneficial for this blockchain. Do you remember Vine?
________
Right now I think that that Appics could be an application who could go in this direction. I hope that we will see more innovations in this Blockchain. But under the line, we can say that already a lot happened here. And the best is yet to come in my opinion.

**Did you hear​ of IGTV?**
0.title: Let's Talk About STEEMIT GOALS & IGTV!

0.root_title: Germany Has A Long Way To Go!(World Cup Edition)
0.body:
![Long way to go.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQKDmn9ajgvWtb28StnLZ3RBLVeqHMeZGYnY3E3GfChmY)


It's never easy to start in the world cup as the leading contender.
Some people may disagree with that but as the current titleholder and players like Germany have you are one of the major contenders.

And winning against a nation like Germany is the goal of everyone. 
________
Yes, also Germany disappointed in their first match.
I was surprised by their defense. In my eyes, the counter attacks of the Mexican team was too simple. This game had too often 1vs1, 2vs2, 3vs2 situations. On that kind of level, those situations are deadly. And we saw it in the game. 
__________
One thing Mexico did really well. They cut one of the most import players out. For me, Toni Kroos is one crucial players. Vela did a great job to disturb him when Germany was building up. And yes, we have to admit that they are a good team; definitely, they are and in summon they deserved winning this game. 
__________
Germany has definitely to improve themselves, but as I said in the previous post it was the first game it's it was not as expected but now they know that now they have to win the next game.

![World cup edition.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPZWD6Y8G67GbUDTzxRDBm9YMCE17s6r35k5vQMTggj2M)

0.root_title: Be Like Iceland! A Lesson For Every Steemian!
0.body:
![Be like Iceland.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbLdqhPeF4sctwsTKUitFuypDUcv31fGTGB9fpBcG83gA)


Yesterday two teams with a lot of offensive power had their debut in this world cup. Both teams France and Argentina are known for their offensive strength. In France, they have the faith that this national team is able to achieve something and some people see France as a contender for the title.

Argentina, with the best player in the world(my opinion) of course too.

But I have to say that both teams disappointed yesterday! France and Argentina were not able to dominate the game as expected. That's true, and I believe many of you who watched both games will agree with me. But let me tell you something about that.

![Who cares.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPAShZBv8PwnRUQ4ssTv8GTpYhA1CzMN7kZ5V1xL1YRNE)


Yes, guys who care​ about the games yesterday. I can understand the ordinary viewer at home or in a cafe, bar or restaurant celebrating the world cup want to see a game like Portugal-Spain where many goals happen. I can totally understand that. People are murmuring about Messi how bad he shot his penalty, and that's right. Let me tell you this.

**This is the World Cup!**
What matters is the end! Which team will hold the trophy at the end?
The typical viewer often overlooks this fact. This is how players think. Of course, both teams are for sure not happy with their performance, France has even won and collected three points. As I said yesterday, the result at the end matters. No its time to focus on the next game to make the best of it.

Do you remember the European Championship two years ago?
Honestly, Portugal, in my opinion, didn't play good, but in the end, they had the trophy, and that means they did something right and of course you also need luck. After the world cup, we can make an accurate analysis of every team and player but not during the competition​. Everything during the competition is just a between conclusion which is not final. But that not the point of today's Post :D

Both opponents Australia and Iceland made an excellent game against those giants. I want to highlight Iceland and create a connection to Steemit or other goals you have set for your life.
![Try Your best.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTGRseXtiXJgP2nHoBDVbPj5G23wYdxgUtoaC8hAFZ69a)

Are you aware how tiny this nation is?
The population of Iceland is around 350.000!
Argentina, for example, has around 45 million population!
Both numbers are rounded up.

What I want to say is that Iceland because of their small population can't draw on unlimited sources. That is already a disadvantage. Major nations can observe so many players and collect the best in their eyes.

But that doesn't mean that Iceland can't perform on an equal level.
The opposite is the case they already proved it in the European Championship.

And when you watched the game; Oh guys for me it was like a delicious cake to watch that. This team is so disciplined. Every single one of them is doing his job, it was visible. Unfortunately, ​I​ have no image to show you. Maybe this video works​:


<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xvarnwv6hRk" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Not really the best way but look how small Iceland is keeping the space between the lines. What I mean is the space between the defenders, midfielders, and strikers when Argentina is building up. I  know it's not the best way to show what I mean. 

And of course, they to do that, when you play against someone like Messi who can eat you in a phone box. Messi doesn't need much space to create something, and he showed it yesterday also.

For that, every single component of the team members has to function you know how tough that is? That is one thing! The other thing is that they also play great forward. They aren't some Vikings who know just to destroy, know they can play forward they have a plan and qualities to do that and all with limited sources. 

They are not complaining saying: **Are we have not so many great world players we can't win. No, they take what they have and try to make the best ​of it.**

A lesson every one of us should heed. Having an obvious disadvantage doesn't mean you can't beat a giant. See David again Goliath.

Maybe some people need this kind of truth and encouragement for their personal goals, maybe for your purposes here on Steemit?

**Take what you have and try to make the best of it.**

![World cup edition.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPZWD6Y8G67GbUDTzxRDBm9YMCE17s6r35k5vQMTggj2M)
0.title: Be Like Iceland! A Lesson For Every Steemian!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: World Cup Edition! Portugal Vs Spain. My Analysis.
0.body:
![World cap portugal.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRZZfDhGAD6C4CXjnUV1WiL4jUA68p5s3LKhRsobp4BTf)



The Game Portugal-Spain was a game which could have been a final.
The spectators were offered a lot. Two major nations, some giant player on the field showed us a fantastic game.

Let me explain how I found it.
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

In the first 5 minutes for me, Spain tried to build up their game, their philosophy. But Portugal was in the very beginning aggressive didn't let them play and started some counterattacks directly.

Spain is known for their ball possession their game with short passes also known as tiki-taka. Believe me, guys this kind of play can leach you. Never getting the ball every time running behind it is exhausting. 
Let me show you an example.
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nWNawBbM8l8" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

But one thing is clear. Spain is no more so strong as they were years ago. And I say it has to do that also in Spain a new generation is rising.
One key player for that kind of style was for me Xavi. He was so crucial for keeping this style alive. And for those who know a bit about,​ soccer know that Barcelona with Xavi, Iniesta and Messi were unbelievable.
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

Further other teams have adopted a strategy to counter that kind of style. In the first beginning, many teams wanted to copy Barcelona and Spain in their style. But it didn't work because they weren't built for that. They didn't​ have the matching players for that.

Portugal yesterday made it right. They tried to play out their strengths. Winning the ball and then fast counter-attacks.
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

In the end what really matters is the result!
There is no price for the team who is playing attractively. Results are important. There was a time I thought that I have to play beautiful, that this would be more important than winning. But in the area of professional football, the result is the most important aspect. I will not say that an attractive style is not important, no I like to play a beautiful style, but when at the end the result is not as we wanted, we are not satisfied.
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

Portugal did it really good. The played straightforward. They had a bit of luck when they scored the second goal but all in all, they mad it good. In the end, I thought that Spain is showing that they are the adults and Portugal the children. This leads me to the next point.

![Cr7.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmcNzjUkN3yBqFdznaQJjiihx4eTjM8GnVvEsGms724k5K)


When you are following me for quite a while, you know that I am Team Messi. There are several things I don't like about Ronaldo. And when it comes to an international tournament, he was not able to perform at the level he usually does in Madrid.
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

But yesterday he proved everyone wrong! 
He was the anchor for Portugal he took, and he did the significant actions. With three goals what can someone say?
![World cup trennung rot.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQpAy452DTWyxitELKASLuFX6nAjUAYLNtBzvoB6q3ug8)

Independently that I don't like him very much, but he is a 110 % full professional. His attitude when it comes to training, his mentality is extraordinary. Where he is based in his zeal. It was a clear message he spread yesterday. Even in his age, he's not resting.

I could only see 55 minutes because I had to work out myself.

In my opinion, it was for the first game both teams can live with that draw. 

Now I have back to watch the team within my opinion one of the most potent offensive lineup.
But till now they didn't​ find their game against Australia.

I have to admit: Australia is for me the better team 😳

![World cup edition.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPZWD6Y8G67GbUDTzxRDBm9YMCE17s6r35k5vQMTggj2M)
0.title: World Cup Edition! Portugal Vs Spain. My Analysis.
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: The World Cup Has Begun! My Thoughts!
0.body:
![World cup Game one.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmaNEp4sKMjYoL4BKZXYgro1Xn5uuxkd1cMzoM2m1nYHFB)

Do you really think I would miss writing about the World Cup? :D
No, my friends, this can't be. I have to say that I am a bit disappointed because I missed some opportunities to join some challenges :(
______________
Anyway, yesterday the longed sports event of this year has begun.
And of course, the host has the privilege to play the first game.

Russia against Saudi Arabia.

![What a start.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYdRt6LcKWN9cQpJGAbhNcTkWesb81FFHFnYwp9VCzZ5n)


Ok, it was clear that Russia would win. 
But in that height? It's not so surprising when we think about how some matches went for Saudi Arabia in the past world cups. 
_____________
Let me say it that way: In my opinion, they don't have the level of being a real competitor in that world cup.

For the Russian Team a motivating start, but please let us be humble. Don't expect too much.
It was the first game, it was against again Saudi Arabia, and the way is still so long. No offend guys. 

But all in all an excellent start for the viewers. We know that the world cup is not anymore just a sports events meanwhile it's more than that, and this is absolutely fine. A time where people come together to support their country and have some detailed sports discussions.^^^
________
I see already how some of you meet to watch some games with friends. Eating snacks and drinking some beers ;) 

My training already started and I have to prepare myself for the next season. 

This evening will be an excellent game. Portugal against Spain.
We will the first act of major players. I am so excited. I will try to keep you updated with my thoughts. But I can't promise anything because I have myself work to do.

**Is there something you want to know? Do you have something specific about the world cup? Let me know in the comments.**

![World cup edition.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPZWD6Y8G67GbUDTzxRDBm9YMCE17s6r35k5vQMTggj2M)
