0.root_title: How To Strengthen Your Account! [Concept]
0.body:
![How to strengthen your Account.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVLh8hysRf76BEns33dRCaHYi86h1gNtsq17aAiBW16ML)


The way I want to discuss here is not really a way it is more a concept an idea, and this is not from me. I want to join the topic people like @tarazkp already spread into the Steemit Ocean. For better understanding check out his [post.](https://steemit.com/steem/@tarazkp/are-you-a-steem-1-percenter-do-you-know-who-is#@tarazkp/re-wholeself-in-re-tarazkp-are-you-a-steem-1-percenter-do-you-know-who-is-20180523t062719258z)
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

When we try to bring this concept into a sentence, it could be: **Adopting a plankton/minnow.**

I am sure that some of you read already some posts about how community members are trying to help the community as a whole to grow.

In one thing @tarazkp said I agree confidently​.
As I wrote in the previous post, I declared that growing in Vest(Steempower) should be the number one goal of everyone here.

![Don't get me wrong.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQVhiRz5WtVAGh4Dm5AP3j8odU8QRT9e6usS3fyd9WWBp)

Let me add something to this declaration: When I am saying it should be the number one goal I mean it in a rational way. Of course, this ocean has many benefits to offer, the biggest of it is in my opinion meeting new people here. Being at this point all together​ here and observing where this whole thing will go. That is something you cant measure rationally this goes deeper inside, and that is great.
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

But growing in Steempower is something rational. Fact is: **More power means more influence at this point.** I would not call it influence I would name it **Distribution Strength**. With more Vest(Steempower) you can distribute more. If you do this is another question, but the fact is rational evident.

One more benefit I also mention in the previous post: **The Long-term perspective.** If STEEM evolves in the right direction, if the system is improved continually, if the price of STEEM goes up your voting strength goes up. I see it mostly that way. I don't think, how much my investment has increased; more than how much my power to distribute has increased.
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

And now I want to mention the point I found as accurate what @tarazkap said.
If Steemit had a broader middle class here, this would improve the journey for the community as whole enormously.
![Your responsibility.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmdoWTC8WKiEJfWTg3cdpYFYVx5oD2B8cqncGxqJbtEQ8t)

But I have to say that I don't nail it on the distribution value, no, I connect it to​ your responsibility. Yes, you heard it right your responsibility!

You know it is always easy to complain and pointing with the finger to others. *If I had this, I would do this and that not what the current whales are doing.*
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

This thought and this attitude sneak easily into our minds or is already present. Pushing the responsibility to other people. And if someone asks you-you say: **What can I do as a minnow?**
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

Not many people have the genuine ability to put himself in someone else shoes. I am not here to judge and to condemn, but I would highly appreciate seeing more people growing in Steempower gaining stronger distribution possibilities and having with that automatically more responsibility.

As I said in the previous post I know that not everyone can act that way. I am aware of that. And I said if you need it take it.

This also matters only for those minnows and planktons who have the desire to grow and waiting that someone will support him from beginning to end. This is what this concept is about.
![Adopting a minnow.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmdrEjWKV7TibMN4i3TWLJDhLqhfdpTyuVkYvXUykVLYyF)

How could this look like?
1. Having one or more depending on how much someone can handle plankton/ minnow.
1. Defining a goal: I help you to reach for example 500 SP or 1000 SP the number is of course variable.
1. And this till this goal is reached. It's a commitment. Not something you just do.

For that, you need of course people with more power willing to do this or a group of people. As I said, this would be a commitment.  
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

I thought a bit about that.
If I would do this, one thing would be clear: **It must be a minnow where you feel the desire and confidence. This is not done overnight. So the choice should be the right one.**

I could talk more about that, but I want to hear your opinion about that.
We already have great supporting solutions, and these should also be used. This would just be an addition. 

**What do you think about the concept if someone with more distribution strength commits himself to a plankton/minnow/dolphin to push/support him until the defined goal is reached?**​
0.title: How To Strengthen Your Account! [Concept]
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: The Most Important Goal Every Steemian&Dtuber Should Have!
0.body:
![The most important Goal.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmaprTYNzXieB8ZxfwqLfvo9o3vGmR8erD6KgYXSHc8b9m)


After being for a quite a while around here, I want to tell you what I have identified as the number one goal every Steemian, Dtuber, Streamer and everyone else in this community should have. 

But before I tell you this I have to make some steps back.

![The reason many of us join steemit.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSEVeakEnNfi38UXjV8fUS8xDNrWATZrXXGRKw9ZkSFNP)


I am not a fan of generalization. So what I am telling you counts for sure, not for everyone there are always exceptions. But with confidence, I can say that: *You can make money with blogging* is one of many proclamation you have probably heard. And that was making you excited. Maybe you never heard of cryptocurrencies before, and you wanted to put all the promises you heard to a test. 
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)
Maybe you were unhappy with the centralized social networks, perhaps you were banned, and you were looking for an alternative and found Steemit, but I think most of us got caught by promises as I showed above. And let me tell you this: There is nothing wrong with that. Absolutely not!

![The beginning of the steemit journey.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmWpbrzFWEmvhNL3L7ZW5j2nk5NHa6C3uBEJvTzpWuvDUf)


In my case, I had to wait about two days to actually start my blog. 
You're excited what is possible your dreams are already flying. You see this as the next big thing, and you are there at the right time at the right place. You look at the payouts of the trending page, and you're going crazy.

It doesn't take long for the hard reality punch you like Floyd Mayweather.
You are brutally hit in form of rewards around 0.01 cents. Ok, maybe you have some backbone, and you motivate yourself to put some more effort into​ it and give the seed time to sprout. 
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

Even after that, you don't see the big rewards you see on the trending page maybe you also don't know about bidbots and much more what is part of that community. You are out of faith, and most of us quit at this point.

Not all of us give up at this point there are of course inspiring examples out in the Steemit ocean. Yes, guys there a some of them. Some people who left in the first place came back after time for a second start. Some were still disappointed others had a great run.

**But I can say that most of us are looking at the wrong component.**

![Centralized Social Networks.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSBbZs6zGA5mcJpxdSLnQBW7pzM857swi4ib3tCmB8FHf)


We all had our way more or less in networks like Facebook, Snapchat, Youtube, Instagram and whatever. Some of us still have, but how it's possible that people spend so much time in such networks without getting any rewards unless you built up a large following and was or able to monetize them decently. 

Some people started there social media journey just for fun, and through a particular passion about something, followers came in. It was maybe not your goal in the very beginning. I am sorry I digress.
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

So what I want to tell you is that the big problem is the visibility of the payouts! This brings people fast in the mood to compare with each other the lack of understanding grows and grows. *Why this one, I am much better I have much more knowledge in that area and so on.*

If you think right now that I am up to tell you that the rewards should be hidden you are on the wrong track. The problem is not that we see the rewards, the visibility exacerbated your whole perception.

After my time here and learning more and more about the thing and I am still learning, I found that looking purely at the rewards is the wrong way. 

I know that we're all different. That we all come from different areas in life which include that we all have different requirements I am aware of that. 

![The longterm Game.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTmFSNfFxV5kNToAkFJPLYBysFbzX84nm7prKR7o449NE)


I am sure that you figured it out that the whole Steemit game and everything on this STEEM Blockchain is a long-term game. If we have got to this knowledge; the most important aspect should be at an entirely different point, definitely not the reward. And with that the whole journey change. At least in my opinion. 

I will tell you what I found as the most critical goal every one of us should have. **Strengthen your account!**
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

You know what I mean by that right? Investing in your account in the form of Steempower should be the number one goal for every single one of us. 

Ok, I hear you:*Ray, not all of us have the possibility to buy a whole lot of STEEM to power it up, and we were not lucky to be here at the very beginning where you earned much more than we do today.*

When you think that and that's ok, but I will tell you that in this case, your perception is fuzzy. Believing that only investing a whole lot of money will make a difference to crush the game is misguided. Every single piece you power up today could make in few years a big difference. Now you may be a small minnow, but tomorrow you could be for others a dolphin, orca or a whale. And I am not talking about the technical definition. 
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

When the road will continue to be the right one and improves on that way more people will join, and they will look up to you. You see the dolphins, and whales today, but the game will change. New people could and will also look up to you. 

More Steempower will give you more influence in the network, and it has some more benefits as most of you already know like more curation rewards. I would describe the best advantage that way: **A more significant distribution possibility.** Depending on the STEEM price and we all hope that it will continue to rise and it looks that way, but here I have to add that no one knows the future and no one can make predictions with 100% certainty.
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)
But when it does your vote will weight much more as it does today. Believe me many people, and in the first place, you will appreciate it.

In my opinion, the most important goal should be to grow here in the form of Steempower.

I know that people cash out and convert STEEM the way along to fiat to pay bills and more. And I don't say stop doing it; I would be crazy when I would tell you this. 

Which seed I am trying to plant is that: besides the STEEM you need to cash out is to build in the first place a mindset and second a strategy for the goal to strengthen your account. 
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)
Yes, I know that it is easier said than done, especially when you don't have money you can afford to invest and that means also perhaps to lose. But there are people continually cashing out, and then it's not a surprise that you can't grow. And then​ starting complaining about whales is for sure the wrong way. Being now at this moment here is can be not will be; the most significant advantage in life. Sounds drastic I know but it could really be.

In the next one, I will address a possible way how to strengthen your account which is inspired by some contributions I read here.
![Modernpastor Text Trenner Bunner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbThtsMEr4CK7YNYHY4fZYKF9z5SZZF8cr4m2WY5QXx5c)

<center>**Next Post**</center>
![How to strengthen your Account.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVLh8hysRf76BEns33dRCaHYi86h1gNtsq17aAiBW16ML)

0.root_title: Steem Monsters Worth The Hype?
0.body:
![Steemonster Worth the hype?.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmS9XxJXi7JYu5qWuGYpR8QE7fjCZonz2n5L7hXiDR2Czh)

After writing much about me and my travels, it's time to shift the focus on different topics. I told you that after finishing my travel blogs and hosting the **Attention Contest**, congratulation again to @blessed-girl for winning this contest, I want to address some topics I noticed occasionally.

**One of them is Steem Monsters!**

I have to say that now I am giving it attention, so I don't know at this time what this is all about. But I saw and still see more and more people writing about it and making videos on Dlive about Steem Monsters. What I noticed occasionally evolve to a hype in my opinion. So my question is: **Is it worth the hype?**

![What is Steemmonsters.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSSJZJ7AV34eTjJo35QYYsias3McDS6NHKkrCTshAPJa8)


For me, it looks likes a trading card game built on STEEM. This reminds me of past ages where trading card games like Yu-Gi-Oh and Pokemon were really famous. Or the game Hearthstone.

![Trading Card zusammenstellung.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmWK6n2ACi48Bw7D5tLVxuXFmCzEayCQbmkGFRQTxM1hQ8)


There was a time where I played with those Yu-Gi-Oh cards but just for a short time. I have to say that it made fun. I know from friends that they were really into Hearthstone. What I want to say is that this type of games showed already a successful history. 

![The Blockchain of opportunities.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQvi8SYymVwrNQo1RgjLi9KHAj7ewTMpvrTQA8FWFabKm)


Yes, this is something I also want to address but not here in this post. What I want to say is that it's incredible how many new applications are coming build on STEEM. I think that Steemonster made the beginning of more game Ideas based on STEEM. Maybe you are already creating the next one or have a brilliant game idea? And when they are all connected with the process of winning and earning STEEM or other prices than I think the potential future could look bright. 

Honestly, I have to dive deeper into the system of Steem Monsters. What I know so far is that you can buy cards, you can trade them, and soon there will be a tournament where you can battle with your cards. Am I right?

From a game perspective definitely a smart move even I consider myself not a real gamer. But to have the possibility to play games here( and we know that gaming is a part of social networks) is excellent. 

I don't think that behind this Steemmonsters euphoria is nothing but hot air. I will dive deeper into that and maybe soon I will buy my first cards. We will see. 

**How do you see it? Did you buy already some cards?**
0.title: Steem Monsters Worth The Hype?
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Attention Contest Winner Announcement!
0.body:
![Attention contest winner.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQ46k5stQoWRVHD7hKc56s9XxW99Pii3UXNgmi2nsBSoL)


Thanks all of you guys for participating in this contest.
I was sitting curios behind​ my laptop watching every​ single comment.
For not to influence this contest in any way,​ I didn't​ respond to some comments. And I wanted because​ some were so close.😩 And I was thinking: Go back and see that you didn't​ give the right answer you have to change something​.

And then​ the matching answers came in.

Before I announce the winner let me tell you the right answers:
________

1. On which Airport did I land?

Answer: JFK Airport

2. How is the place called we visited at first after checking in our hotel making the first steps in NYC? 

Answer: Chinatown

3. How is the name of the lens I bought?

Answer: Sony Fe 24-70mm OSS

4. What are the nicknames of the Times Square?

Answer: The Great White Way
The Crossroads of the World.

5. From which country the gift of the Statue Of Liberty came?

Answer: France

6. Which city did I visite apart from New York?

Answer: Washington

7. Which place did I visit after the statue of liberty?

answer: 9/11 Memorial

8. What is the home of the Congress?

Answer: The capitol/capitol building.

9. Which teams are playing in​ the NBA​ finals?

answer: Cleveland Cavaliers​s golden state warriors.

10. I told you one time about the type of workout I​ did. What type was that?

Answer: Interval session on the bike. 
__________

Some of you had some problem with Question 4. The question was how are the **nicknames**. It's​ plural guys. Unfortunately,​​ some gave only one of the two I mentioned in my posts.

And the last question, question number 10 made the biggest problems. I knew that this could be confusing. Yes, I am a footballer, but that​ was not the question. Honestly,​ I just needed one thing in the answer. Thy type was **interval session** If you had written​ this, it would​ have been enough. 30 minutes​ of biking and 10 minutes on the treadmill​ is the execution of that type but even that I​ would have let it count. So the answer I was looking for was **interval session**​ exactly how I​ wrote it.

**So guys as I said we have a winner. This person gave at first the matching answers. And that is @blessed-girl congratulation. Your SBDs are on the way.**

Thanks for joining guys. Feel free to let me know your feedback about that contest. Were the questions too​ difficult or unclear what could be improved​ or did you appreciate the way I did? Feel free to leave your honest opinion.
​​
Do you have the Steemify App? If you use it; make sure to have me in your notifications not to miss the next contest or giveaway. And more will come in the future.

0.root_title: Travel With Me#5: The Last Act! Going Street-Photography!
0.body:
![Going Street Photography.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRCD3f78FeNqk4Jj4tWuEPbTg7u87s4vxn3JHcce79jwc)

This will be my last contribution to my trip to New York. I hope you had at least a bit fun joining me on my adventure and I hope my posts also had some educational value. Further, I think that you didn't forget my Attention Contest right ;) 

If you are not familiar what I mean by that, check out this [post.](https://steemit.com/travel/@modernpastor/travel-with-me-chance-to-win-30-sbd)

The last thing I want to share with you will also be my shortest one. 
The first day I told you about the Times Square and that I have to go back to feel the atmosphere again there. And that is exactly what I did. But this time...

![Times Square At Night black.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQN7bTLtxG9A6guyxUCvnmtRhsndWA3e1t59K3PWFdwXF)

At the day it's already an impressive location, but at night it's even more stunning. A place that never sleeps, an overwhelming river of people moving around. Honestly, I stand just for an hour looking around observing people there. Here I want to show you some pictures I took. Going Street Photography :D 

![DSC03142 2.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmTbQD8krpXaZHh7mWxGrUXKVEhdRK65dsPcdTHYbrBjwR)

![DSC03156 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSa6kWpDhchj9sodkekqQEd1fE7MWR5bWrgTwwGMdjpHD)

![DSC03216.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdKALSPLQ2wYXxxZETvepFtka1sCsQoY8wnZ3HjWPkThZ/DSC03216.JPG)

![DSC03167 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPDiC5VdwhMZPXDtfs9PNyf7keLj64i2xybnTN4ACJR3Q)

![DSC03206 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPEJ8xySgsXAode2FY5XkSpsDmip5rLwaB7GtFNKqVM1j)

![DSC03259 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXBVVwpYx5PFSJ2LRNoz4muSnKTGiYT1BH6pPmGtrT5wn)

![DSC03242 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSa2pYabCV6CcUFzUANrca65D2JU8AGgrCf4KVDuuimCu)

![DSC03228 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmWndDAczksrAtyYFeWBAKsqvPNFU965jQUEPY39su3o6x)

![DSC03270.JPG](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmS8jKmd4nLMTDdDfkS2JiJiVuLURTZbf4WfJNzXgxZw8K)

![DSC03231 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRLdJmqT5FNZWDce6ihR5DsFM2UcoFiEtgUApTDVqdSC3)

![DSC03147 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmNipjAXKJXGysSnYZUfkGE9tadHpqop3AZY32ME3EGyPx)

![DSC03215 export.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUMyVRKBUSNuocydgULpF9MachyB8yiZYuJVX8xZZcCqe)


![Conclusion.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmNcgmvutSkcDTLVe3U2QA3zZkUaUmYUBSBdqLG3qUiZKA)

For me, it was a successful vacation fulfilling my childlike dream diving into a different culture. I have to say that I like America. I like New York, but living there I could not imagine unless you have a lot of money and you can afford the prices. Ok, I was talking about Manhatten. The prices in Brooklyn or Queens are much cheaper same for the Bronx, but I doubt that that would be the first point someone is looking for an apartment.

Manhatten is a busy city. Extremely busy. You see it; you feel there is nothing with relaxing. People want to make career they want to achieve something in that giant city, and that is visible everywhere. Fulfilling the American dream. This is just my opinion. I hope you enjoyed. The actual contest will come soon^^

0.root_title: Travel With Me #4: There Where The Power Is!
0.body:
![place of power.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRzC11BLumCjSSuhYAg2XWGNPkcyQG9ZaGMe3szw86zAi/place%20of%20power.jpg) It was the day we woke up at the earliest time compared to all other days. At 5:30 AM the alarm did his job and pushed us out of our dreams. You know how hard it is especially if you went to bed late the day before. It was necessary because at 7 Am we needed to be at a meeting point near Time Square. I was already excited about this day. Visiting places I often see in movies and series. Everything was set up. All devices were charged and the power bank was ready, a coffee at Starbucks and we were good to go. ![Washington DC.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdgH5UraWSXWL6DyfgjvQEhoPE7RWc2Q5jspxnxHyc5mE/Washington%20DC.jpg) With the bus, it took us about 3.5 hours to reach Washington. After halfway down the track, we made a stop for about 30 minutes. Time to have breakfast, and going to the toilet. During the road, our female guide told us a bit about New York and the US in general. For example, she said to us that if you want to live in Manhatten, you need to prove that you earn 14x of your rent per year. Living in Manhatten is really expensive, and I can testify it. Because of that many people live in New Jersey which is far more affordable and it's not far away from New York. Even people are coming from Baltimore which is about 1,5 hours away and the Hotspot when it comes to car import and export. All cars a shipped to Baltimore and from there they are forwarded to their final destinations in the US. We passed the Pentagon which is the ninth most colossal building in the world, and soon we reached our first destination. ![Arlington National.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmX2T8hC3qZUx6WLF1QftF57Wg4b1L5V5A8qiuRcJv3PgK/Arlington%20National.jpg) This is a unique cemetery. Our guide told us that only people who served the land in a specific way are allowed to be buried there. Its a great and last honor for many people who lost their lives. I had some reverent moments there. JFK, for example, is also buried there. Let me show you some pictures guys. ![DSC02788.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPeXizmXNao1baa1tt2KWj6akTH1mwsfmA67tdSWd3fF4/DSC02788.jpg) ![DSC02811.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUtsbsz2EuEmrzriRz8eHRaKxZ9YkTx1vRv91rciCQdZ6/DSC02811.jpg)
(The grave of John F. Kennedy and his wife)
![Arlington 1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcSV7pyis9WVmwkx4wTzRSUQ1i585qLq9Sts9RajFwrpL/Arlington%201.jpg) From there we moved with the bus to our next destination. A place from where we had two more exciting sights. ![Abraham Lincoln Memorial.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmW1VGVPppTM6Jb4ukhsjYAkY9dGyGqiGriGSqVcZCU3a1/Abraham%20Lincoln%20Memorial.jpg) Through the park, we went to the Abraham Lincoln Memorial and you could also see already the Washington monument. But there was a funny thing. Some squirrels came so close to us or better to say to my wife that she could touch them. Surely it was looking for food. I saw that never before. Look at this picture. ![Eichhörnchen.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTsRoAgu3jdLEyvUFBCLdDYB5CGFXLD6hMqydHmYueNiy/Eichh%C3%B6rnchen.jpg) Standing before the Abraham Lincoln monument was massive. This building is fantastic, and you have a perfect view to the Washington monument. And many scenes in series and movies are shot at this place or to say that this location is rebuilt. For example the series Scandal. Dou you know that series?
![o-SCANDAL-SEASON-3-POSTER-570.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmePvjSUG82NNNTaxoTK4vHkLCWd8vecA4Ezeb2hsHCRjs/o-SCANDAL-SEASON-3-POSTER-570.jpg)
It was a great place to take some pictures, and I took some have a look. ![Lincoln memorial.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU2oUwjjygKjp7unMT4q5rAXaRcv2r6skD7W5Z9gbbeyH/Lincoln%20memorial.jpg) ![Ray +Abraham Lincoln.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbxDBaGYt9qgbXkNK9czLYEaq9z5tYjyqCTEqf6caNDoM/Ray%20+Abraham%20Lincoln.jpg) ![Ray fotografiert washington.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNjD6rv9uoaZiAcwAXhDZrZcnpKJobMCWizJPRqC5Q4ex/Ray%20fotografiert%20washington.jpg) ![731A1836-3B2E-4ECD-8B5A-77A214884C67.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSperKYht5HuG6Q1yusuyZmLnNqQURzMmJHU7yCLr8bJ3/731A1836-3B2E-4ECD-8B5A-77A214884C67.JPG) Awesome isn't it?

Lincoln Memorial Facts

_____________ 1. *The Lincoln Memorial is an American national monument built to honor the 16th President of the United States, Abraham Lincoln.* 1. *The building is in the form of a Greek Doric temple and contains a large seated sculpture of Abraham Lincoln and inscriptions of two well-known speeches by Lincoln, "The Gettysburg Address" and his Second Inaugural Address.* 1. *The memorial has been the site of many famous speeches, including Martin Luther King Jr.'s "I Have a Dream" speech, delivered on August 28, 1963, during the rally at the end of the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom.* __________ After that, we had a little break. It was so hot on this day, and I was not dressed properly for that. As you can see. A short would have been better. We ate something and head directly to the next destination. ![capitol.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXEY1ckfwupjFn3rgMRAfWxN6zhkmzH7qvkLEm5J8MfL3/capitol.jpg) Let me tell you something about Washington. The city is worthy to be the capital. You smell that power is there. The city is so clean, and the people there are different from new yorkers which are not a surprise in my opinion. And the capitol is like​ other buildings impressive. For me the building number one in Washington. Take a look. ![Ray vor Kapitol.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc4YdSVWEfp2Zjp6UMM3Qi8fxTNStDu2XkESt1bzCS99n/Ray%20vor%20Kapitol.jpg)

United States Capitol Facts

________ 1. *The United States Capitol, often called the Capitol Building, is the home of the United States Congress, and the seat of the legislative branch of the U.S. federal government.* 1. *For several decades, beginning when the federal government moved to Washington in the fall of 1800, the Capitol building was used for Sunday religious services as well as for governmental functions.* _________ There was one thing missing. One word. You know it guys. You would be stupid not to visit that place when you are the first time in DC. ![The white house.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWykacMxmo1Affnb7RK3q442zRuYyPkHpnha9TtL74Qjb/The%20white%20house.jpg) Our guide told us that in movies we see only the Hollywood side. But the other site is where the whole business happens. Actually, I thought there would be more police forces in front of the white house, but it was not so. Our guide told us that Donald Trump was not present in the White House at that moment but on his way back. When we went back, we saw a long row of black cars. The Secret Service. But not in the intensity you see in movies :D I couldn't make many pictures but this one I like. ![The White House 4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYPLo8FnniGCBPGTYkBVBbHC2kZE6z9CCr4zgfvbfrVN1/The%20White%20House%204.jpg) I think I have not tell you much about the white house. Just few facts at the end. __________

White House Facts

1. *The residence was designed by Irish-born architect James Hoban[2] in the neoclassical style. After that, it went back to New York thoroughly exhausted of this day. But this was one of the best.* 1. *The building was originally variously referred to as the "President's Palace", "Presidential Mansion", or "President's House" The earliest evidence of the public calling it the "White House" was recorded in 1811.* __________ Thanks for reading guys. That was my day in Washington DC. A great day!
0.title: Travel With Me #4: There Where The Power Is!

![Goodbye New York.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUhizRhWiA3Z54pAYzYJKaDnBaNoV7Tcz7UL1RQ2dZB8n)

Everything has an end.
All good things same as the bad things end one day. 

Today our holidays in New York ends. What an awesome experience. I am glad that we did it, that I was able to fulfill one childlike dream. But nine days are more than enough. Now is also the moment where I say; Good to go back.

Home will always stay home 😁

![Dont worry.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmV8VVbLqnWQZpNBJ9NCqL3XVGpSzjL9Xij9bMFbQN7qmc)

When I am back home, I will continue to write about my adventure here which will count for the **Attention Contest**. Nothing changed. Writing at home without having this stress here makes it easier. 😁 

And there is more to share with you. And also I can focus back at home on other topics to spread some value. When I was taking a short look at my feed the last days and other sections I saw​ some interesting​ content I plan to address​. How I can do more for this community. This blockchain is moving! Now with 20k Steempower,​ I should focus more on that.

But first things first!

Thanks for all your encouraging comments guys and stay tuned ;)​

0.root_title: Travel With Me #3: The Most Important Place You Have To Visit!
0.body:
![The most important place.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcjo71m3RYBunekhzTDHwr9paBrv2Lw1ErcPooim1aZux/The%20most%20important%20place.png) Hey STEEMfam, The second day was really an awesome day. The evening before we already searched for a place to have breakfast. As I told you in my previous post the previous price of the breakfast in our hotel was a scam :D After strengthening ourselves, we moved to our first location. We had still some problems to find the right way immediately, but we reached it. And in my opinion when you are the first time in New York, and you don't visit this place you did something wrong. ![Statue of liberty.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme7DCUSuPMkX9jGbsdoXnPW3G6SpxTKMEh99ZsUntLfSa/Statue%20of%20liberty.jpg) We took the subway at Spring street till South Ferry. From there, it was a ten minutes walk to reach our destination. The queue was so long that we regretted not to buy a fast track ticket. No, I have to explain it; We knew that the line for visiting the statue of liberty would be long, but we never expected that it would be that long! In my mind, I said to myself that we have to wait certainly 2 hours. But that price we needed to pay, so we waited. But the grace of God was upon us. After 20 minutes some of the employees came to open the fast track line for people who didn't pay for it. At here is the thing; We were standing in the perfect position where the women opened the way for us. So we were the first who switched to the fast track line, and after 10 minutes more we were on the ferry. ![Statue of liberty ferry.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmfXNHQt3BQ7yDsib1d5UUGBDw8t5nsuFGpdKLiEX8MtSv/Statue%20of%20liberty%20ferry.jpg) We were lucky guys! The expected 2 hours waiting time changed into 30 minutes waiting time. From the ferry, I took these pictures guys. ![New York Skyline.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRqPCQBTQyv74BGtY1tpbZVkei5nMTJSXNmR7gvUFss3h/New%20York%20Skyline.jpg) ![Freiheitsstatue alleine.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYAvukhJJR8R2CGDXG1ySiZaMotBmBmXhnXgGaNKwkhEQ/Freiheitsstatue%20alleine.jpg) ![freiheitsstatue+.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSt6RGK9B51wC5uNa1XTwUC5ra8xUNGWzzfwbSJkB97kE/freiheitsstatue+.jpg) A majestic sight SteemFam.

Statue Of Liberty Facts!

__________ *1. Did you know that the statue, was a gift from the people of France to the people of the United States, was designed by French sculptor Frédéric Auguste Bartholdi and built by Gustave Eiffel? The statue was dedicated on October 28, 1886.* *1. The Statue of Liberty is a figure of a robed woman representing Libertas, a Roman liberty goddess. She holds a torch above her head with her right hand, and in her left-hand carries a tabula ansata inscribed in Roman numerals with "JULY IV MDCCLXXVI" (July 4, 1776), the date of the U.S. Declaration of Independence.* ____________ **Again I have to say that this is a must visit place when you are in New York.**
0.title: Travel With Me #3: The Most Important Place You Have To Visit!

0.root_title: Two Monsters Are Fighting! The NBA Finals!
0.body:
![Nba Finals.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZZfSSDE155m2FTQQe9aDNbPCoS2zRhx7LL7ooJyJvuhJ)


Hey STEEMfam,

I hope you had all a great weekend. In the time this post here appears its already evening in my actual timezone. 

Today I want to share you one benefit for being here at this time.
Yes, you saw it already on my thumbnail. Currently, the NBA Finals are running. I don't like just football. Actually, my favorite type of sport is the American Football. Yeah, I am a Seattle Seahawks fan :D. Or maybe it's better to say that I like their quarterback Russell Willson. An extraordinary guy. Not only a great athlete but also as a person from what I can see of course a great man. 

And Basketball is also exciting, but because of the different time zones, it makes it hard to follow them. It's not the same when you just look at the result on the internet or if you genuinely saw a game.

And today is the second game of the NBA final Cleveland Cavalier vs. Golden State Warriors.

![golden_state_warriors_vs_cleveland_cavaliers_by_aiziku-d8v1vpf.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVDetdBWz8yJGU2VFVq6T3WtTHAUcGREteu4CPT448PDk)
<center>[Source](https://aiziku.deviantart.com/art/GOLDEN-STATE-WARRIORS-VS-CLEVELAND-CAVALIERS-535885251)</center>

Guys, I have two incredible players to watch. No, all of them are great players otherwise they wouldn't play in the NBA, but Cleveland Lebron James and the Warrior Steph Curry are extraordinary. And they showed already in the first game. 

![11837D52-2C6A-4150-842C-11764D1E6753.JPG](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmfPR51hQPH1dbX7rPKGEPTvHZLRszJTXmyCFpXmWqvtBq)
<center>Bought myself a warrior Snapback</center>

Its great to see those athletes performing in such important games. 
I think Lebron is the most popular player and he's a beast! What he is doing on the pitch is just incredible; I don't know how to explain it.

He is able to play alone. Ok, of course, he can't, but their style of play is focused on him. When he has the ball, everything can happen. Maybe this is also a weakness, knowing that when you can stop him, then the win is for sure. But you have to stop him in the first place. 

Steph Curry, on the other hand, is different. I am also following him on Instagram same as Russell Willson. This guy act as a leader not only from his skills, his throws behind the three-point line are always dangerous as you can see here in that video. What an epic buzzer beater. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9X9CQ_y0UJs" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

He seems to have a blessing charisma. And he knows how to put his teammates in scenes. I am glad that I can watch today the second final game. Not Live guys :D! No misunderstanding​.

Wish you all a great start into the new Week!
0.title: Two Monsters Are Fighting! The NBA Finals!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Travel With Me #2: The Most Overwhelming Place Of New York!
0.body:
![The most overwhelming.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWTr3MdvMf8gcraD8YcVAy8L8MWBY2Q84tPg8k4WXJ6iF/The%20most%20overwhelming.jpg) We arrived at the JFK Airport around 1:30 PM local time. After 9 hours of flight, we were happy to move again like ordinary people. We had luck, my wife she is the one who organizes all our trips, and we got an upgrade to the premium economy class. Flying with more space was a remarkable difference when I compare it with our trip to the Maldives a few years ago where we flew economy class. We took a cab which offered a fixed price, and we checked in our hotel The Dominick in Manhattan. We were already tired. In Austria, it was already late. Yes, you know what I am talking about.😴 We said to ourselves that the first day we would not do so much and start our exploration the day after. We walked a bit around our hotel, and we landed first in China Town :D ![0_4200_0_2800_one_chinatown-manhattan-street-scene-tam50.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXiYTwAv5keSWo7qiD2mjHQDhvPiW6Ckd7ycsLkPJj45e/0_4200_0_2800_one_chinatown-manhattan-street-scene-tam50.jpg)
**[Not my photo](https://de.airbnb.com/locations/new-york/chinatown)**
I said to my wife: **Where are you leading us?** She was looking on her phone to figure out where we should find a street with, some different restaurants. After 30 minutes walking, we were at the other side of the Spring Street, the Street of our hotel but at the first, we followed the wrong way from there. I put my camera out and started to shoot a bit; I was looking at some stores in that time. These high buildings already impressed me. We looked for a restaurant, for now, the hunger was hunting us. We had no power anymore and took the next best opportunity. A small pizza stand. Yes, not healthy, but hey I am on my holidays, and I will burn some calories for sure. After eating we walked back to our hotel, it was already 8.PM and we went to sleep soon.

Day 2

From our hotel room, we have a beautiful view over one part of Manhattan where I took this shot here. ![IMG_2511.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdtxtK8tsCSfqPbu8ehPuGVe7Me1ic36NmtWabG7BrGPJ/IMG_2511.JPG) We forgot to close the curtains, and the bright light was shining into our room early. At 6 AM local time we woke up. My wife is also into fitness, so we decided to start the day with a workout at the gym. I made an interval session on the bike for 30 minutes, and after that, I continued for 10 minutes more on the treadmill. I was full of swat! With that feeling, we could start our day.💪🏾 After taking a shower, we took breakfast in the restaurant of our hotel but let me say that: I am now the third day here when I am writing this post. We ate already a lot but this breakfast was a scam, and we never ate there again. Don't get me wrong; the food was good but too expensive compared to other restaurants we ate. Ok, we need to make these kinds of experiences ^^ ![Not Happy.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQ73CHci9yTvxHQwbpv2tBhEw4htUjYAwwN4YuJ7hDjUf/Not%20Happy.jpg) You know I am just as an amateur photographer. I love photography, but I call myself definitely an amateur. I have the attitude when I am shooting just to shoot with prime lenses. But already the day before I knew that here in New York I can't go far with only prime lenses. That's why I wanted to buy my first zoom lens. I know that B&H Photo is here because some tec youtubers visits this camera store a lot. So I told my wife first to navigate ourselves to this place before we start exploring.
![1007314094_r3EfP-M.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZVAJbeLQ57kbjFR4ChaCBurECBkLkuGvptYq5m5DATNX/1007314094_r3EfP-M.jpg)
([Not my photo](http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/a-grande-maca/2017/10/11/bh/))
A great decision. With the Subway, we arrived at a crossroad of Time Square. Guys, I was only looking up. I picked my camera and started shooting but so bad pictures. I needed a zoom lens. So without wasting too much time we went too B&H. A dream store for Tec enthusiasts. You find nearly everything in there what comes to photography, videography/cinematography, and music! I had already one lens in mind, and I had luck because it was the last one. Already in Austria I did researches and found out that my desired lens is tough to get. So I purchased the Sony FE 24-105mm F4 G OSS. ![IMG_2552.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWox76Rc3Rdua58AgGVoWCgHXGY22dh3Lrd9hsJTa3cwr/IMG_2552.JPG) Covering great focal lengths would give me much more versatility. Not the fastest lens with an aperture of F4 but for mainly shooting Street Photography in my case one of the best for Sony full-frame cameras. And I also had my prime lenses for some tight portraitures. **My first recommendations for you: When you are visiting a new country, and you want to shoot pictures take definitely a zoom lens with you.** I also bought a new messenger bag because my backpack made it hard for me to switch lenses fast enough. So I took also a messenger bag of the brand Peak Design I also have a clip of them where I can mount my camera on a bag strap. When I was in London, you saw a picture of me and my camera hanging on the belt. So I was definitely ready now! ![Time Square überschrift.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdbL743edWJxEHyFoJVrSEsYjHhEUXGviHPoG1qg8FahG/Time%20Square%20%C3%BCberschrift.jpg) This was for me the most overwhelming place at this day. The weather was great which gave me an extraordinary experience. The high building full of significant publicity of different brands, the busy traffic and of course the busy people pounced on me at the same time. First, I didn't know where I should starting shooting. By the way let me share with you some more photos I took there. Some you already saw here are some more. ![DSC02249.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmczMQ2wcWKx2TxK7YdH1WWdmpN8KAUgVXULY8XHT7hBCN/DSC02249.JPG) ![DSC02205.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZVhmWgnGT2vh8P8fEvvAxDGqHdFiw5ofSBsmZrEVj5rn/DSC02205.JPG) ![DSC02326.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmU9W5Som2eor8isYuyuFscsGYtSTkf5ZvMJjpn7ADt7LR/DSC02326.JPG) ![DSC02196.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQvk82PjefNmmPBKDFnRLokGS1MoBedVU17Cj4rrhnqRi/DSC02196.JPG) ![time square.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZF4NBSL1EqjsqBDnejqpLSykwjioWwRzrh6FYSdyXqBc/time%20square.jpg)
**My favorite shot!**
![Time Square 2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUxZufD8nDGW7JPDfScaAGamUwhKdDV2dDGS73FaYNN3e/Time%20Square%202.jpg) ![81D4EEC9-BAC4-4117-BEBE-4686F49A56BB.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmX2AqcPb45Scuy3pvAq1xo1nRyfddsyeegzwxvqRcnJCF/81D4EEC9-BAC4-4117-BEBE-4686F49A56BB.JPG) Definitely, a place someone must visit when he/she is in New York. But let me give you some facts about the Time Square.

Time Square facts!

_______________ *1. Times Square is one of the world's most visited tourist attractions, drawing an estimated 50 million visitors annually. Approximately 330,000 people pass through Times Square daily.* *1. Times Square functions as a town square, but is not a square in the geometric sense of a polygon; it is more of a bowtie shape, with two triangles emanating roughly north and south from 45th Street, where Seventh Avenue intersects Broadway.* *1. Formerly known as Longacre Square, Times Square was renamed in 1904* *1. Nicknames are: The Great White Way The Crossroads of the World.* ___________________ Before we leave, we will go back again to absorb the atmosphere one more time. Let's move on to our next destination. ![Rockefeller Center.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbA9bpBWh8uon6of7GZCSy5AZg647tamuoZBtuBFk9upT/Rockefeller%20Center.jpg) The Rockefeller Center is near to the Time Square, so it was not a long walk. Do you know The Tonight Show hosted by Jimmy Fallon? Below you see their​ Youtube Channel trailer. This show is recorded in studio 6B in the Rockefeller Center. Its a complex building consisting of 19 commercial buildings. What we wanted was to go to the Top Of The Rock. But we got only tickets for a later visit. Because of that in the meantime, we decided to go to the Central Park. ![Central Park.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQma65ME1KnL2QSXk7AoQn1hoHCDpQ2UQroSy87XBZDhm41/Central%20Park.jpg) I know this park from the movie Kevin Alone In New York :D That was in my mind. We didn't find the way immediately, so sadly we made a big detour. Here some Central Park facts.

Central Park Fatcs

*1. The park was established in 1857 on 778 acres (315 ha) of land acquired by the city.* *1. In 1858, landscape architect Frederick Law Olmsted and architect/landscape designer Calvert Vaux won a design competition to improve and expand the park with a plan they titled the "Greensward Plan".* *1. Construction began the same year, and the park's first area was opened to the public in the winter of 1858.* ![Fith Avenue.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbGzCsZqdDBgVrYaqzXeoCcP5Yfons8DaZ7cfyeDK5KZb/Fith%20Avenue.jpg) From there we reached the Fifth Avenue. The most expensive street. All luxury brands are present there. We just did a window shopping or better my wife :D Also we needed to go back because it was time to go to the Top Of The Rock. ![Rockefeller back.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQimMFcri8RkmoZmxniwCV9hWxLEVkYjAcd7ZjyfTLX3q/Rockefeller%20back.jpg) Let me give you know some facts about the Rockefeller Center.

Rockefeller Facts

____________ *1. In 1928, the site's then-owner, Columbia University, leased the land to John D. Rockefeller Jr., who was the main person behind the complex's construction.* *1. Construction of Rockefeller Center started in 1931, and the first buildings opened in 1933. The core of the complex was completed by 1939.* ____________ ![Top Of the rock.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTpK8NGPHXD28CnaXAapPrA33YvLkHwYoXpEdxhZizS94/Top%20Of%20the%20rock.jpg) ![Top Of the Rock picture.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWY6GqVwxVNSHVng2f4L2v8sFNxqikmD2Csu4prHvrM3H/Top%20Of%20the%20Rock%20picture.jpg) It was the perfect destination to finish the day. Being at the Top Of the Rock during sunset and having this fantastic view over New York was precious. All people were literally fighting for a good place to take some photos :D Standing there and looking around had something majestic. The city radiates power. And even it was getting darker I had the feeling that this city is not going to sleep. Here my final shot! ![New York Skyline abend.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme8nbSeYzYpypZLm2VFLKfzChgtxPPGyy9Smf6dSac1Pn/New%20York%20Skyline%20abend.jpg) Yes, guys, these were our first days in New York. I am glad to be here and to explore this vast city. More is coming. Are you new to this post and maybe you are interested joining my Attention Contes?​ To learn more about that check out this [post](https://steemit.com/travel/@modernpastor/travel-with-me-chance-to-win-30-sbd).

Hey Steemians,

Today I prepare my first long post. We need to recover a bit because the last two days were really intensive. I wrote already one part of it, but let me tell you its just one part :D

I guess this will be the longest post I've ever made on this blog. But its also great for me, because while writing this I have the memories clear in front of me and that pleases me. I think that I will have this ready until tomorrow not sure but I think so.

**So be prepared my friend!**
Let me add something. I don't want that people later claim I was not fair. That here is the **Attention Contest** I chose this name, not for nothing.

But I can imagine how some of you may think: *Ah I will just read the previous posts again ;) than it will be easy!* 
No, my friend. It's not that easy! ;)
I will definitely erase some parts which include the correct answer. 
Means that you need to have the correct answer in your mind.

Just wanted to add that so that no one will feel betrayed. Don't worry I try to give everyone the same chances. Even the quiz, when I can call it that way will appear at similar times I posted every post so far. And I will announce it again before posting. Again I didn't choose the name for nothing ;) Also the previous posts are not unnecessary. That's it, guys! I think everything is said for a fair Contest of 30 SBD!☺️

The weekend is standing before of us. A reason for many people to be happy. And be happy. 😊

![Travel With Me #1.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPAoutDnoZUFgyA72HucKsBk9iTW7j6Yuyv3yJKehTw2u)

Hey Steemians,

I hope you all had a great start into this new week?

I am so excited guys because I am in the US.
Exactly I am in New York!

Since I was a child I wanted to visit the country.
But never I got the chance for that until now.
![Street NY.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUToonEMnrJbuWekw212YroP8aTDyYh2vcrCN78QQuDYD/Street%20NY.jpg)

I will try to keep it short because my wife and I have to go, exploring all corners of this city.

But I was also thinking how I can combine this stay here with something excited for you. And I got an idea.

![Attention Contest.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmd6bvAok7Yafvht3Bf6WZyTyW1iLkyoqrJr8bKvTAQ9Ak)


Yes, guys also during my stay here I will share posts with you.
I don't know what format it will be maybe its a post like that, maybe just a picture through Steepshot or maybe even a vlog we will see.

In the end, when I am back home I will ask you some questions about my stay here. The first one who answered all questions correctly will win 30 SBD. Yes, its a lot, but let me tell you that will not be easy. 

To be successful you have to be very attentive. I don't know how my posts I will publish we will see. Because I am in a different timezone it will make it easier for me to prepare a post without sacrificing my actual holiday :D This would be stupid. It doesn't matter if you are a follower or not everyone can participate. What you need is to be attentive and have a great memory.

I hope you understand what this **Attention Contest** is about.
If something is unclear to you feel free to ask a question in the comment selection below and when I have the time I will answer it.

Good luck to everyone 😁

![Ray NY.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcyD4bUEtuAtdpxgnN4e8HB61K91yDQqFbjkfFwQ9tHrF/Ray%20NY.jpg)

0.root_title: Real Madrid Has Won Again! Three Winners!
0.body:
![Madrid has won again.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbWg3qMgJBLV5itSgRWeeDfCJprUbZUb8xG4PH2UGk8na)

I am sorry for that what I will say right now.
Real Madrid the fish won again.

Sorry for my expression but when it comes to football sometimes I can't express it a different way. 

Ok, you probably noticed that I am not a Madrid fan.
I don't like Christiano Ronaldo.

He is an amazing player and his attitude when it comes to football is exemplary. He is the first who comes to the training and the last who goes. He deserves to be where he is now.

But, maybe it's not so visible for you when you watch a game but when I see him playing I am looking always at his body language how he treats his teammates. And when the course is not how he wants he is not a real leader. That's just my opinion. Also today for me he was invisible. Do you remember the run of Bale after his second goal? Ronaldo gesture was again: "Play the ball", but his action was really good.

I have so much to talk about but not now.

We have three winners.
Good job @andrea5 @olumideolowoyeye and @viktor1414
Your SBDs are on the way.

Thanks,​ everyone for participating and of course let me know what you think about the game?

![How I watch.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUPC6TtLUzH1ShAeuX2htYmiYX7qwTim834HLgMwvpBD3/How%20I%20watch.png)


Today many people will be sitting in front of the tv watching the champions league final. I am really excited about the game and honestly, I have to say that Liverpool will win this. I have to admit I don't really like Real Madrid because I am Team Messi 😁

My parents came here to me and we will watch the game together with unhealthy food. Because our season is over I can relax and enjoy it that way. **Chips, M&M's and of course bitter lemon. Maybe also a pizza** 🤣

In a final, everything can happen. I think from a psychological point of view Liverpool has the advantage. Who would have thought that they will make it to the final? They played an awesome season and I like the way how the play. Dynamic with Speed forward. 

But on the other hand, Real Madrid are very experienced. Not for nothing they are standing in the final again. And a Ronaldo is always dangerous; always! 

I think that Real will firstly have more ball possession. But Liverpool will have some good ball wins sand start their counter with Mane, Sallah and Firmino upfront. I say that they will score first through Mane.

But Real will show their experience and will score also before the first half ends. At the end I hope that we will see a game with many goals, at least I hope so. 

My tip for the game: **3:2 for Liverpool!** 🤔


![Win 5 SBD.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQma3soVamKMpcMfvmRmMUCH5DZ3tdkAuRytM1nCaszXuFU/Win%205%20SBD.png)

**What do you think?**

Your chance to win 5 SBD.
You just need to predict the right results :)

Good luck and happy watching😊

0.body:
![How To Pimp Your Blog Posts.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWYpNpJ9Xs2Jx581tyfvTtRUijHi5T33gDLn8qmgEw8nx/How%20To%20Pimp%20Your%20Blog%20Posts.png)

Today guys I want to show you one method how you can pimp your content.
I am sure that it will help your blog to add more flavour to it and makes you maybe stand out from the crowd. 

Yes, the idea is to show you how you can increase the pleasant feeling of your readers while they are reading your post. My title already revealed what I am talking about. 

![Create your own Headlines.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWCE2qfMGkN78P6zotojKzfS7x7qxKHB1Q5D3H9aAEqf1/Create%20your%20own%20Headlines.png)

Through Markdown we already have the possibility to structure and pimp our posts to a certain point.
Especially when you writing a longer text your readers will appreciate it when you structure the content. It makes it easier to read your post. But when using markdown isn't enough for you then this could be something for you.

As you know I use always my own headlines.
Maybe you asked yourself how I am doing it and you already looked for a tutorial however you did not find anything.

I will tell you how it works.

![Just Pictures.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTt9gDBaigP8REcWzeEijdrDKHLLu2ivsK9mA2FRxRbmU/Just%20Pictures.png)

Yes, my friends, my headlines are just pictures!
In the same way, my thumbnail includes a women of a picture my headlines are also just pictures. And you can do this too.

All you need is a graphics editor or a similar tool.

I use for example [Affinity Photo](https://affinity.serif.com/de/photo/). The native MacOs Version of Photoshop which certainly everyone knows. 
With tools like that,​ it's really simple to create headlines and much much more.

Yes, both applications are expensive and not everyone can afford it which is totally fine. There are other ways to go which can create​ the same results.

In one of my videos, I spoke about the software called [Gimp](https://www.gimp.org/).
It's also a graphics​ editor but for **free**. You can simply download it. If you are familiar with photoshop than it will be easy to use Gimp for creating headlines. For newbies,​ of course, it will take some time to understand and to learn how to use it.

But there is also a much easier way.

![Try It with Canva.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdZg29vPiTSu5WTsTxGwMYBn2Pk3kQmVTjsyhajc7GMU6/Try%20It%20with%20Canva.png)

I think many people know Canva. It's a free graphic design tool which offers already a lot of templates you can freely use. With Canva you can design anything! And creating headlines is not the main purpose​ of Canva but it is possible.

Let me quickly show you how it works.

You see in the screenshot below when you are already logged in.
Now it's​ important to create a custom blank templates with the right dimensions. I use following dimension in Affinity Photo: 3333x833

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-25 um 18.45.14.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUGVWobArxmRB4Q9tEv7g5hAryL1TvVcTrikZNAaHQXW9/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-25%20um%2018.45.14.png)

I tried many different dimensions in the first place but with these parameters,​ I am happy with.

When you use Canva you can take the exact parameters.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-25 um 18.49.01.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNtfGchbphW5B6A2bGbBU9ZGETmDgFnStpviHqFsxbh9B/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-25%20um%2018.49.01.png)

Now the blank templates pop​ up.
And here you can write your headline into it.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-25 um 18.50.27.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQWYyABMRM8v9ZRsSrAS7tmsaPfQ8j3kWjS2JCGA3PMUP/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-25%20um%2018.50.27.png)

You can change the colour there if you want it depends on your taste.

What is a bit disturbing is that you have to use the right Text font that fits in the dimension to fill the whole page. Dragging around will not work quite well its a downside but with a bit effort, you can create something amazing with that. I have to say that you are limited with your options compared to the other tools i mentioned above.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-25 um 18.52.58.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmP4sDAFPc2riqJgdmBT8hKpzQCcA3RpYi5oLPuZCsyJmb/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-25%20um%2018.52.58.png)

When you want to download your headline make sure to save it as PNG(Portable Network Graphic). This format allows exporting files with a transparent background. But for that, the export settings have to be set right. And that is not possible via Canva to adjust.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-25 um 18.54.42.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbtM13B4GFQwcC4JFW72xVd2AYQAynm6ThYTvL56f7cZj/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-25%20um%2018.54.42.png)

But even if it doesn't export it as a transparent file you still can use it also when you export in Jpeg. Because of the white background on Steemit, only your headline will be visible not the white background. The problem though is when someone uses the dark mode than your white background will be visible. A downside but not a dealbreaker in my opinion.

When you want to have full transparency even in the dark mode than you need to use tools like Gimp.
Don't forget its just a picture.


![Thats it.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPUcWsEkbx7v5yNPL5T7vy15jjmDpS5gQzEcvEWKTM6Jr/Thats%20it.png)

With that, you can create awesome headlines to pimp your posts a bit. But surely it's​ not for anyone. 
Don't​ forget that your main content is the most crucial part. Catching​ headlines are; I would call it decoration. But it gives you​ also the possibility​ to make your posts stand out. I hope this is useful for you guys.

If you have any questions then feel free to write them in the comment section below. Again A nice weekend :)
_______
<center>**Previous Posts!**</center>
________
[More Steemian Or Dtuber?](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/more-steemian-or-dtuber-what-do-you-prefer)|[How To Easily Find New Content](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/how-to-find-easily-new-content-get-inspired)|
-|-|
[![More Steemian Or Dtuber?.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcyWBtRRawUtFcN8Pi3G9Pk2ts5oa3WjY45yGUUk6pupU/More%20Steemian%20Or%20Dtuber?.png)](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/more-steemian-or-dtuber-what-do-you-prefer)| [![How to find new Content.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRVvwPCaHCQkq23KtjxWTY4FTPmG14vCxhYyAGHHt665x/How%20to%20find%20new%20Content.png)](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/how-to-find-easily-new-content-get-inspired)

[![Do That with your followers.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeNjFCeoMTPfbAqdRjpVZWy5FoiF8TQNuNJRTLUbNVJbZ/Do%20That%20with%20your%20followers.png)](https://d.tube/#!/v/modernpastor/x67gsgvn)

0.root_title: How To Find Easily New Content! Get Inspired!
0.body:
![How to find new Content.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRVvwPCaHCQkq23KtjxWTY4FTPmG14vCxhYyAGHHt665x/How%20to%20find%20new%20Content.png)

Do you know the point when you feel stuck? You don't know what to write about? I can imagine that every Steemian or Dtuber experience these moments. Especially when you are delivering content on a regular basis. 
______
It happens from time to time that you feel uninspired. And that is totally normal.
But I think that many people are doing some mistakes when they are getting to this point. I also believe that lies in our human nature that we always want to deliver and present the best, something no one did before. We want to be special, to make people astonish about our content.
_______
Well, let me say that this is not a bad attitude. Of course, we want to separate ourselves from others and that requires sometimes to have content that other people don't have. But the problem with that is when you only look from that kind of perspective.
_________
**What do I mean by that?**

When we just look for the great thing, for this awesome content and are stuck there, we miss simple opportunities to actually deliver content.
_______
Maybe I am describing it a bit complicated. 
What I mean is that you don't need you look for the great, outstanding content. There are simple suggestion right in front of you.
________

![Your own blog.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSFcZBKHgeyX2h4Q9dGmQW9UR6Ypj3xL8A2nCe1cvEWPN/Your%20own%20blog.png)

When you are already longer here than you probably wrote already a lot.
Don't forget that this platform evolves and you also.

*Maybe you see something different now compared to what you wrote a certain time ago.* 

*Maybe a situation changed and that's why you can write a new post about that topic*.

**You don't have to think that if you wrote once about something you cant write about it again. Rewriting stuff is a great way for old/new content.**

![The Community Itself.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS3bfyWXZgjJLBaQY2Bh68Z153PPnfbAMvc9ffYzdMXma/The%20Community%20Itself.png)

There is nothing new under the sun says the bible.
And yes its so true in my opinion.
____
Browsing through the categories here on Steemit, the new, hot and trending section can give you inspiration for a post of your own. In this Steemit ocean, you will find a lot of inspiration to write about.
______
Don't think because already one person wrote about something that you can't anymore. Its always good to have different views on a certain topic.
________
There are many sources to find new content to mention more of them would not fit here.
________
**What I want to show you is because you are already here, your inspiration can be right in front of you. Instead of thinking to produce the next Avengers Movie, look what is already there and create with that something new.**

I hope this gives you guidance to find new inspiration for your upcoming posts or Videos. :)
0.title: How To Find Easily New Content! Get Inspired!

0.root_title: HTC Plans Blockchain Based Smartphone! This Is Just The Beginning!
0.body:
![Blockchain based smartphone 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZt7g2vU1aiLxLzEGmKsaGduDumTnhtX2ATnLHQt2qyzE/Blockchain%20based%20smartphone%202.png)

Thanks to @steempapa who mention yesterday that HTC is planning to bring out a blockchain based smartphone I needed to do some research. Thanks for the mention @steempapa
_______
Observing the Blochain technology how companies are trying to disrupt existing markets like the Blockchain STEEM is doing with Steemit in the area of social media, my thoughts were already how this technology will find its ways into the tool we use today the most; Smartphones.

![HTC Exodus.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTXcE911BnDN1wRKGgpDN8omjwDYAMPrNYstyXD7ZhavC/HTC%20Exodus.png)

HTC is the first big brand trying to create blockchain based phone called HTC Exodus. It's not the first one in general but the first from a big brand. I guess they chose the name because of the biblical meaning. The Israeli people were kept for many many years in captive by the former world power Egypt.

Which could stand for the current centralised system, where our data don't really belong to us instead we are making the people on the top even richer by giving our data to them by using their products.

Moses who was called from God had the order to lead the people out of Egypt into a land where milk and honey flows, the decentralised system. This story is written in 2.Book of Mose called Exodus which could be translated​: *Going out of somewhere into something new and better.*

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-05-17 um 21.17.42.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQzyMBKpc6Tn8XwFoU5NkmwAJmMiv5vVapyBBtHDMprZf/Bildschirmfoto%202018-05-17%20um%2021.17.42.png)

OK, enough bible study lets go back to topic.😁
HTC sees the Exodus as a handset that will let owners keep their data -- and blockchain currencies -- private and secure on the device rather than in the cloud, where your sensitive information may be easier to extract and tamper with.

The Exodus phone will support decentralized applications, called DApps, run on Android software and have a universal wallet for storing your digital currencies. HTC says every phone will serve as its own blockchain node, part of the network that helps make blockchain systems secure.

![Opportunities for new players.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfY7Ffw9dLhgegH1KvTEJH1CgxDtNU8VVqJnJxgoKZjWa/Opportunities%20for%20new%20players.png)

When the Blockchain technology will be revolutionising, of course, one of the biggest markets have to be affected. This will bring new opportunities for new players.

For example; HTC will run on an Android software; maybe we will see a new major in term of a blockchain based OS.
For sure we'll see new App stores coming and and and.

![Take a look at steemit.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNPcGEnFEJQAMwDBqMW7mquebuvQeYLQ798wSZYkj9qLS/Take%20a%20look%20at%20steemit.png)

Look how much tools and applications are already built on this blockchain. This is crazy! 

I am really excited what the future will hold for us.
And we are already a part of it. 

It's just the beginning guys!

**What do you think about it?
Wish you all a nice weekend.**
0.title: HTC Plans Blockchain Based Smartphone! This Is Just The Beginning!

0.root_title: In 10 Years We Will See Bitcoins Full Potential!
0.body:
![Steve Wozniak.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYov1nzmvFir7UiMWNWHKKXWHeKiit8g7nFfVH6ipTSCh/Steve%20Wozniak.png)

Steve Wozniak, one of the founders of Apple, said that Bitcoin and the Blockchain technology would reach its full potential in a decade. Of course, all of us want to see that the Blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies move forward much quicker.
______________

One example is STEEM. I think it is still underrated. Just my opinion.
By the way: **The STEEM Blockchain was ranked as the second-best competitive Blockchain by the Chinese ministry.** Check out this post [here.](https://steemitstage.com/steem/@deanliu/hot-news-steem-blockchain-is-rated-as-the-2nd-most-competitive-public-blockchain-by-the-chinese-ministry)
_______________

Back to topic. One decade is not very much, and the question is what does **full potential** even mean? Is it equal to some predictions some people gave about bitcoin? I don't know. It's great to see that well-known people see more and more the advantages of Blockchain technology but not only that; Also to talk about it in a way which makes non-developers, for example, curious about this whole thing.

Jack Dorsey CEO of Square, for example, was more concrete with his statement in March: [**In 10 Years Bitcoin will be the only currency of the internet.**](https://www.cnbc.com/2018/03/21/jack-dorsey-expects-bitcoin-to-become-the-worlds-single-currency-in-about-10-years.html)

![1_AsLOk15xM9JyGmK_axOlaA.jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT3iFdPLk5fkudG7gJRYsHVkvykEHVKmRpNMERiVNQxJK/1_AsLOk15xM9JyGmK_axOlaA.jpeg)
[Source](https://blog.producthunt.com/jack-dorsey-the-man-behind-the-beard-28a00d24fe4d)

Notice that he said only currency, not cryptocurrency.
Bold statement!

No one knows what the future will hold for us. 

**What do you think where will Bitcoin/Cryptocurrencies and the Blochain technology be in 10 years?**
0.title: In 10 Years We Will See Bitcoins Full Potential!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: The Best Feeling You Can Have! Introducing Activity Gifts!
0.body:
![The Best feeling ever.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTiwqdAFeXpkExvky7yBGgJXkaDiroEhYfTmYLp8U6ZW3/The%20Best%20feeling%20ever.png)

There is one feeling which is, in my opinion, the best you can get. 
To explain it a bit better I have to go back a little bit.
_____
You have to know that my parents didn't have it easy as African immigrants. This counts of course not only for African immigrants I believe it is a challenge for any ethnic group of people coming in a different country for several reasons.
_____
But my parents fought to achieve a "normal" life. To enable my sister and I a good life.
With 17 years I signed my first professional contract. It was a great feeling for me to know that I am earning money now with that what I love. I think there is nothing better than earning money through your passion. For me as a believer its grace.
_________
**But this is not the feeling I mean!**
I will come to that in a second.
__________

With my possibilities, I was able to support my family a bit.
And I did that in a way my mother didn't see coming. She was everytime so happy when she discovered my gifts.

![The unexpected good.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRs4UxtGP1tHBbc8ypJSCiebGHwRiF9HAGGChiFZbh8bF/The%20unexpected%20good.png)

That's the feeling I am talking about guys.
I am someone who likes surprises. Of course good surprises.
____________

When you don't count on them, and they come; Damn amazing!
I love that feeling! Imagine you are waiting for something it seems that the job you wanted is given to another person, you don't expect the good thing anymore. But then, it comes from a direction you never expected. Your heart jumps, and you just want to make a loud scream. 

![Activity gifts.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdbP9cDPft6JGh1VwHjVdHXDRsbPGh99KSmH4y1htc76P/Activity%20gifts.png)

I was scrolling through comments of my last posts.
And I often see the same people over and over again which I really appreciate.
________
You remember when I told you that I was thinking to reward myself after becoming football champion with Redbull Salzburg in Austria?
________
I was also thinking how I can also make something good for others here on this platform.

It's not that I will start from today on, no, I already started, but I will do it now more aware.

**What does it exactly mean?**

I will review the profiles from the most engaging people on my posts, and when I don't upvote them myself I will feed a bot to make its thing ;)
_________
I hope with that to produce some unexpected happy faces. 
Yes, I will not see your faces, but the imagination is satisfying enough. 

Wish you all a lovely Sunday.
0.title: The Best Feeling You Can Have! Introducing Activity Gifts!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Journey To Cryptofit! What Sources Do You Use?
0.body:
![Journey Cryptofit.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmcDud1CtmSj9LNsMkZZUTadkyEuXX7GNzkQoXFpceU7wP)


I remember when I first got into the whole cryptocurrency thing.
And also when I bought my first bitcoins.

Through Steemit, I was dragged deeper into this new and exciting realm. It feels for me that every day I learn something new.

What I want to say is that this realm is so complex that it is impossible to get to know everything about that in a short time. 

Moreover, if it is not your top priority.
On youtube, cryptocurrency channels are popping up like mushrooms, and it's easy to get deceived by some people.

I don't suspect any of them of being up to no good, some of them just don't know it better. But Youtube is the number one source for me to get new knowledge about cryptocurrency.

One guy is ranked high on my list.

Dr.Julian Hosp. I think he is already well known here especially in the German community. I don't want to portrait him here right now when you don't know him I recommend to check his youtube channel out. Ah, he is also here on Steemit but not very active.
![DRuzFnoWkAE818y.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXcoqBvJSTYRJEGQHMWt5mPPryGZx2BgHFc1HzX5Hs6jE)

Anyway, he released a book called "**cryptocurrencies**." 
And I am reading it right now.
His goal is it to make people so-called **cryptofit**.

For me it's a good way to learn new things, things I didn't know until now so much in detail but also to refresh what I already know and all in one place. 

Right now I am at 60 percent; I know already that I will read this book at least two times. One of my goals is it to become really cryptofit; I truly believe that we are still at an early stage. And to be cryptofit can never be a disadvantage.

**What sources are you using to become cryptofit?**

0.root_title: You Don't Deserve To Win On Steemit!
0.body:
![You dont deserve to win.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUx77NUhMUL8o4SrXyn7kp9FexFrnSLSr3fzJa5kLgdLh)


Yesterday on the trip to Klagenfurt where we play today the cup final I watched a Youtube video of Peter Mckinnon.
I was caught by the title **YOU DESERVE TO LOSE​**  and saw a Gary Vaynerchuk​ on the thumbnail.
____________
Curious to know what this video is about I clicked on it.

Peter Mckinnon is one of my favourite YouTubers when it comes to photography and filmmaking. Also, he has a pleasant manner I like the way how he makes his videos but also how he acts in them.
![petermckinnon-eed48bc56eef0202ef65ff5c02aaa4e1.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSKQDSgn2cnVxQQrQgkiuWrobTrRsJhLzfB1AMp4pd1by)
[Source](https://kit.com/petermckinnon/vlog-life)
________

Gary Vaynerchuk or also called GaryVee is one of the biggest influencers​ when it comes to entrepreneurship, business and mindset. A well-known person who wrote several books already and he is a real social media beast.

<center>![1_35162.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmS543nowPMEnYyZddPWii5wEiePKLBxbHYqAZXcFFV1MU)</center>
[Source](https://www.firstsun.com/2016/07/30/leadership-dealt-massive-blow-11-tips-people-worst-professional-incident-key-biggest-success/)
_______

I have to make something clear at this point.
I appreciate this person and his work. He is an inspiration for so many people out there, but I don't agree with some statements of him. 

In the video Peter Mckinnon asked Gary following question:
___________
*When I started with youtube a good portion of my friends told me not try it, because it's already oversaturated, you missed the train; you're nearly thirty, you missed the boat. Tell me why you think that this, what my friends told me is bullshit?*
___________
I don't want to go too far I will link the video below.
But I want to focus on one point of his answer:

![Be carefull who gives you advice.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmbf3nC6uNMPYpGHvNGNoEpJPiqkZEL3iS3HWx3s1vZAY1)


**And I agree with that. 100%!**

Imagine Peter would have listened to his friends and didn't start his youtube career? He has now nearly 2 million Subscriber, and his online journey is running very well. We can call that a phenomenon ​because​ he gained great success on youtube in a very short time. But imagine when he would have listened to them?
To his friends!
And the reasons they gave wasn't​ so stupid.
___________
**Yes, Youtube is oversaturated. More and more people are producing and uploading​ videos.
Yes, there was a much better time to enter on this train.
Yes, maybe you are already too old for that.**
___________
Let's transform it to Steemit or any other platform where you think that you could make it. No, it doesn't​ count only for online activities it's​ even relevant when you are starting your offline business.
___________
![Start your journey.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYBMSPSWtZrnauLEcgCJ98XbqDB17CVNN5iJo76iYYWMx)

Guys, in the beginning, all of us don't know where we will be in **weeks**, **months** and **years.** But people who try have bigger chances to make it one day compared to those who are just watching. Waiting for the big hype.
________
The worst thing about all that is that those kind of advice are coming from friends, from people you expect to push you forward. ​From people,​ you think they have only the best for you in mind. No, in some cases are they your hurdle to your success.
________
Believe me; not everyone wants to see you succeed. Trying to drag you with toxic comments down. *Let's stay on this level, don't go too far.*
_______
Maybe you started here on Steemit with friends, or you are bringing friends to this plattform, but they see that you are doing well, that you are pressing forward and they are on the same place for **weeks**, **months** and **years**. Telling you than how bad everything is that the whole system sucks.
______
**Be careful who is giving you advice! Sometimes friends are not the best persons you should ask for their opinion.**
_________
**When you have this feeling inside of you trying to take this opportunity, and you don't try because people told you not to try than you don't deserve to win.**
________

What I am trying to say is that you should press forward, overcome every resistance even when they are coming from a well-known place. You can be the next hero here independently of your current status. You have the chance to create something big here or anywhere else.
_____________
I don't say that it will be easy, it will cost you something. But later it could be when you look back that you say to yourself: **Good that I didn't listen to them in the past.**

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NS_geT7TJUM" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<center>**Previous Posts**</center>

We Are Champions| Can This Be The Future? Bitcoin Smart Money!
-|-|
[![champions.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYYSSUmwCoQa3xF6aLKjAK5bJgPvCKQT1oQPQpcbCvQg9)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/we-are-austrian-champions)| [![Bitcoin Smart Money.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZ617592j4X8CxhBVmsy5h9M16r8GmUjRHdi3VkyK5aWe)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/can-this-be-the-future-bitcoin-smart-money)
