0.root_title: Can This Be The Future? Bitcoin Smart Money?
0.body:
![Bitcoin Smart Money.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZ617592j4X8CxhBVmsy5h9M16r8GmUjRHdi3VkyK5aWe)


Could you imagine to hold Bitcoin banknotes in your hand? The feeling of paper money in your hand but knowing the stored currency are bitcoins?
_________
Could you imagine to go to a store and pay actually with those banknotes? No euro or dollar?
___________
Well, the company named Tangem is specialised in creating smart bitcoin banknotes. They launched two of them in Singapore. The reason behind that: **To make dealing with cryptocurrency as easy as with fiat money.**
___________
**Until now they are two banknotes out. 0.01 and 0.05 Bitcoin.**

The headquarters are in ZUG(Switzerland) and Singapore.
The first time I heard about Zug was in combination with Appics. They also founded their company there. Seems to be a great place for blockchain based companies.

![How are they supposed.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmaTWUX4wbgFyKTdY5Xy3HKFt7fUq9RE2Hufbk2NUymSSS)

So according to the company it is supposed to be treated as fiat money.
You can check via NFC(Near Field Communication) if the banknotes have truly the stored bitcoin. In that way,​ you can check if the paper is valid.
![how-it-works-1392x896.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTU49zcKcDYgR6rxKWWKRjgUzix9oJBUaY2zt2wioRxzx)
[Source](https://news.bitcoin.com/bitcoin-smart-banknotes/)

The following passage is mostly copied from the site I have this:
_________
*Transferring ownership of the notes is anonymous and instant, Tangem claims. “Physically hand over the whole wallet together with the blockchain private key. No transaction fees, no need to await confirmation blockchain.” Moreover, the company says that its banknotes are equipped with “high-grade EAL6+ protection for all cryptocurrencies.* Don't ask me what this exactly means. The expert among us could bring light when they want to. *Irretrievable private keys prohibit replication of wallet and its assets.”*
__________
![Can it be future.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTysJ3sPfxB44NNj68j6D1JJD22f8VLc6ZuodaaA7LRfW)

Well, I don't know. Who knows?
It sounds to me interesting, but I have some questions about this use case when it comes to everyday use. 
___________
*1. When someone would spend these smart banknotes in a store, they need first to make sure if the note is valid. This happens as I said via NFC. This time could also be used to initiate the transaction directly with the smartphone. ​When I would pay with normal fiat money I think the payment process would be faster.*

*2. What if there are not exactly 0.05 BTC on the smart note​? Is it still usable then? Normally it should be as we know. But on the other hand for what then the different smart notes in the first place​ and not just one bitcoin smart note?*
____________
Of course, one advantage would be no transaction fees and also no long confirmation time, this could compensate point 1 if it can be used​ that way. But I am feeling better knowing my coins are digital and not in the form of paper. Just my personal​ opinion at this moment.
___________
**But let me hear what you think about the smart banknotes?**
0.title: Can This Be The Future? Bitcoin Smart Money?
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Do You Know The STEEM Messenger?
0.body:
![Messenger STEEM.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdUjFRy4bz8AqDmLP72yJLn8jTnXswkaqB6aZ5jymoTAN)


The STEEM ocean of tools is getting bigger and bigger.
And I found that a new addon is already in Beta.
Yes, I am talking about the **STEEM Messenger!**
__________
The same person who has developed Smartmarket released now the beta version of the STEEM Messenger; the witness @therealwolf.
_______
One reason I really like browsing the content here.
You often find something new coming. 
___________
Do you know what I also like?
To read the comments people made. Sometimes reading comments is like reading a funny book. 🤣
__________
So what is STEEM Messenger? I think its self-explanatory.
A tool to communicate with other steemians in a private area.

But I think none can better explain what is all about as the developer itself. For that check out his [post](https://busy.org/@therealwolf/introducing-steem-messenger-beta) about it.

![Did I use it alredy.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUyvnXrmtPqTNxwTqfAA2YipWW7SwciX8AGSLcdc9BX6Y)

No, I didn't.

I have to say that I am careful when it comes to using new tools. Did you hear about the **Steemconnect Hack**? 
_________
Nothing against the developer. I like your passion building new tools for this community; you know that😉. But objectively speaking, we need to be careful whom we give our keys. More an more applications and tools are coming but not everything is useful and on the other hand secure.
_______
What I am waiting for is a mobile application with a great user experience on the go. I hope to see that soon.

Did you already use the new Messenger? 
________
<center>**My last Video**</center>
________

[![A dreams end.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qme5kEzZuxrtCVoGyvNoBTh592XCTw88hhTboXdKy5Gjf1)](https://d.tube/#!/v/modernpastor/4vx8o2qi)

0.root_title: They Were Schocked When I Told Them About This App!
0.body:
![They were shocked.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWCi68PLd4AZGueXSDZiA82NPp69cN2PC8NTdgXA53crL)


I didn't tell you everything about the conversation I had with my teammates about STEEM and the Steemit community.

If you missed the previous post, I recommend reading this also. Just click on the thumbnail below.

[![Forget this Game.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmb8vCmLnPkB6qa8jjr7fjpdvnMAfmJBpXnMPTkRW4jSmJ)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/forget-this-game-be-a-steemer-instead)

After I realised that it is not easy to convince people to give Steemit a chance which I can totally understand because blogging is not for everyone.
__________

Even it is not necessarily required, but this is the image Steemit has;**a blogging site!**And people equate blogging with writing articles with a lot of words. Its the image of Steemit and honestly, in my opinion, it's difficult to present it to my teammates differently.
Honestly, I don't want it because it is a blogging site and there is nothing wrong with.
_______
I am convinced people can learn to use this site, but this is a hurdle not everyone wants to overcome.

But then I told them for example about Appics!
The first SMT(Smart Media Token) based application. Let us call it the decentralised version of Instagram.
_______
I could already imagine their reaction because Instagram is the number one social media my teammates are using. Especially the story feature. Oh, my god, they love it. Sometimes I am telling them to put some more aesthetic effort into their stories because I get eye cancer when I see how bad they are🤣. 
________
But when I told them about Appics, I got more attention.
![xphone.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmbut1tZ4z57EC4LGj8EnJ414F6YiXKHWkaXrfVhTZBqEY)

________
**Someone asked:** *What? I get money when I post pictures?*

**Me:** You can. It's not guaranteed. You have to build a following there or better bring your followers from Instagram with you. When people give you a Like than they give you a monetary value depending on their voting power. A like is not a heart like on Instagram​, it is money.*

**Teammates:** *Ray how is that possible? I post a picture and earn money?*
_________
I explained them the system again, and they finally understood.
![image_03.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWkkRwLt4o8HM5bWWe98sTsdRLDMosECjYBDsSCiS2Fay)

**Teammate:** *Yeah, this is much better than this blogging site. This is better for people like us.*
________
What he meant with **people like us** was that it is simple to use. You don't need to know how to play with words in a contribution.  You don't​ have to make some researchers​s for the next post. There counts more the visual aspect. You just need your phone!
________
If you are following me, you know that I find Appics as a really interesting project. But it's not available yet and when it's​ launching this application needs to prove itself first. Real world and theory are two different things.
_________
But my Teammates told me, when I will find it enjoyable, they will give it a try. And who knows maybe they find their way through Appics also to Steemit. But they were really shocked​ when I told them about it.
________
Have in mind that both applications are not against each other. No, they are supporting each other. I call it an own ecosystem within the STEEM ecosystem.

I love to see that more and more application already exist and are coming based on STEEM. I am excited to see where this whole will go.

**What do you think?**

0.root_title: Forget This Game! Be A Steemer Instead
0.body:
![Forget this Game.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmb8vCmLnPkB6qa8jjr7fjpdvnMAfmJBpXnMPTkRW4jSmJ)


When the cryptocurrencies began to rise last week we discussed this also in our team. We have some people who have invested in Bitcoin and some other altcoins.

But fast the topic of cryptocurrency changed into a discussion of gaming. Don't ask me how this happened 😁.

My guys were talking about the game everyone is talking the last time.**Fortnite!** Maybe you heard of it, or you play it yourself. I have to admit that I never tried this game. Ok, let me say that I am not the type of gamer. 
![thumb-1920-877849.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWBSHy59QTVvz76K2BPxNkT75Rf4nN46tarx2u2Uv44j2)
[Source](https://wall.alphacoders.com/big.php?i=877849&lang=German)

When I was younger, I played a lot of PlayStation. But if you are married many things changes 😅
__________
Anyway back to topic.  I can't testify if this game is worth the hype or not but I thought when I heard them talking how much hours they play I told them: **Guys invest your time better into Steemit? You remember I told you about STEEM and Steemit.**

Answer: **Ah this weird blogging site. We are not bloggers that's why its nothing for me. Ray, you are different.**
_______________

![More than blogging.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdF4RtcX9Gr6ecaucspim2kCpmFTyAQJjPZaGADk395Qm)


The STEEM Blockchain is a pretty versatile blockchain when I can express it that way.
What I mean is that you don't have actually to be a blogger to participate in the ecosystem. 
_________
Let's think just about the possibility to earn via curation.
You don't have to necessarily write own contributions. Some people here are earning good via curation.
_________
But what is more interesting for people like them could be the view from the investor perspective. To see and realising the opportunities of a decentralized social media platform that pays four your activities. But this formulation isn't accurate in my opinion.
______
**It's a decentralized social media platform​ where you **COULD** get rewarded.** 
_______
But still better than never!
Believing that ​STEEM will increase in value over time. In my opinion, it is undervalued.
_______
![Not so easy.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmV9byFA9Wn3hSZAFLSphnePXwMniHSLFPoq42Uo5Tad1t)


But it is not easy to put your money into something when you are not familiar with the system or convinced that it can be huge in the future. It takes time to learn about that. I mean in my case it was the same. Every Investment is a risk. But regardless of that it is, or let me better say that it could be a promising investment.
______________

I thought about the conversation​ I​ had with my teammates a while longer: They are spending so many hours with this game and are gaining nothing. It makes fun of course, and we need times where we just relax and do something just for our soul. But I am not talking about that. It's more that you put most of the day into this or other games. 

![_39142.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmQ2rkuQxJ8PTJWaS1q8ArhtRvG85Q6BmQsJ5DbcGEWr9A)
[Source](http://www.iran-daily.com/News/139575.html)
__________
**Imagine you would invest this time into Steemit?**

Guys, we never know where all this will be in few years, but just imagine how all this, the whole STEEM Ecosystem could bring a major change. And the effects of that could be shown in different ways.
____________

![What I understood.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmahJ7vrzLsEBy4s53MdTKPo4h87LP2LQjedz2cdE2QekR)

You can't take your thinking as the benchmark for other people.
I think this is important to know when you try to bring people to Steemit. If we want or not, there are several hurdles people need to overcome.
________
To speak from their perspective, explaining and showing them the bigger picture and how they can benefit is a key. Because the whole Blockchain realm is something, you don't understand in a short time.
________
On the other hand, Steemit is not for everyone; this is something we also need to know and to respect.

I want to close again with the question: **Imagine where all this could be in few years? What do you feel when you think about that question?**

Or which Interface are you using the most?

Hey Steemians,

I hope you did all well today.
You know what the worst thing about an away match is?
The trip to that place. 

Believe me,​ it will become stressful when you have to travel every second week. Often we sit hours in the bus. And days like today are always long days. 

![IMG_2255.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmW5LTytUCgAacLFSH59vZ2bkfBYTXRES5BeqNJwA4qomy)

I know that there are even more worst things in life. No, I am glad about my Job :)
Our charter already ready.

![IMG_2262.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVBBiNFsQYwh1RtFhiNMdFbDgor9QgvfC8HBijQ6qAsZF)

Of course,​ the​ black crew have to snap a picture 😁

![IMG_2268.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYCrMp25mo5DRgqrn5w9b9J7ksCsQxq8v56h1ADSo5aA4)

An awesome view. Good that the flight time is not so long.

![IMG_2277.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSTuQjfhsjFzbbSUb4aGYP9KcjWYWvoZEy8t8PUo1Ldbp)

And as always an amazing hotel!

![IMG_2276.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmNy3Gh52jke1UWsfp9sbdPJFxRnBWpF4kywwpgk8knRUw)

![IMG_2277.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSTuQjfhsjFzbbSUb4aGYP9KcjWYWvoZEy8t8PUo1Ldbp)

![IMG_2271.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmQ3VGx2Ww6EFKaxsRZJ1PLFD3wiLdfd8p98uhbKxRvUSf)

This is the view when we get out of the hotel ready to have the last training.

![IMG_2273.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZTJgFL9vGAteEbxjDFf4DipzpKufhuuFcU5hQAmtWoN1)

![Stade_Vélodrome_(20150405).jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUmhdwBUG1QQSncw2ado88V59nBwWngNXbg6Tbc4aXibF)

And tomorrow we expect that the atmosphere will be like that.

I'm really excited about tomorrow 😁

Hey Steemians,

Yesterday I wanted to write and give you a dose of motivation for this week but had, unfortunately, no time for that. 

But you know what? I think it is also not necessary. I think this week started for everyone in a good way when we look at the rising prices. Am I right?

<center>![Grizzly_(Bear)_transparent.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbWUbKCXU3KzxAKKRD4GKFCxvKPh1K6DE74eTYke47PUy)</center>


We were so long in a bear market, and the emphasis here is on **long**. But it is how it is ladies and gentlemen. We do researches as best as we can, but no one here is God to know what exactly will happen. We can see some indicators and make based on them our decisions. But at the end, we need patient, faith and hope.

Yes, guys **faith** and **hope**.
Let's have this. 

Wish you all a great week also outside of the cryptocurrency realm :)
_________

0.root_title: Road To Champion! Big Step Forward!
0.body:
![Road to Champion.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTzuYfgSyXsK2hP4ducmKNrhaSq3At2UC2E8x1QKBkZZg)

Today we made a big step to the ​Austrian championship title.
Yesterday our closest competitor Sturm Graz lost. It was a chance to extend the distance between us.

Eight points ahead is already a good lead, but eleven points ahead is much better. Everyone who knows a bit about football knows that everything is possible. That's why we took it today serious as always and won against Altach 3:1.
![IMG_2243.JPG](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdZTzRwdt4DSdYXBVNwDmxe4WG8bAMAUCQz16qcfSHK8V)

Only five games remain till the finish of the season.
I am much confident that also this year we will be the Austrian champions.
![IMG_2244.JPG](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmaWDDBE9hzQiVrx9v7xqmXfX7BBLVTNsvFGh1GfPBXGHH)

But now our biggest challenge is in front of us.
On Thursday we play the first Europe league game against in Marseille. Until now we are breaking all records and imagine we would defeat them and enter the final! 

Oh, my God, this would be really far beyond my imagination. 
But when we look what we already delivered this season, it would be not a  big surprise. We will see.

0.root_title: The Real Problem You Might Have With The Trending Page!
0.body:
![The real trending page problem thumb.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZfKhuz5Ch1Z1seaPip9TTW3G4iKCY6qw4kvBhJmcqS1h)


**Pastor time Steemians!**

Today with a maybe explosive topic as you saw in the title. In this post, I want to handle the real problem steemians might have with the trending section. Honestly, after reading more contributions about that and also the comments from Steemians I believe there could be much deeper problems as people admit.

The first time I wrote about that topic with a different focus in the following contribution. There I presented also a solution for a maybe better trending page.
[![Is Steemit going down?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWqYR8ugjEV7TTMnLai5CTKiFDLVMoqHGAgFJ3shtV5qL)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/is-steemit-going-down-read-what-i-think-maybe-you-see-it-the-same-way)

Let me give you a disclaimer up front: *I am not taking a side; I am not presenting the true reasons. The purpose of this post is to lead you to think on a deeper level. To ask questions, not to present the solutions. Also,​ I believe that this post could be valuable​ for many people because of that this post will be boosted after 30 minutes! ,​Ok Let's dive in.*

![Ask yourself.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmNmTDCDEjKfPzGrc17R3vB3mWeQhGnG6UKp1iJD7wLQZt)


When people are facing a problem, a problem or condition which drags on the first thing the human nature does is to look for the cause by others. This is normal but bad behaviour. 
______
*When this guy would not have said this than​ I...​
When my wife would have simply done what I said than I...
When this system would be different I...*
_________
Let me tell you; you could be right. It could be really that way. But that's not the point. It is something you can't actively influence. What people often overlook is the process of searching for the actual, real problem.

Often the first condition or cause is not revealing the real problem you have with something or someone.

What helps to solve this dilemma is to ask questions. Sounds weird? Allow me to show you what I mean.

![Real problem tredning.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZJ4tJNMebP1knhEe51ddooWoLuFrqNXFRxoTB8iGeo62)


I will present some often used answers, and then let's have a closer look.

**1. The trending page is broken because often low-quality content is boosted by bots into this section and the valuable content is not getting the attention it deserves.**

First of all, let me say that this answer is in general not wrong.
But to give this answer a general scope is definitely wrong.
Why?

The question of quality is subjective. For you, posts on the trending page could be of low quality, but that doesn't mean it is exactly like that for everybody else.

When it is raining where you are than it is also raining for everybody else around you. But the judgment of quality is a subjective matter. Here the screenshot from the actual trending page. 

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-04-19 um 18.41.08.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPidCjwB6dJw1bX4mWEq4VVy5iBH9CynB9xqumnNWc1ph)

Honestly, I can't say that one of them is of low quality. I will not say that I find everything interesting but of low quality? Hmm, I doubt that.

**My advise for this answer**: *Don't make your subjective opinion a law for everybody else and believe they think the same as you. Your opinion is just your opinion. It's highly precious but it's your opinion*. 

Let us move on to the second often read answer.

**2. Often authors are there with multiple posts.**

This reason is for me simple to defuse.
Where do you get the imagination from that an author can only be with one post on the trending page?

Same as before; You think that this should not be that way and this is totally fine. It's your right, and we have to respect that. But you can't give your opinion a general scope unless there is a law that says an author can only be with one post on the trending page. From what I know a law like that doesn't exist. It doesn't mean that this would solve some of the problems, but again, it's your opinion.

**My advise here**: *Again, don't give your opinion a general scope. An author can be with multiple posts on the trending page. Why not?*

Let me add something. This reasoning is a good example of hiding the actual meaning. I will come to that later.

The third often read answer and this is the most important one and includes every reason I mentioned before.

**3. All posts on the trending page are just boosted there with bid bots. How can this be good? It's says nothing about the quality of a post.**

It sounds similar to the first one but here the emphasis is not **boosted** not like in the first one **low-quality**
![Perception.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZFLaXRVDdqvVdqCBTMBFvSVPmPitftsdAqitAinRqtks)


Here I have to elaborate a bit more.
You know much has to do with perception. How you see something or which perspective you are looking at.

Yes, most contributions are boosted into this section, and yes, they are getting the most exposure. The current trending page doesn't show the best, original, unique content what many people think should include me. It shows the posts, which fulfils the current parameters to get there. And this is which posts get high upvotes in a specif amount of time! And there the bid bots come in. 

![Promoted Posts.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTfgQivthEY7zwXx6a3r4iSJw2n9cdmCzgqLZ25X4qMyC)


For me, the trending page is a section of advertised contributions. I think like that. To advertise in general is nothing wrong with. Our whole economy works with advertising. With that in mind, I can never be frustrated because I know it has nothing to do with the actual content. 

Here comes one problem. You see those people over and over again there, and you see the high pending rewards and can't believe that it is like that.

My question: **Would you think the same way when the trending page would always be filled with brands like Coca-Cola, Aidas, Nike, Redbull, Mc Donalds?**
![brands.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRLkkAoEwkywyZa5Uchex7tmgbYji8Vb27jAfNbAef6iu)


I can imagine that it could be that you would not see it the same way as you maybe do now. And again I have to say that I'm not saying that it is for sure like that.

This is what I mean with perception. You perceive brands differently than normal people like you and me. 
By Brands, you could think: *Yes, they have the resources to advertise their articles on the trending page, because they want to generate sales or whatever.*

Look, maybe you even chose a different word. Advertise not boosted. 

So now you see people like yourself, no brand nothing special but they are always on the trending page. People like you and me. You perceive these people totally differently. And for that, you might judge differently. You start comparing yourself with them. Again I'm saying that it could, not that it is.

By those people, you don't see it as advertisement you see it as boosted, something evil. A tool which helps them to get there not because they deserve it because they have more resources. 

**STOP!**

Now we are coming closer friends.
Nike, Adidas, Redbull, Mc Donalds Coca-Cola have resources you don't have, but what if there are people here on Steemit who also have resources you don't have and are using them? People you are inwardly comparing with.

Could it be that your frustration is revealing a Problem **you have** and not the system? By the way, a system can have errors for sure and also the Steemit system is not water prove but let's focus on you. 
___________
**What is the real problem with the boosted trending page?**
Could it be that the real problem is that you don't have what those have? You don't have the resources to boost yourself up there and getting much more exposure maybe new readers, more upvotes, more comments, more followers?
__________
So the real problem could not be low-quality posts, also not the authors there with multiple posts, also not that they are boosted in a system which allows that. No, the real problem with the trending page could be that you don't have the resources to get there. Or simply expressed: **You want what other people have!**And maybe you are trying to cover this with reasons which sound noble but are not your real problem.

We are moving in the area of greed and envy people.
People, these evil​ feelings​ already triggered wars in history. And we see some of them here.

![Ballon D'or.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRNvEzpvaZMKUpseuWp1ugZkHZBSgscBceLiSsiPvFx3f)


The last decade the Ballon D'or(Highest award in professional football) went to only two players. Lionel Messi and Christiano Ronaldo. What should other amazing players say? The system is unfair! Make it like this; **A player can't win the Ballon door in a row**. 
![lionel_messi__cristiano_ronaldo__by_shibilymv7-daqtlg5.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmcXL5uzoh8NddEc3HExtyqY71811P3xzePu4rcUUVaJaL)

Guys c'mon. It's not how it works. Those two players have skills and resources​ and are using​ them year after year. Both of them have the privilege two play in the best teams of the world. Imagine Lionel Messi even from his very beginning. Imagine he would have started by Borussia Dortmund for example, his career would have been different maybe he would never have gotten the Ballon D'or.
![cristiano-ronaldo-ou-messi-jardim-nous-donne.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRoTiA194n2FC8MhQGntxasgrtbSWt71YGqeby3gXeBZg)

But it is like it is folks.

We have to accept that there will always be people who have something we don't have. But this doesn't make everything else unfair. And we are not getting a solution by always complaining and playing Steemit police. Instead, we should focus on that what we have, and how we can use it to make the best out of it. And people already proved that it works even without being a whale or dolphin. 
________
Don't get me, wrong guys. As I said, in the beginning, I am not here to take a side. I am trying maybe to reveal the actual problem. I also believe that we need a more content-oriented trending page with different parameters. I believe that many things need to be improved. Also that it is neccessary when we see some grievances​ to bring the attention to that and to talk about it. But in a respectful way. 

The one you're complaining about doesn't even know you. Maybe. But you are wasting your energy. I want that you learn to enjoy your Steemit journey even there are many things lacking or people not playing right in your opinion or maybe really.

![Back to perception.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmb41NGsqhoRYjsehVFtyS3a7EYWmDhDXyPJxhJ1ZvdP1w)


Maybe you came here and you thought that everyone has the same chance of earning money. Then you realize that it isn't that way and you become bitter. Let's change how we perceive things here on this platform for your own good. Let's take what we have and this is in every case different an move on.
__________
Not everyone has the same starting position but let me tell you something​.
**Winning from the pole position is an advantage but it's not a story. Starting from far behind and then having​ a pole position is a way ​better story. And I believe that it is possible.**
​
![MP Banner.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdNrk1Qw6Kx7dJY2t1ovEqd8RS3SDX2LeuJYZri9YLa5T)

<center>**Again if you want to read the previous post with a different focus.**</center>
[![Is Steemit going down?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWqYR8ugjEV7TTMnLai5CTKiFDLVMoqHGAgFJ3shtV5qL)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/is-steemit-going-down-read-what-i-think-maybe-you-see-it-the-same-way)
0.title: The Real Problem You Might Have With The Trending Page!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Let's Talk About ONO! Will It Be A Steemit Killer?
0.body:
![Lets talk about ono.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWH59rmdZBGN5PE7G4ggnSpRpQD46aqubPt6brbb3KCZ8)


Steemians its time to talk about ONO.
I heard of this new social network based on the EOS blockchain by time. The first time I heard about ONO was; hmm around a month ago. I didn't give it so much attention.

Again and again, I saw posts about ONO on my feed.
Last week I read one contribution from @uwelang about that. So then​ I knew I have to take this seriously​.

![1_vwrcVULOG4j52d1qTxruIA.jpeg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPwxRenbzZxfJLTU71GWwswVSCvxt3aRQXDm5cT1S37rc)
[Source](https://hackernoon.com/meet-ke-xu-%E5%BE%90%E5%8F%AF-cryptodogs-creator-ceo-and-founder-of-ono-a-social-network-launching-on-eos-dba1c7d02dea) <center>Ke Xu Founder of ONO</center>


Yesterday I read a post of @tarazkp where he shared his thoughts about that people are: let me say promoting other networks which could become competitors to Steemit. He didn't explicitly mention ONO, but than @stellabelle shared sooooo much about ONO, so I​ was sure that this network was meant, and also I couldn't ignore it anymore. 

When not Steemit or Dtube there was until now only one more social network I was talking about. You know which one I mean. Appics! Right. By the way, the last ICO round starts soon.

Now ONO now join in too.

This post should not be where I give you a lot of information about that new social network. Because simply I don't know so much about it at this particular moment. I hope really to get some useful information from you guys. 

I already started to read the whitepaper, but until now I didn't come so far.

![What Is Ono?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmaTyfQCmqhsFn4L4KnDi5WFxzdj4Tp953kV7RT8qyHX5S)

I am trying not to copy the whitepaper but to explain it in my own words. 

From what I saw until now its as I mention a social network based on EOS. From the design and functionality, it remembers more to a  real social network compared to Steemit.

**Let me clarify**: Steemit is for me more a blogger site. ONO looks for me more like Facebook. An every moment usable social network.

You can post updates, pictures and your location for example. Later a video function will be added as well.

It is already launched in China. In June the international rollout is planned to be. Below I will link a Dtube video where you can see the application live.

What I found interesting is that you already have an integrated messaging system to chat with other users. Something that lets you connect with other on a deeper basis. I would appreciate seeing​ this also here on Steemit.

![No ICO.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTMBJXFnBjsnGgyWvL7BSeooLbTZsaxERvWopmfB2Vdok)


This indeed is also a sensational move in the hype of ICO'S
But why there is no ICO? I can't give you a clear answer. Maybe you have one. I think it has to do with her character and her vision for this social network. 
![DQmPzmnFJJausDxMqxmahmHEi7mXh5GjpDUCU4E92qRzWuL.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmbv1DfZGGuD7Hg9fxjafcoFN49GGHNSTQjsFSviCrapAP)

That also means that finances​ will not determine the power of an account. And that it what Ke Xu(the founder) proclaim​: **Equality!** A daring Statement! Something many people here complain and let me say that I can understand some.

At this point,​ I don't want to say more about it, because as I mention I don't know so much. 

**The Big Question.**

![Steemit Killer?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZiyE8uhwgxTAvDXonVw8tRYCs2pgGiwV9XffH1uU4saP)


Well, I do not know to answer this question accurately​.
From my current point, I don't see ONO really as a Steemit competitor even it is not built on the same Blockchain.

ONO for me has a different alignment starting that there will be nothing like STEEMPOWER there will be no room for complaining about whales. But also this application as I also said about Appics has to prove itself. But for me, it sounds quite interesting but needs to learn more about that.

Do I see it as a Steemit killer?
Right now, **no!**

Again the whole space is still in its infancy​. But there Steemit has still the **First Mover** advantage.
We have seen it a lot of times in traditional​ companies that the **First Mover** advantage is never a guarantee​. And yes, it is exactly like that. It's not a guarantee​ but it's an advantage if it is played right it could happen that the lead is difficult to catch up. 

As I said before both ONO and especially ​all other applications which are standing in the pipeline needs to prove themselves​ in the real world. But everything​ is possible, ​especially​ in the crypto space​. 
I have high​ respect​ for the founder and the team for their vision and I'm excited to see where this will lead. 

**What do you know about it? How are your feelings?​ Let me know in the comment section.**​​​
0.title: Let's Talk About ONO! Will It Be A Steemit Killer?
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Steemit I Think We Need Awards For Creators! What Do You Think?
0.body:
![Creator of the decade.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVEs713PXenoj8CST2xCNAYtavx53taQtzJnrqE6LsCwU)


Hey, guys, there was a time where I made a post about some people and asked you if you know them. Some of you did. They were some Youtubers I am following. And one of them Marques Brownlee known as MKBHD got rewarded as the **Creator of the Decade!**

Again guys! He got rewarded as the **creator of the decade.**

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hvEwUW9FMLg" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Ok, ok I can understand when you are not impressed, especially when you don’t know him. MKBHD is a Tec Youtuber. All his videos are related to tec related Products like Smartphones, Notebooks, Camera gear etc. Tools a modern creator needs or could need in our days.

![maxresdefault (3).jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdbCRSVNZbP6hiYC2iXsfaF1FzBcBKFJZ8VaxF5pgxkZN)
[source](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GIN-hALDxHs)

He started over ten years ago creating YouTube videos led by his passion to create Videos about Tec related products. Back then he didn’t know that one day he will be such a big influencer and earning money with that. Two things I want to highlight.

![Passion Driven.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWiHpXRur68QCXQ9t5N6ZYEm8a3rm5V3HD7TZ4sZMzPb5)


In my opinion, he is a great example how far your passion can bring you. Without thinking about money or another kind of rewards, just following your passion and sharing that with others. Not only that also his patience to do this for such a long time. 

Of course, a time came where he earned money and realised the potential of YouTube which for sure motivates him, but the first years I think there were not big earnings. If you know it better, feel free to correct me, my friend.

![Steemit Awards?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXJWo8jAoLc7ssCFju2J3RzwjdHogqSGzbJ9xTBf5rpu2)


As I saw his latest video yesterday, I thought that we here on Steemit also need awards. I know that already author challenges exist which is good. But I mean something bigger, where only the content counts and of course with an attractive prize to win. For example 500 STEEM for the first place? Sounds huge? But I think that would be an interesting motivation. 😏

In my imagination, it is like the witness voting.
People can vote for their creator of the year for example. Keep in mind these are just raw thoughts. Nothing seriously worked out yet. 

In my opinion, this would need a separate interface where we can see the different creators in a specific way. And there people can vote for them. **STEEM Power doesn’t matter. How much STEEM you have doesn’t matter** just how good you are in creating​ and of course how good can you promote yourself that people vote for you. I know this could be a difficult part to execute in a way that even a newbie would have a chance.

I think if I would have the time this is something I would try to execute on this platform. 

Or a Steemit/Dtube trophy when someone reached a certain amount of followers(YouTube play button), yes, I know it doesn’t mean really something. I hope that will change in the future and it will when more people are finding their way into this community and the stay here.

![Header-Shortys.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSWbjGqMzVTBTbhoZhCNbwEpoYR1vLN6i121GFg4pXpxi)
[source](http://www.vikings.com/news/article-1/Vikings-Receive-Esteemed-Shorty-Award-in-Recognition-of-Vinekings-Program/9664b7d2-aaff-486c-8a6b-0d7e4f613d28)

Just some thoughts I want to share with you guys.
What do you say? Let me know it in the comment section below.
__________
<center>**Do you want to know a bit more about me?
I answered some questions Steemians asked​ me. When you are interested just click on the thumbnail below.**</center>
___________
[![AMA Answers.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYWGJ9Cfa9RoqGU9o8qvqtLyfmxPYuTgvwXb2RRRADQKm)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/my-first-ama-here-my-answers)
0.title: Steemit I Think We Need Awards For Creators! What Do You Think?
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: My First AMA! Here My Answers!
0.body:
![AMA Answers.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYWGJ9Cfa9RoqGU9o8qvqtLyfmxPYuTgvwXb2RRRADQKm)


So Steemians here are my answers to your questions.
___________
### @gandhibaba asked: How do you feel when your team lost a match?
__________

Well, losing is part of the game, business​ and also part of life.
Of course, we want to win every game even in training we are trying every time to win every time, but it's not possible. 

Losing though never feels great. And losing important games even more.
___________
### @sequentialvibe asked: How are the parties on the road :)
____________

Depends how important the game was. When it was a really important win, the music is on all the time. In the bus, we have not so much space to celebrate hilariously. But often it was so hard that everyone sleeps^^ 
___________
### @tanbay asked: What was your favourite moment during your football career.
___________
I think this was winning the Under 17 European Championship in Germany. This was such a great moment. And I was the captain of that team :D!
_________
### @frank1in asked several questions :D: How did you become a football player? So how did you become a member of your team? How long have you been playing football? What is your main goal in football?
__________

Some of those questions I cant answer with just a few sentences. For that, I would need more words. One day I will make a post about that, hope that is ok? I am playing football since I am three years old. How I got a member of RB Salzburg? Well,​ they wanted me. And for me,​ it was a great next step in my career.
__________
### @ibrah87 asked: What are your relationship with rival players? Do you usually hang out? Do you call each other?
_________
So we always try to separate business from personal matters. Means on the pitch we are maybe rivals but when we are playing on​ the same team we need to function together.
Only 11 Players can start that means that not everyone can play but everyone wants to play. On the Pitch, we are one family, in training we trying to show the coach that we are better than our rival.

Often we hang out mostly after a training session. And yes, we call each other by time.
_____________
### @infinityroad asked: Is there apart from football other types of sports you like and do in your free time?
________
I like playing badminton or swimming. But mostly I am doing it not in my free time rather in the holidays. Do you call dancing a sport? ;) If yes, then​ this is also something I like to do or better liked because I'm doing it no more so often.
___________
### @theaustrianguy and @rehan12 asked a similar question: If you would not be a professional soccer player, what would you do for a living?
___________
So, this is also not easy to answer. In young ages, I knew already that I wanted to become a professional football player, that led​ my decision back then. Also, the alignment of the school I​ visited was helping us to reach our goals, of course, we were often talking about a plan B but plan A was so present in me that plan B was at that time not an option.

It would have been different when the dream becoming a professional football player never existed. Then my whole youth would have been different. 

I think I would have also chosen a creative way. Becoming an actor for example. Or I could imagine that I would have studied law trying to become a lawyer. But with my mindset today back in the age of 13 and without wanting to become​ a professional football player, I think the path would be clear. Interested to know?
_____________
### @coolguy123 and @solcross asked: What is the meaning behind my username?
____________
Well, I got this questions now a lot of times, and I think it's worth writing about more in detail. The short answer: I was thinking like everyone else about a fitting username. But what I didn't know was that I couldn't change it after. Yes, I am a Christian believer now for over ten years. I have seen some wars within Christianity. So the last part of my name is inspired by my belief. But honestly,​ it was first​​ meant as a joke!
_________
### @altafwani asked: what inspired you to join Steemit?
________
Honestly, it was curiosity. When I heard the first time about a blogging site that pays you, I had to try this out. I have a blogging past. Writing​ is not new to me. And because​ of that,​ it sounded really interesting​. Also the fact that you get paid​ in cryptocurrency. 
_____________
### @hopeabdulrahman asked: what steps did you take that got you so far on Steemit? Please share your secrets.
_________
Tough question brother. First of all, thanks to you that you see it that way. Well, I would say it's not because of only one thing. It's an interaction of different factors coming together.
Short I would describe it that way: **Do everything you can do on this platform then you're on the right track.** Often people are not using the full potential of this site. At least in my opinion. 

Also, this deserves a more detailed contribution.
__________
### @blessed-girl asked a long question about a basic Steemit question. Also, @sawi asked it in a similar way.
_________
So, It's a complex system and especially for newbies difficult to understand. The short answer. The sooner you find a post and upvote it and also this post will have a high reward the bigger the curation reward for you. It's like who finds the treasure(post) soon and give it an early upvote. People who upvote later will get a smaller curation compared to the early curator.

And Yes, of course, your SP also plays a role. But for that, also better a more detailed post.
__________
### ayahlistic asked: Okay bro here comes my question. Have you ever cheated on your partner?
__________
Well, I think this question appears because of a specific imagination about football players right ;)?
I can proudly say that until now I've never cheated my wife and I hope it will stay like that. I am married for almost 4 years now and my son has just​ turned one year. 
_______

I hope I could answer all your questions to your satisfaction?
It was fun to answer them and now I know that this was not the last time I did this.
Thanks to all of you.
0.title: My First AMA! Here My Answers!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: My First Ask Me Anything! I Will Answer Your Question!
0.body:
![AMA.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXyUDY9RmtyhMqPGsoNNoDmDmeDxsDptc6KZUdRvggr1A)


Hey Steemians,

Let me welcome you to my first AMA session: **Ask Me Anything!**
I think I don't have to explain this kind of format. And I think it's the time for that. 
__________
You know sometimes we would like to know something from a person we are following, we are waiting that a contribution about the exact topic will appear and we are waiting and waiting. Nothing happens. 
__________
I often feel that way. When I find a person interesting, I would like to know something specific. 
I want to give you the chance to...

![Ask Me Anything.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYiTLw4SbEaeDgweuqseTErAsiJ2JsgKzoRXcp9K5o7WK)

Depending on how much questions will come I will answer every one of them. Not in the comment section below I will make a separate post about the questions and my answers.
___________
So feel free, if you have something in your heart you want to know then now you have the chance. 

Would love to read your questions. :)
Feel free!

0.root_title: Nothing Is Impossible! Not Only a Slogan, We Filled It With Life!
0.body:
![Impossible.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmQiRkwHjKQ7Tp7HMoBuMBwqBUHiLmXevfPP5xBf5gd3nb)


Nothing is impossible.

It's a slogan, many people use, but now I have to say that nothing more is matching to that what happened yesterday. It's a difference​ when people say it or when they really believe it and seeing it. I will not say that this is something we can control but I​ often observed that people are using slogans without really believing​ in it. Not in our case yesterday. No, we really believed that the progress is possible.

![GEPA_full_2443_GEPA-12041881026.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbYKFiKrZfMnsSmVFYZAikHX8dDXy3wmCp6CdzpeAmGT1)

We continued to write history. Guys, I really don't know what to say: Actually, I still can't believe what happened last evening. We have currently 1 AM as I am writing this. I am totally tired but I have to write it.
__________
**We did it Steemians; We did it!**
**We stand in the semi-final of the Europe league the second highest international competition at club level.**
______
I want to thank you for all your support.
I read all your comments a few minutes ago, and I was really surprised how much support from this community came. That's​ why I am sitting here writing this post.
![GEPA_full_9636_GEPA-12041881045.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUx84tHTCXNcewi5CZoi6SWVt9uZu3spY5pyhyoHQQMiu)

Also, I was happy that one Steemian @theaustrianguy was there to watch the game live. Thanks to my friend for coming. 

You're awesome guys. Really I thank all of you.
Let's see who is next ^^

0.root_title: Appics ICO Round C! The Best Round To Participate!
0.body:
![Appics ICO Best.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRWvCuc1py3Awwp5Vm2kuKpxhYHt2rAc76RtBzokpgcQa)


Ok, guys soon it's time.
I kept you updated all the time about Appics, the first SMT(Smart Media Token) based application, and I am doing it also now.
__________
This night Round C of the ICO starts.
Why is that so interesting?
_________________________
Well, in this round you have no limitation as in the two previous rounds. The Presale required a minimum investment of 10.000USD and the investors got a 20% Bonus.
__________
Round A required a minimum investment of 5.000USD with 15% Bonus. Round B is running for a few hours more. Minimum investment 2.500USD and 10% Bonus.
___________
**Round C as I said before has no limitations. You can invest the amount you want and still get a Bonus of 5%**. In my opinion, the best overall round to participate. When it's possible to get a bonus, why not take​ it. Round D will be also without limitations but there will be no bonus anymore. 

![What is Appics.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPE9k9icEbyBidGXg3CSgUYEqLnatrBmyjiwTEejQmepA)

_________
Appics is simply the decentralised version of Instagram.
If you know, Instagram Appics will be familiar to you. The difference? It's decentralised.
_________
So, I don't want to go into too many details, but I believe when you already made your decision to participate in this round you know what you are doing.
__________
Keep every time in mind that every investment is a risk. The whole crypto space is still volatile.
I am not telling you to invest in this ICO. I did, but it doesn't mean that you have too. 

![The difference.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmXdbQNSWc1yjUraWt24TqRP8LT5y3Uz9zcyxeFFpqvvTY)


The system will be the same. You can get rewarded; when other people upvote you for the content, you share in the community.
___________
Steemit is textbased. It's a dream for blogger.
Appics is photo/video oriented. The visual aspect stands in the foreground. Again, just look at Instagram. 
___________
For me a social network much easier to use compared to Steemit. All you need is your smartphone​ which is anyway most of the time with you.
Am I saying that it is better than Steemit? No! It's different. And that is great because Appics as SMT will be a part of the whole STEEM ecosystem. It's an own ecosystem within the STEEM ecosystem.
__________
![Looks promising.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmQ8EYeFJgQcGB2xBiitnnGWit3t8EtszqMyEWZV7vCDEX)


Again, I have to point my finger to Instagram. It's one of the currently fastest growing social networks. When it works in the mainstreams so well, I am convinced that it will also in the crypto space. It's not a guarantee. The App is not out yet and has to prove itself like every product under real-world conditions.

But speaking from my actual point of view for me it looks promising.
All necessary​ information you can see on their website.

![Be Aware!.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmaPC8FHExEa53NrkaaQY2kcE2e39d8MLva6Ts8raKwyAe)
__________
The Presale was sold out in less than 30 minutes. But Round A and B were not sold out. In the Presale the big investors​ joined. But in Round A and B not man people could afford to participate. I can imagine that Round C is a Round which could be sold out quickly. Am I saying it will be definitely​ that way? Of course not, I am not God and have no magical powers to look in the future. 
_____________
These are just my thoughts.
Here is the thing: ROUND C starts at 03: ​AM MESZ
0.title: Appics ICO Round C! The Best Round To Participate!

0.root_title: A Motivation Syringe #1: Enjoy That This Week!
0.body:
![Motivation Syringe Thumb.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdvJKBekBRdwoyerxUvc8k67bbHMELzGAERjQwJGZFoRD)


What's up Steemians

This week starts well. 
I am back in training and, I felt good at it.
_________
I hope you also have a good start to this new week.
Let me give you a short injection of motivation.
___________
![Little Steps.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbEg3iHsXyBTVSgoqfcpqaP3tc8ocsZsQGHp4o9ARGnYB)


When your last week wasn't as expected than now, you have the chance to make this week better. If the last week was already satisfying for you, then try to keep this level up.

But all without to stress yourself. I don't recommend the **All-Or-Nothing** mentality. Ok, maybe sometimes there's a time for that, but I don't recommend this for this week.

Life is too short to be stressed most of the time.
Enjoy the moment, or good moments you have right now, in this week. Breath them in and be glad over little steps forward. 

Also when it​ seem to go backwards. Some steps back doesn't​ mean always failure. Maybe you have no more room start running.

Wish all of you a great week.

![MP Banner.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdNrk1Qw6Kx7dJY2t1ovEqd8RS3SDX2LeuJYZri9YLa5T)
0.title: A Motivation Syringe #1: Enjoy That This Week!

0.root_title: Is Steemit Going Down? Read What I Think Maybe You See It The Same Way!
0.body:
![Is Steemit going down?.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWqYR8ugjEV7TTMnLai5CTKiFDLVMoqHGAgFJ3shtV5qL)


Whats up Steemians, 

today I have an important topic to share with you guys.
And it will be a bit long, and I invite you to participate to share your opinion and thoughts.

Yesterday I read a post of @therealwolf, and I also spent a lot of time to read the comments and other articles which were linked. For example also the post of @heimindanger. You can read both posts here.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

[Open Discussion: Fix Trending & Stop Promotion Abuse](https://steemit.com/steem/@therealwolf/open-discussion-fix-trending-and-stop-promotion-abuse)
[Operation Clean Trending](https://steemit.com/steem/@heimindanger/operation-clean-trending)
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

So, I observed, and I feel that the broken trending page and some other factors lead to frustration of this Community. **A Pay-to-Win** game, which totally excludes people who don't have the force or possibility to play this game with this rules.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

*Let me give you directly a disclaimer:*
I am not writing this post from an expert point of view.
I am not sitting here, typing and knowing that I know everything, that I have the only solution and everyone should listen to me because I am the world smartest person!
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)


No, I am just a simple human being, like you a part of this community, seeing some things, making my thoughts about different topics and sharing with you exactly that. So please keep that in mind.

![What Needs to be improved.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmNTWAjUkLu7cxryg3rL3zLZFSXMbD2pdegPb7rMQr9ewW)


I think many of you agree with me when I say that our trending page is not a trending page instead it is a gravely manipulated order of posts which don't deserve to be there right?

If you agree with that, I would say that you judge maybe **too early.**
I think it's difficult to change or to judge something when the system openly allows it.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

Further, I would not focus just on the trending page and promotion abuse I would call it: **What needs to be done, that this platform can succeed in the long run?**

The answer to that question for me is simple: **The factor which makes a community; The user! The user within a community create a community worth joining or not. And when the wide mass is frustrated about how things are working here, we need to listen to them, for the sake of this community. Because those people are the driving force.**
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

And right now, from my observation, the wide mass is not satisfied because of different things as I mentioned above, for example,​ the broken trending page.

Let me make one thing clear. Never it will be that everyone will be happy. **Impossible!** Also, not everyone can be a winner this is not how the economy works. That means only because many people are crying it doesn't automatically mean that they are right or things should be done as they want. 

![Buuuuut red.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTDjChKS2YtpknNu4dsPNubNS9YStqC5JzofuWBiZagq2)


A status where few people are winning from the existing system and the wide mass has not a real chance to succeed, because high power is sucking out all the chances of success for the wide mass, has to be questioned.

![A real Chance.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRdwQ1eTFG3xw3SDHLbqBB6vpBBdoZhxKDqGyaFUQwZQ4)


That's the point I want to focus on. Users here and also new users must have the feeling that they have a real chance to succeed. 
In my opinion to get on the trending page shouldn't be easy. It should be tough to get there, something worth achieving. But the pure feeling is not enough. They should actually see that people, like them, have already done it, because of their great content. They need examples showing them that its possible that it's not just a Pay-to-Win game. This is what we need. At least in my opinion.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

Content should always be in focus independently about how much power someone has. And everyone should be able to produce content. Someone with less Steempower for example and having not much liquid SBD can anyway be a great content creator. 

And the trending page should deserve its name, that only the best content is to find there. It's like a podium worth looking at.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

I am playing for **Redbull** Salzburg. Please read again and look which brand is involved there. What the owner Matteschitz has done with this Brand starting selling energy drinks and now having several football clubs two of them currently in the second highest competition at club level is amazing. Guys, there is money!

![Buuuuut red.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTDjChKS2YtpknNu4dsPNubNS9YStqC5JzofuWBiZagq2)


Also, Red Bull can't buy or boost themselves to the top. It's not how the competition​ works. We need to conquer our opponents through a better play. Of course,​ they can use your money to buy great players, but that's all. In the end, the champ should be the one who deserves it. It should be like that on the trending page. At least in my opinion.

![Here is the thing red.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTJPXb3QvUyd63VaYPCmvh1NBmX6pMXNugTH8C3SQqrBA)


I can't blame giant stakeholders who are playing this game that way. From their perspective,​ it's maybe a smart move. So, I am not condemning giant stakeholders. I think everyone should also see their perspective and trying to put themselves​ in​ their shoes. Not everything is just black and white this is not how our world is. It's far more complex. 
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

I also don't have on general something against bots.
No, I am using them myself. I see them as an advertisement tool. Trying to give your content more exposure as I use on this post here.

After reading an article about the reward pool, I try to use bots after 30 min, from what I know this makes the curation reward even bigger. And also I have for a short amount of time more visibility because I am on the hot page. And I am quite happy with that. I don't know if I was ever one time on the trending tab. And of course,​ I believe​ that my content is good. Not for everyone, but surely for some people. I honestly don't know if there is something wrong with that. If yes, then feel free to tell it to me in the comment section below. I am still learning.

I don't have something against advertising. I think it is an important component of the economy. 

![Buuuuut red.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTDjChKS2YtpknNu4dsPNubNS9YStqC5JzofuWBiZagq2)


Here I think all boosted articles should be treated as promotion. Should be marked like that. At least to a certain point. I don't want to give specific suggestions how to fix that because I don't have them. This is just a thought.

![The system itself.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRFyc78yTCdickymfTBhEJyeo7xXWF3Bi8zk5SvAGM5iw)


This is for me the most significant part.
Why do we even have a system that allows this hardcore game?
Yes, Steemit is a decentralized social network which brings many advantages compared to the mainstream social networks, but we can still learn from them.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

What do I mean by that? Why does the algorithm determine​ a post as trending when it gets high upvotes? It doesn't matter now from where they are coming. Why is it​ even like that? This is what I ​meant in the beginning. The actual system allows what people are complaining about.

Let's take Youtube as an example.
![YouTube_logo_(2017).png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbU1633CEdJQe14YT4HGTJaADWTfLZGbiPxJiu4VxxE9e)


The biggest video sharing site gives new members still the chance to succeed on that platform. Yes, they made some dramatical changes, but I welcome it because this shows that quality is the most important. thing. Ok, now the questions pop up what quality is? It's subjective of course, but youtube tries to measure it based on the *subscriber* and *watch time* to mention few points. There are still more, and I am sure that here are people who know that better than me.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

I hear you: *You can buy subscribers; you can buy clicks and on and on*. 

Guys, there will always be people trying to use shortcuts or trying to abuse the system. But I honestly believe for the long run you will not have success there when your content sucks.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

What I want to say is that youtube has an algorithm which lays the focus on the content. And it should be like that. Because that is making sure that youtube has the best video content and people are coming there day by day to consume it.

Could an algorithm that determines a post as trending have similar factors? Why just the depending on the reward or? And I can understand curators because there is more to get for someone.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

I think Steemit should go away that the upvotes and the rewards determine the value of a post. It should be just one factor from many, ​not the only one. For me, it looks like that. And I think that I am right when I see that some posts have more upvotes than views also in my case.
![Strich rot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSAE9yjqA319DbdA56c4PwZZzqjv3P2BWaQTGi4QJ2bpk)

In my opinion, Steemit should be more **content-oriented** and the action happening closely around that. I think this would give everyone a real chance.  And I think that this would be better for the future of this community.

But how changes can be made? What needs to be done for that?
I don't know. What do you think about my thoughts? Would appreciate reading your opinion.
0.title: Is Steemit Going Down? Read What I Think Maybe You See It The Same Way!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Sometimes You Have To A Risk! Look How My Body Has Responded!
0.body:
![My Body responded.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZMJ7vQ92shmtmLmTyqYzhbMQoRTDTa3zCskTR12dnUUa)


If you haven't read the last post, then I recommend to do it otherwise you will not understand this message here.

You can read it by clicking on the thumbnail below.

[![Take a risk.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZ8HhXmPRoFiQ5GRk2mGqNSuRPmv4bGFVheMShBrQiuLN)](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/sometimes-we-have-to-take-a-risk-even-when-our-mind-is-telling-us-you-are-stupid)


Ok guys, yesterday I told you that we sometimes we have to take a risk. And a risk always includes that we can lose something or make a loss. Investing in STEEM or other cryptocurrencies is still a risk. And I would say it is still a high risk.
______________
So, was I successful now or not?
I wasn't.
____________
Yes, guys, it got even worst.
The night was terrible the symptoms increased my body responded but not as I wanted.
_________
Today I am not flying to Roma with my team; tomorrow I will not play the first quarterfinal game knowing that **I WOULD BE HAD PLAYED** friends.
________
It was a hard decision to make. I played every possible scenario in my head consulted me with my wife early this morning, but at the end, I can't force myself. I can't force my body to go, to fly, to train, to run, to play. In this physical condition, no one would benefit from. Neither me nor my team. But it is still hard. Imagine we are talking about the second highest international competition at club level.
_________
I knew it could turn out well or bad that's the nature of taking a risk. 

![Life goes on.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRfhR9p2pyvPSCqrZVaH4MVpmRVd1KRPP8BHkoG3ASH4o)

I am not sitting here crying guys. I know I did my best. This is life. Often things happen we don't want, but we have to make the best out of it.
_____
For me, that means that I will now fully recover. Wishing my team tomorrow all the best and when I am back, hoping that another chance will come.

So, guys, let's try to make the best out of our situations.
0.title: Sometimes You Have To A Risk! Look How My Body Has Responded!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Sometimes We Have to Take A Risk Even When Our Mind Is Telling Us: You Are Stupid!
0.body:
![Take a risk.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZ8HhXmPRoFiQ5GRk2mGqNSuRPmv4bGFVheMShBrQiuLN)


Sometimes you have to take a risk friends.

This morning I told you that I am not feeling well. So I know this is a part of our life to get sick betimes. But you know why it can't be this time? The coach told me already that I will start on Thursday.
_________________
In previous contributions, I told you that I had weak moments. In that, because it was really hard not play against Dortmund especially because I played every game before. And then sitting on the bench is also not dramatic but playing only 10 minutes in two games was really hard. 
______________
But life goes on and what can we do? There is a time to complain, and I think that is important. To have people around you, people you trust and where you can be totally hon​st. To release these negative feelings but then there should be a time where we have to move on, because we cant change the past friends. 
______________
It's no use crying over spilled milk. There is nothing to change about it. It is firmly anchored in time.

So now I know that I will start and then I am getting sick? C'mon this can't be. But it is like that. Somehow I carried myself to the training today knowing that my body is not in the shape it should be. 
![GEPA_full_4573_GEPA-31031870063.jpg](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmNNjzNFUtWp8icJYuyfQJgLBhtPL5KnyTuHLkhdWY9cix)

And also it is not very clever to train or play on a level we do when you are sick. I know that, and in the past, I often chose not to play but not this time. 
_______________
I made my thoughts. I am convinced that I have to try it. To take the risk. That's why I went to the training. Otherwise, the coach can't let me play. We are two days before the game.
______________
But Who knows when the next possibility will be? If we will conquer them and enter the semifinal. Only God knows. 
But I decided to take this risk. To train with a sick body. And guys it was so exhausting today :D
___________
But now I have still a chance.
The question is: **How will my body respond tomorrow?**
___________
If it is better than it was worth it, but maybe it will be even worst because it was too early. That's the questions.
___________
But guys I honestly believe that there are times where we need to take risks even when our intellect is telling us: **This is stupid, and you know it!**
What do you say about it?

 Now I will watch the champions league ^^
0.title: Sometimes We Have to Take A Risk Even When Our Mind Is Telling Us: You Are Stupid!
0.author: modernpastor

Whats up Steemians I hope you are doing all good today?

I am not feeling very well because I got sicked. The last two days I was pumping myself with a lot of vitamin c because on Thursday I have to be fit. I don't want to miss the first quarter-final game against Lazio Rom because of sickness. 

![Lazio_Rom.svg.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmUYriVkJi6z7YS5ravKFN3jpYbVdE7WcKHfom2JgsbpkS)
[Source](https://www.google.at/search?biw=1675&bih=846&tbm=isch&sa=1&ei=VJrCWrnUOsPcwQLbs4KgAg&q=lazio+rom+png&oq=lazio+rom+png&gs_l=psy-ab.3...349888.357391.0.357601.10.10.0.0.0.0.118.718.8j1.10.0....0...1c.1.64.psy-ab..0.7.578.0..0j0i67k1j0i24k1.67.gyv3EyzD8_w#imgrc=kKNs4PmW0JPURM:)

Anyway, this is not today's topic.
This will not be a long post.

I want to ask you what do you love most about Steemit and what do you hate or don't like on this platform.
I said it in my previous video that I read a lot of posts from people expressing their frustration on this platform. And honestly, I can totally understand them.

So again I want to ask you.
What do you like and don't like here on this platform?
I am excited to read your comments.

I wish you all a good day.

![Deutsch.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmP1kY1e2Ho8VY8K2bqWybW2NpVcMmKU2Np3zfCbhUufXp)


Hey Steemians,

Ich hoffe, euch geht es heute allen gut?
Mir leider nicht so da ich krank geworden bin.
In den letzten zwei Tagen habe ich mich reichlich mit VItamin C vollgepumpt, um spätestens bis Donnerstag wieder fit zu sein.

Ich will das erste viertelfinal Spiel gegen Lazio Rom nicht aufgrund einer Krankheit verpassen.

Aber darum soll hier nicht primär gehen.
Das hier wird kein langer Beitrag.

Ich wollte dich einfach mal fragen, was du am meisten liebst und was dir so gar nicht auf der Plattform Steemit gefällt? Wie ich in meinem letzten Video bereits gesagt hatte, habe ich viele Beiträge von Nutzern gesehen und gelesen, die ihre Frustration Steemit gegenüber deutlich zum Ausdruck bringen.

Und ehrlich gesagt; Ich kann sie wirklich verstehen.

Daher frage ich dich erneut: Was gefällt dir bisher am meisten hier und was gefällt dir gar nicht?
Freue mich deinen Kommentar zu lesen.

Wünsche dir einen schönen Tag. :)

0.root_title: Steepshot Now For IOS! Do You Use It?
0.body:
![Steepshot.png](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmdVFzxsTCwWLE19aotDpPJ8v3yhdzMjMkT9Sd8okLmSQw)


Sometimes I am late regarding news.
Also in this case.
Today this morning I heard that Steepshot released their IOS version.

After reading a Post from @theaustrianguy, I downloaded the app in browsed a bit through it. First impression: Looks not bad.

Some people are already comparing it with Instagram, and I think it is also meant from the creators that way. But I think we should see how Steepshot will compare against the first SMT(Smart Media Token) based application Appics.
___________
By the way, the ICO is currently running.
Both applications have the same or similar alignment.
They are focusing on short content forms like photos.
____________
Appics will also focus on video which Steepshot doesn't at this moment. Appics advantage, in my opinion, will be an own ecosystem within the STEEM ecosystem which allows them to act independently but also be an important part of the STEEM world.

Steepshot on the other side is already out, and people can actually use this app. 

Steepshoot looks interesting for me, but one thing is annoying me.
The pictures will be shown in your Steemit blog. For me who loves design it's​ disappointing when you share 2-3 Photos per day and they are mixed with your written content.
____________
I think in that case it makes sense to create a separate account just for Steepshot. I think @stackin is doing it that way. One normal Steemit account where he posts his written content and one account just for his short types. 
____________
What do you say about Steephot?
How do you use it?

0.root_title: I Would Call It A Milestone! Busy.org Not So Bad!
0.body:
![Reaching A Milestone.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSVqUxVMCVxMm1LKiz5zAMYf76zqjJG1YkZT3XRaSzfit)

I have to say that until yesterday afternoon I tried out busy.org and I have to say that it's not bad. I could get familiar with it but we will see.

Mainly I find the instant notification function useful.
It helps me to respond quickly to a comment for example.

If you missed my post yesterday go and check it [out](https://busy.org/@modernpastor/busy-org-is-turning-steemit-more-into-facebook-let-s-see) ;)
_______

A few days ago I read a post from @stackin talking about his Milestone reaching 15000 posts! What a crazy number.
This number includes every single post you make here on Steemit. Every comment is count and also your posts.
___________
I saw that I passed shortly 4000 Posts. :D
For me, in my case, I would call it a Milestone.

You ask why this number matters?
I will tell you why.
___________
This number mirrors your engagement within the community. If this number is high, the probability is also high that he or she is an active user of Steemit engaging a lot with other people here.

Read carefully! I said the probability it doesn't mean that it is always like that. But honestly, I don't think that I have to clarify this point. Of course, this number goes up by spamming the community. But that's not what I am talking about.

In @stackins case, we all know that he is someone who is a really Steemit Beast! Delivering exciting content and showing a high engagement not only with his followers; no with the whole community.

I already recorded my next Video where I talk about my biggest Steemit learning so far.
So stay tuned!

0.root_title: Busy.org Is Turning Steemit More Into Facebook! Let's See!
0.body:
![Busy.org.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZYHK2z96z1Y3YbDEr9Gh8L8rV5vJ1W3jFt6zmRnkXp6k)


Busy.org has brought out a new update of their Interface.
For those who don't know what busy.org is; Its a different interface by using the same blockchain.

In simple words: Busy shows what happened on this blockchain in a different design including some functional extensions. I am not a developer, so I hope I didn't say something wrong. If that's the case feel free to correct me in the comment section. :)

But anyway, the fact is busy has made some improvements, for me, it looks or feels more like Facebook. Or better to say the user experience reminds me of Facebook.

Me as a user, I like a platform where I can access quickly several functions and also seeing some useful data in front of me. When I have to go to another site to see for example my voting power, or who became a new follower, the list can go on, it destroys a pleasant user experience.

For me, this is the most important thing. When a site wants that I spend much time on it, then they have to offer me a great user experience while spending time there.

Let's see what changes I find useful.

![Notifications.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmf5mp5XFVekDDgQhomsdmvLiWB1C4auZAXxMCj1Rycfav)

From a psychological point of view,​ the notification alert is a strong magnet. 
Because of that people are coming back and back looking who liked a post, ​​or in our case who upvoted me, who made a comment, or who are following me now. Now on busy you have that.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-03-22 um 16.21.35.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUGzTtMZy93xTnE75whwFbFDLLPY2wA5rzarzvcEg6YLQ)

While browsing on this site, you don't miss this kind of notifications anymore. Until now I used for that the IOS app Steemify, which is more or less exactly that. A tool which sends you notifications when specific actions were made.

![Dtube player.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVuMChga7mNu9xMWD5DS8mjfXfEuqNAZ93484pZMhJWNB)

I was waiting for that. The possibility to embed your Dtube Videos within your post and watching them without leaving the post display page. It opens​ more creative ways of​ content creation. Because every action that leads me to a different site is for me a loss of time. 

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-03-22 um 16.23.31.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRvSisxnGuaHS2hw4fzusQ7YMqv5BdBaopEafLQt6fWqZ)

![More Post Data.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmc3KeaDuQRXftqwsAYLJCBtb8FGDXTFNqqut6L4yWYYe6)

Small but the effect can be enormous​.
Data like the approximate read time and also how much words an article has is for me very interesting. Further, I have to say that I prefer the post display page from busy.org much more than from Steemit itself. It's more noble and cleaner. At least in my opinion.

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-03-22 um 16.22.07.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXFA8J9sJhWeRnC8T2nZ2nDRfiU6rHD9drUgVFHeUuSiR)
_________
There are more features you can check them out [here.](https://steemit.com/busy/@busy.org/busy-v2-4-release-new-features-that-will-make-you-love-busy-org)
All in all, as I said, in the beginning, it reminds me a bit of Facebook the social media generalist. 

I am asking myself when some changes on Steemit itself will happen?
Am I missing something?​

Further, I have to say that until now I never used busy.org Maybe it will change now.

How about you? Are already familiar with busy.org? It would be good to know because​ this could affect how I create content.
What do you think about it and also about the new changes?
Let me know in the comment.
0.title: Busy.org Is Turning Steemit More Into Facebook! Let's See!
0.author: modernpastor
