0.root_title: Living A Good Life #3: Inner vs Outer Scorecard! Which One Counts More for You?
0.body:
![Scorecard.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmd7m5Fu9F1mioj3VPnoGGVtCUg5WtvzVZSXSHhF4hVy2w/Scorecard.png)

Hey Steemians,

Time to pastor again.
Let me ask you directly a question: Which on the following would you prefer? 
______________

**1.) To be the most intelligent person on earth but considered the stupidest?** 

Or.

**2.) The stupidest Person on earth but considered the most intelligent?**
____________

Difficult to answer? 
Let me tell you an example.

Grigori Perelman, born in 1966, is considered the greatest living mathematician because in 2002 he solved one of the seven mathematical "[Millennium Problems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Millennium_Prize_Problems)." 

![grigori-perelman-1.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZw9729jPQgW8mNLpoCB4W1mkz74uciaedeBd8VQsyUeb/grigori-perelman-1.jpg)
[Source](https://www.thefamouspeople.com/profiles/grigori-perelman-9528.php)

He got the Nobel prize, and he declined it same he did with a million dollar prize which he could surely use.
_________
I don't want to go too far if you are interested in this story you can do more researches about him. There is just one thing I want to point out: **Mathematics is all that matters to him. Nothing more.**
**The world might see him in a totally different way as he sees himself.**
_______________

**Have you done something or achieved something that changes how people look at you, but for you, there was nothing special about it?**

Hey, the same we can turn around: **Did you do or achieved something that made people laugh about you? But for you, there was nothing to laugh about?**
____________

Maybe you are still going in the direction I don't want you to go, that's why I want to give you another, more tangible example: **Did you already put so much effort into one of your contributions but it doesn't get the rewards it should get in your eyes?** You compared you're with useful information-packed contribution and are convinced that this is quality? But at the end, it turns out that no one saw it the same way like you.
_________________

Even that example we can turn around. **Did you already post something just for the sake of posting and you never expected high rewards, but later they all came in?**
____________

I know that here other factors are counting. This example is just to illustrate my point I want to show.
___________
![Public Perception.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWLNhkwQGt4xWE6i53SP4Wx5TvSSe8x6eBfovvXvPp98A/Public%20Perception.png)

There is a point where we should understand that public perception has little to do with the quality of your or my work. It doesn't make your contribution better or worse.

Especially not here on Steemit, as I said before, some more factors are counting. Maybe it's better to think right now outside of Steemit? You decide.

Warren Buffet puts it like this: *Would you rather be the world's greatest lover, but have everyone think you're the world's worst lover? Or would you rather be the world's worst lover but have everyone think you're the world greatest lover?*

![104938454-_Y2A0131.1910x1000.jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYnxzKdeDjTJt6s9Z4riiWTLspzZkZL587YKD3huLVpY9/104938454-_Y2A0131.1910x1000.jpeg)
[Source](https://www.cnbc.com/2018/01/17/these-childhood-hobbies-may-have-helped-warren-buffett-become-a-billionaire.html)

![inner vs outer scorecard.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmahv7PjzUEqYoYtmUBhB698dfUUMrnHckKBUsCEBXrmVn/inner%20vs%20outer%20scorecard.png)

Buffet is one who makes a difference between an inner and outer scorecard. And I agree with that! Which matters more to you?
How you evaluate yourself or how the world evaluates you?
____________
If you put all your effort into what the world should think of you, you'll wind up with an "Outer Scorecard". And that my friend will never lead you to a good life. 

And believe me, I am talking from experience someone​ who stands in public.
_____________

![Don't Get me wrong.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaQUXa7E6UF8UdJTwjyaZTJNFU9oycZSaDHi7o3oqHuzU/Don't%20Get%20me%20wrong.png)

I am not saying here you should avoid every form of criticism. I am not saying that you're the world's smartest guy? No, no if you think like that throw this thought away.

We need to be corrected from the outside from Family, friends, people who have more experience than we have. 

Buuuut it's a difference if you align yourself only to evaluate everything you do from others. In this case, you make yourself dependent on them. 
__________

It's more about to trust your inner guide when you are convinced something is good, but others don't see it that way. If that's the case, it doesn't mean your work is bad. And we are here targeting things which you do, not who you are in general.
________

I know that sometimes I made a good game, but the reporters classify me as weak​ because they have a totally different perspective. When we analyze the game in our team, it comes out that it was really a good game. In this case for a good life, it's better for me to focus on my inner scorecard and behold my peace.

_____________
![living a good life series.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXAFyVuGBQmCMRxVmHR2QGq4ucCnVkcjQnGMmeiWJpThd/living%20a%20good%20life%20series.png)
_____________

Living A Good Life #1: How To Turn A Loss Into A Win | Living A Good Life #2: 1 Essential Thing Many People Ignore!
-|-|
[![alt-text](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTtcj5sS4Bss24ax5Bd5qWFsw7hayn8offDkGf4Dkrs7R/turn%20a%20loss.png)](https://steemit.com/life/@modernpastor/living-a-good-life-1-how-to-turn-a-loss-into-a-win) | [![alt-text](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcvZwzZzT4QY63zYq3CtwFkHiDYgHKx7zqRFNuZofy7kt/one%20thing%20many%20people%20ignore.png)](https://steemit.com/life/@modernpastor/living-a-good-life-2-1-essential-thing-many-people-ignore)
________________

![My Latest Dtube.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWssd4V19Eg7rnsxsgtYxBmV1zK3bLv2S65QSzXUmf6FW/My%20Latest%20Dtube.png)

[![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPY5jEnbZx9Q7k8ccN3MqbmobPHGZw1T78Yvhto4UwfqZ/Why%20he%20is%20on%20Youtube.png)](https://steemit.com/dtube/@modernpastor/4a28atom)

I Would Appreciate to read your comments :)
Wish you a good day!

0.root_title: My Quote Of The Day #18: Your Learning Curve!
0.body:
![Quote 18.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTMbB7eqoLwUnfNb3yk8vP3n2iLyduBc4nDELFrxBkMxH/Quote%2018.png)

Whats up Steemians,
let's start with a quote for this new week.
__________
<center>**“You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.”**</center>
<center>**Unknown**</center>
_____________

I couldn't find which person said that but while reading I was thinking that could be my own words.
And I am sharing this one because it's relating to the message I shared yesterday in my video.
_________
We are human beings and all of us are error-prone. But it's nothing bad about it.
It seems to be bad because other people, society is telling us so.
__________
The paradox of that: Most people would agree with that quote that when they would make some steps back and look at their life from a retrospect, they would all agree that they had a huge learning curve while making mistakes. As I said in the video. Talking from a great high is so easy, nothing special, it requires no effort. Everyone can do that.
___________

To fail or to make mistakes are not absolutely​ bad, of course​, ​ it requires the right perspective on that. But don't worry it will come sooner or later.
_____________

I wish you for that week that you will be brave in that what you are doing. That fear of​ failing will not hold​ you back.

![DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v.png)

0.root_title: Mario Götze! Let Me Tell You Something About him; My Good Old Friend!
0.body:
![Let me tell you something.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmf2GyFeYoZgbzjDVxAHPwas9ujDzZX2NGiwpNZmQ5Cthy/Let%20me%20tell%20you%20something.png)

Hey guys, do you remember one about my last post where I wrote the first time about the game against Dortmundd? Where I talked about how important the game against Dortmund really is, also for me personally? 
Here a short snippet.
_______________
![Bildschirmfoto 2018-03-17 um 10.16.05.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRcLWdUiQspXSYeEfcp3vtch8HyW4yf17d1YrZrF6GtCh/Bildschirmfoto%202018-03-17%20um%2010.16.05.png)
_______________

I wrote that there is a person who is really important to me and that every one of you knows him for sure or at least heard his name.
_________________

Now I want to tell you whom I meant.
My good and old friend **Mario Götze.** 
So everyone who has at least a little interest in football knows this guy. A German or Austrian citizen for sure.

<center>￼![IMG_1848.JPG.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZwrN8Zt3h9Mw9m6teYZ4tAKYKbrzApUNqpYWy8JpMYaU/IMG_1848.JPG.JPG)</center>
<center>[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/p/BgE5xuWjrMt/?hl=de)</center>

Playing against him was adding an extra flavor to both games. We know each other now for over 15 years. We played and won together the under 17 European championships in Germany.

<center>![europameister-mit-der-u17-yabo.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQ3EhEG93zYx2wPfgJdfCgiDLqQ4TVCYL5JGshqroaYbZ/europameister-mit-der-u17-yabo.jpg)</center>
<center>[Source](http://www.faz.net/aktuell/sport/fussball/bundesliga/karlsruher-sc-reinhold-yabos-doppelpass-mit-gott-13281172/europameister-mit-der-u17-13288124.html#fotobox_1_3281172)</center>

I was the captain at this time. But we didn't see each other only when we came together to the national team, no we spent three years in a row together making holidays in Spain. There I taught him how to dance :D What a time that was. There we were really close. I think there is not one person I experienced so much with.
_____________________

We had different paths, and because of that, the contact was no more so constant like in the past. Of course, we grew from young kids to young men and like it is the personality change over time. This is a normal process.

<center>![IMG_1978.JPG.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdPytdom3CbAmRD33ocT9kUGzEyvRn41ZqgNZ17eDVMEv/IMG_1978.JPG.JPG)</center>
<center>[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/p/BgYMILijThm/?hl=de)</center>

But it was good to see him again and actually to play against him. After both games, we spent at least one hour just talking.
My teammates asked me to get the shirts from all Dortmund players :D I got many of them. I was also in their dressing room ​because​ I know also one of the coaches from Dortmund a bit. The shirt of Marco Reus, I still have here at home. 
________________

**And you know what our conversation revealed me again?**
Don't judge a person based on information from the outside especially not when they are coming from the media.

Believe me; I know that for 100%
You never know what happens in a life of someone why he did what he did. And yes, in our world and he is in an even bigger realm of professional football; it's not allowed to show weakness; to tell the truth.
_________________

Do you want to know more about that? What exactly?
Let me know in the comment section.

Wish you a great weekend. :)

![DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v.png)
0.title: Mario Götze! Let Me Tell You Something About him; My Good Old Friend!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: We Made It! Standing In The Quarterfinals! FC Salzburg!
0.body:
![We Made it 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbruiahBEjLeJKqVDHzrzjoVL3K2w5ZUM9WQSFSZGL4tw/We%20Made%20it%202.png)

What's up Steemians,

Finally another post after a long period. Exactly eight days.
Like I already said in one of my previous posts, it was a really stressful time for me, and still, it is.
________________

Because yesterday we made it happen and conquered Borussia Dortmund in the Europe league game. Now we are standing actually in the quarterfinals. Our next opponent will be Lazio Rom. It's history. We made it never before to this point.

Awesome guys, really Awesome.

![Buuuuuuut.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbv23BtjbVc6mjmBJeabdtwxH5fjHSGm6eMv15FGBxtSb/Buuuuuuut.png)

There is not everything awesome and perfect. For me, it was also a bit frustrating, because the coach didn't give me the time to play I actually deserved in my opinion. Especially because I played every game before. And let me tell you it's not easy to deal with it.
Don't get me wrong I am a team player for 100%, but nevertheless, you want to have a bigger part of a victory.

![Why Am I telling you this.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeURsMcXL1bQLdUTRUW8BcAG3EztnG2fP53cycFALTiwW/Why%20Am%20I%20telling%20you%20this.png)

You, who are following me know that personal development, empowerment, character, your inner man or women are important topics for me. But if I am only writing to you when I feel good, or when it is running really well for me personally; where would be the difference to others.

It's easy to speak from a moment of success as from a point where you also have to deal with some challenges​. It's essential for me to stay authentic as possible. And even when I have the privilege to be a professional football player am I confronted with many challenges. 
_______________

To be frustrated is not bad for a particular time. I would say its important and to find a way to release that kind of feelings inside of you in a specific way. But all of us canÄt stop there? There has to be a point where we look and move forward. Trying again and again, and even when it also not happens the next time. Let's be frustrated, let's be angry to let us release the negative feeling inside of us and then let's move on stronger than before.
_______________
![muscle_PNG48.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRimkF9zezSzJAcyjFZ9W4VWUcG86XHiWVq7Xdf4YxFCf/muscle_PNG48.png)

0.root_title: My Quote Of The Day #17! Shame On You All!
0.body:
![Qute of the day 17.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaMowtLSmGpKUbYZjKeyuPtmLntHkWWaAs5SwAMZLAr4H/Qute%20of%20the%20day%2017.jpg)

Shame on me! 
But also shame on you! :D
Just kidding friends.
__________
I was scrolling through my feed and recognized one thing!
Yes, you know it already from the title.

It's been a while where I posted a quote. 
I am honest. I totally forget it. But you also! Where was a reminder from you? :D
No problem ;)
_____________
Ok, let's continue.
My quote of the day is.
__________
<center>**Be yourself, everyone else is already taken**</center>
<center>**Oscar Wild**</center>
___________

It's really a strong one in my opinion. Sometimes we see others, we see their success their skills, their lives and we want to be like them. We copy them hoping to get the same results. 
______________
Some of you know that I am a Christian believer that means I believe in the divine creation of men. And you know what the bible says?
_____________
Every human being is unique.
And I want to empower you to live out your uniqueness.
______________
Don't get me wrong. I am not telling you that you don't need to change. In our process to matureness, ​we need often to change something. 

By the way, ​this reminds meof​n the post I have written. 

<center>(click on the thumbnail to read)</center>
[![DQmcvZwzZzT4QY63zYq3CtwFkHiDYgHKx7zqRFNuZofy7kt.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcvZwzZzT4QY63zYq3CtwFkHiDYgHKx7zqRFNuZofy7kt/DQmcvZwzZzT4QY63zYq3CtwFkHiDYgHKx7zqRFNuZofy7kt.png)](https://steemit.com/life/@modernpastor/living-a-good-life-2-1-essential-thing-many-people-ignore)

What I am saying is that you should not give up your core identity for something that​ is actually not you.
It could mean that people will not understand you, call you weird, a fool or whatever. 
_____________
But this is a price you should be willing to pay at least in my opinion.

With that said I wish you a great Sunday​. :)

0.root_title: Did You Hear About This App? The True Social Media?
0.body:
![Did you hear.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQSh2t1NxaTKqGcDhFDEWsewDGf5mC7UWKYqq8KT91DWX/Did%20you%20hear.jpg)

Whats up Steemians,

Yesterday I watched a Youtube Video from Sempervideo. He is also here in Steemit. You can check him out here.
On the right side, I saw an interesting thumbnail about a new social network. Because I was looking for Steemit videos, I thought this would be another social network based on the blockchain, but I was wrong.

I did some researches, and this App has right now a vast Hype.
Many Newspapers wrote about that, so I took an even closer look.

Maybe you already heard of it. This App is called Vero!

![bd77b007d3939675eab2a4b74c4affc3cfc75465.png_1200x630.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYZKS9K9BV8ECcBuo1fMBDCifJCjh8aVz4sgHrzjsoTPH/bd77b007d3939675eab2a4b74c4affc3cfc75465.png_1200x630.png)

I know we are all lovers of a decentralized Social Media. Steemit is and will be our sweetheart :)

But it's interesting to see that another centralized competitor steps into the market. 

![What is vero.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPVM5iwdifxPVhkAFqxvguYxtUtM2enMRgCo46zKVk9Dy/What%20is%20vero.jpg)

It's an application similar to Instagram.
You can share photos and videos. Further, you can share movie and book recommendations or places and normal links.
______________
One big difference compared to Instagram is that it will stay free from advertisements and there will be no algorithm. As Twitter in older days, you will have a chronological feed.
_________________
What else do we have there?
It's not just about following. People can follow you of course, but you also have the possibility to allow people into inner circles like friends or close friends.
_______________
With that, you can share content just with close friends, or friends without sharing it with your followers. An interesting feature.
_____________
Gary Vaynerchuck, I think many of you know him, told in one interview that he found it important to test every application which has a certain Hype around it. You never know where the direction will go he said.

This is not a full review guys. Just a short overview of this application. There are more functions in it I didn't cover here.

Did you hear about this app?
What do you think about it? I will test it out.

![IMG_1749.PNG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc3xsXG1LhcUMx9tdTWufLcLvQUSpwCk6pjsxzLEHcZeY/IMG_1749.PNG)

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: Look Whom I Have Met! Good Starting Point For The Next Europaleague Game!
0.body:
![Look whom I've met.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaJLQbWKmaQ7kdA7JNKSkQah7so6Xc6u2bDFgeguZcACE/Look%20whom%20I've%20met.png)

Whats up Steemians, I hope you are doing all well?
Yesterday we had our first Europe league game in the Knock-Out season against Real Sociedad. We played 2:2, and with that result, we created for ourselves a good starting point for the rematch next Thursday. 
___________

But let me tell you guys, they are a really good team.
It's awesome to see what others teams and players are capable of and also to have a competition against them.
Really exciting.

And the most important part is of course that I stayed healthy.
Let me share some pictures with you, and at the end, I will tell you what kind of person I met in the hotel.  For me, it was really a pleasure to see him.
___________

You know I was already so often in different hotels, and yes, I am a kind of Hotel person^^

This one was noble check these pictures out.

![IMG_1539 2.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVG1m1qUActN6qtEfTydko1rektXx5MtvC4nu4CWmezo9/IMG_1539%202.JPG)

![IMG_1535 2.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeWTyqNi4GmHfFoResHcx427h5cNYjdofZJ5MK7mZYcr5/IMG_1535%202.JPG)

![IMG_1540 2.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRP1HBZV35Bi2Q4SduBeRracUAcwP7HmDmxXpDyeVu7gN/IMG_1540%202.JPG)

Awesome right?
But also the city is really nice.

![IMG_1562.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmV6gWHvgsHeJsjBAZTRWa3upy33RzhvrBgTLia5HCz85z/IMG_1562.JPG)

![IMG_1568.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdMiNhCuE7BPZyVimBMX2QtnryTJNhVZk4eiFnDSN7onU/IMG_1568.JPG)

And of course one picture of the game^^

![IMG_1584.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXh7WMx99ghAV6EFp6QFHaHTMtW7LaP8c3XiAmhQBeBGJ/IMG_1584.JPG)

But let me tell you which guy I met.

I was coming from the Breakfast, and there was a guy at the reception saying that he has to go to Paris soon. I knew that I know this face. Somewhere I saw him earlier. 

Well, I think many people don't know him, but I know him, and I had to make a picture with him.

![IMG_1558.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTUVSjzYgvpiQvLUbhG3VtJxw6vavWQgrjpPDvmxrMsmo/IMG_1558.JPG)

You know who that is?
This is Jensen Huang, one of the founder and CEO of NVIDIA.
Guys, I met the CEO of a large Tec company. 

For those who don't know what Nvidia is. It's a company specialized in GPU's (graphics cards). The gamer among us ​will probably know what their chips are capable of.

![1_ Nvidia Jensen Huang with Drive PX.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmY6vBUNgMjRCauydQ9LJLwKdGZ6PZfwKr5Utydpsx8m7r/1_%20Nvidia%20Jensen%20Huang%20with%20Drive%20PX.png)

I am usually in the position where people want to have a picture with me, but yesterday morning I was so happy like a little child. Its nothing special but for me a great memory.

And I am now flying back to Austria. 

![follow upvote resteem new.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v/follow%20upvote%20resteem%20new.png)

0.root_title: Living A Good Life #2: 1 Essential Thing Many People Ignore!
0.body:
![one thing many people ignore.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcvZwzZzT4QY63zYq3CtwFkHiDYgHKx7zqRFNuZofy7kt/one%20thing%20many%20people%20ignore.png)

Whats up Steemians, I hope you're doing well.
Back in the Steemit Ocean and its time to pastor again.
___________

Don't overestimate your set up, my friend.
I will explain what I mean by that.
___________

We humans often think that all we need in life to be successful is to have a great plan. Let us say a​ great or the best strategy. 
If the starting point is well thought and calculated everything else will work fine. 

Because of that belief startups, companies, sports teams, politicians and other are giving too much attention to the starting point and rejecting the most important part of this journey. Of every Journey.
_____________

Am I saying that you don't need a plan, a strategy for your business, life in general and even for Steemit? Of course not, far away with that. 

![Few Examples.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeTe8inrQqD2jNS2DsLjfSh6XFzofgExHdAqd9ChSBgMJ/Few%20Examples.png)

A Plane never sticks to his giving route after takeoff.
You know the little ailerons? 

<center>![planeparts_diagram.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYAo53vvsKeKEJUXusuHomWHQNyz9d4Hti2iwJoRHHvtR/planeparts_diagram.png)</center>

They exist to make constant adjustments. Thousand of times per second, the autopilot recalculates the gap between where the plane **is** and where it **should** be.

Our immune system works similarly​. When a​ viral or bacterial attack comes, our body is trying to correct this issue. And after that our body is stronger against the same kind of bacteria. Our Body is constantly adjusting even during our sleep he shuts down, or while we train;​ we are sweating.

![Fotolia_81156956_Subscription_Monthly_M.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaT2zgrspea3ALXGxoeuURmryFpprnWkwnpSnS2c2FdWV/Fotolia_81156956_Subscription_Monthly_M.jpg)

Let's stay in the sport.
Before a game, we have a specific tactic for our opponent. Every Game we have a tactic, we have a plan our coach is giving us.

![Fotolia_187667176_Subscription_Monthly_M.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUEq26GaeRZkL9rf4D2KddRpssA5qM6vN81Uw5xx7sas/Fotolia_187667176_Subscription_Monthly_M.jpg)

But our lives are exposed to constant turbulence; this is a huge part of our life. I am sure everyone will agree with me on that point. Am I wrong? 
___________

**There is no master plan! There is no perfect job, no perfect marriage, no perfect Steemit journey.** 

**We overestimate the setup and underestimate the role of correction.** 
__________

When you learn to see the areas where you need to adjust something the better you will move forward. But here's the problematic part.

Our minds are focused to plan, to study to make strategies and to trust them, and it's not trained to see where adjustments are needed and also to implement them. Means; because​ of that kind of thinking we are too heavy, unable to correct and change the direction when we have to.

Yes, often it's a shame when the business plan didn't work where you put so much effort into it, and you believed you calculated all existing factors. 
_________

Plans and strategies are necessary and essential, but when it leads that we lose another critical skill we need to go through the jungle of life, it's in my opinion misguided. 

This is the skill we need: **The art of correction**. In every area, business, professional, personal. Learning to see and to implement the required corrections.

![follow upvote resteem new.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT7p5eovkmWBShZRDm3wGBQUWxXPWegnc9HQR8ukRM11v/follow%20upvote%20resteem%20new.png)
0.title: Living A Good Life #2: 1 Essential Thing Many People Ignore!

0.root_title: Living A Good Life! #1 How To Turn A Loss Into A Win!
0.body:
![turn a loss.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTtcj5sS4Bss24ax5Bd5qWFsw7hayn8offDkGf4Dkrs7R/turn%20a%20loss.png)

Time to pastor guys.

When you are working in a software company, you need programming skills. When you want to become a doctor, you need to study medicine and learn the required skills for that profession.
____________

In every area of your life, you need certain skills. Without them, you can't do what you maybe want to.

There are also some skills you can learn to increase the quality of YOUR life. We can call them life hacks. See this life hacks as a programming language for example. The more you deal with it, the better you will get. 

![Why is that so important.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQma8Kb9oXBGyfJTGG4tiFrXozq9NJYtztrmyNgSqQCe2tS/Why%20is%20that%20so%20important.png)

The answer is easy because it affects you every day. 

<center>![Life is....png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdYGBzjvEK8NPaCHgjvbC8QBdF7nRdrmNwpfvw3xFXjze/Life%20is....png)</center>

And you can influence your life quality.
________________

Let's start with something easy.
And by the way, most of you already heard about that or are living according to the following principle, but maybe you are not aware of that.
___________

Let's take something that has to do with money.
*Imagine you want to buy a present for your girlfriend, or wife.
And you missed to do it earlier, and now you are under stress.* 
______________

*You are hustling to the city; you have to hurry because the stores will close soon. You buy something from which you think it would please her.*

*Now you are coming back to your car, and you find a ticket on your window for false parking. In a hurry, you had no time to look longer for a proper parking place that's why you take the risk to get a ticket.*
___________

I am not recommending this behavior, but I think many of us were sometimes in such a situation. 
So you have to pay the fine, money you could use for something else. Maybe you planned already something with the money you have now to use to pay the fine.

What if you would have already some money for exactly this kind of cases? Yes, you heard it right. Imagine somewhere at home or at your bank you reserved each month a certain amount for fines or for other unexpected expenses.
_______________

Or let me ask another question. **What if you would find the exact amount of money you need for the fine on the street?**

![Mental Accounting.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmd3YG1Sfja8citm1C4UfCBYPkFDbTxaatLVojz2QMQUUC/Mental%20Accounting.png)

It may sound funny, or even striking and let me say to you that it could be and it serves only as an example.
_________

People are treating money differently depending on​ where it's coming from.
Your hard earned money from your profession is more worth for you than money you won, or like mentioned above found on the street.
______________

In psychology this kind of technic or hack, however, you will name it is called mental accounting.
It is considered a classical logical fallacy. **Turn a loss into a win!**
______________

You are tricking your mind knowing​ that the money you will use to pay the fine is less worth. Of course, it is not, but your mind think that this is money is not worth crying why? 

You already prepared it for that. This money you​ are not including in your financial math. It has only one purpose, one task.
_____________

For example money, you found on the street. As a good a citizen, of course, you would try to find the rightful owner but even then are you treating this money differently as it would be your hard earned money.

Same counts when you had a place which is only for this kind of situation. You would say for example: **"Great that I have prepared already money for that type of scenario."**
______________________

It will not change the truth that you have to pay your fine, but you are tricking your mind for the sake of your peace. This is Mental accounting. You cant change the fact, but you can change the influence the fact has on you. And this is a big principle. That means that you can turn something that looks​ likes a loss into a win. I am not saying that other people will see it that way but that's not the point because​ we are talking about your life. 
___________________

![treat.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYGNmmiqY6KJrbLe67qnGnf5PCJYRxzjSQJ4tSCKgEvsi/treat.png)
![fact.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSTQb13oWtZiRsUvefEXhUabUdGDra5C72t891ZuzG2R4/fact.png)
____________________

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: How To Live A Good Life! #Introduction.
0.body:
![How to livr.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeRETKRSfDv69mi6DxF6ZFdWmuXEYM6pDYLTTtWNjY8dp/How%20to%20livr.png)

What's up guys I hope all of you are doing great today.
It's time to pastor again. 

For those who are following me for a longer time know what that means. When I write about the following than with full passion and with heart. 

Please allow me if you are a new reader to explain why topics like **empowerment, psychology, self-improvement, leadership and yes business** are so important to me.
________________

From my profession, as a professional soccer player, I had to deal with psychological topics in early stages of my life. And I still have. From young ages, I learned what it means how to put myself in the right position so that the coach chose me over someone else, my competitor.

I learned what it means and what it takes to function under immense pressure. When 50.000 People are watching a game and in the masses some really important people like scouts or agents.

![but what we fail.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZCKPoMR244Xp6y82tFXyGDWAS9aHCt19ZARce4wSKahP/but%20what%20we%20fail.png)

**What when you are not able to deliver on point?**

This is one of the most difficult things in my opinion.
We have all skills, we need, and we are using to earn money, to feed our families and to do good for people who need it. 

But having certain skills and using and delivering them producing satisfying results for people you depend on and this on point is something totally different.

![iStock-673073832.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVTvdsg1JgNMMQj2HYXiCDArDXFc9Sa4LX3MStaAfW6yz/iStock-673073832.jpg)

Let me say you this: When your circumstances are easy, it's not a big deal to provide a good performance. But when you are under pressure, when you have no second chance and also when the outcome will affect other areas of your life than we are talking about a whole new dimension. 
_______________

I know from other players, from major soccer player when I would mention the name here I am convinced that the most of all steemians have heard this name before. It doesn't matter if you are women even you :). I know that they got mental problems because of certain reasons. I know that not from the media which often tells a different story no I know that from personal contact.
______________

I asked myself this can't be the life. There should be a way out, something you can stick on every time regardless of your performance or the results you produce. Something that stands above everything. Something that let you be stayed empowered and strong.
__________

And all this starts with your inner man. Which is invisible to the outside world. These are as well skills that you can acquire, but I learned that many people independently where there come from are neglecting this. 
_____________

A good life is not a good life where everything you do succeed. It's not about having much money, many cars, a big house, a private jet, the most expensive jewelry. 

Are these things basically bad? No, they are not.
But if someone will set this equal to a good life I disagree.
____________

Mostly we are living in a world of unexpected risks.
Some experts are trying to prove​ that most areas of our lives​ are known risks, but I don't believe that. 

A good life is a life when you have peace of mind and heart, with a positive view of the future independently your circumstances. And that's not easy.
And this is a wide field I know. But it starts with the question of perspective you take.

![iStock-639817224.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmV4xNhTdn46hnsZVzTNoE9UXx2EWjEWdCkauJiFJCimqK/iStock-639817224.jpg)

I am so sorry it went too long again.
I wanted to share this, to prove my point of view. 
___________
When I went to the training camp, I picked up a book from Rolf Dobelli at the airport. I wrote about that.

He is sharing some amazing views about life in general. Like some of you already asked I want to take you with me. Some points I see as great values.

Actually, I wanted to start already in this post but yes, as you can see I drifted away sorry for that. But I will start in the next one.

It would be a pleasure for me to see you there.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)
0.title: How To Live A Good Life! #Introduction.

0.root_title: It's Official! Appics ICO Date Is Set! But Be Aware...
0.body:
![The Date is Set.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNSk36SwbE6pdSexUTJQDYuE5Gk6EF2A7jQ7eDxASdG3V/The%20Date%20is%20Set.png)

It's official now!
The main ICO of the next generation social media called Appics.

The ICO will start March 28th and will last 4 weeks. One round will last one week. Of course, ​there is a bonus for each round.
The biggest bonus was of course​ offered in the pre-sale. But this was for most of the people too much. 

But here is the thing which surprised​ me. Also now there is a minimum amount you need to invest to participate in Round A and B. The other two rounds are without limitations. 

![Bildschirmfoto 2018-01-28 um 20.29.43.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVF58w5G8wLtAX3BBbWdZJY5F4AoNM8FaCq5SvQDtJ5Ng/Bildschirmfoto%202018-01-28%20um%2020.29.43.png)

You can pay with: **Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, STEEM, SBD and Bitcoin Cash.** 

Important is that you have an ethereum wallet where you own the private key.
The Appics Team suggest using​ myetherwallet. 

![My Thoughts 1.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZyt8p563WN62H63YauD3fzNgZPpqrx5B8xr2feqtuJ9q/My%20Thoughts%201.png)

I already wrote a lot of times about this project.
I think​ this is a project with huge potential. But it doesn't​ mean that it will also be like that. No one knows, and it's important​ to know that. No one can look in the future only God can.
____________

What I want to say is that a good idea and also a good implementation​ will never guarantee​e any kind of success.

Also, ​you have to be aware that when you want to participate in the next rounds you need a certain investment.
I am not a financial​ adviser but I want to say clearly​ that you should only invest in projects and currencies​ you believe in. And also only that you could afford to lose​. 
_____________

I know that you heard this kind of advice​ a lot of times, and they are true. You are responsible for your decision.

In summary, ​I still believe that the Team behind Appics know what they are doing and they are creating an application many people can use easily. I already made my decision and will definitely​ participate in the main ICO.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: How To Write A Good Post #3: If You Not Heed That You're Lost! [Written Format]
0.body:
![HOw to write #3.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSr9ZWxBAC9biR84cJMbr6X6fNB7Vcq8qyTTEajf7BCaG/HOw%20to%20write%20%233.png)

Hey guys,

here again the content of my last Video in a written format.
If you don't​ want to read it you can watch it instead on [Dtube](https://d.tube/#!/v/modernpastor/t9k2xz1a).
___________

As I said in previous parts there is no one major advice for writing an interesting post. Its an interaction of several different factors coming together.

So in the previous contributions of this series, I covered some basics. I was trying to show you a fundamental truth on your way to a successful. Especially for beginners.

But like I said it was just basics today I want to be more specific, and  I took one point out. 

![Your Title.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVjuK4Qgro286ohXWbXbYzn66qdDdkSevGuHq7JDzCNkA/Your%20Title.png)

Obvious. Your Title is the gate people need to pass through to reach the written content. Have in mind that you are competing with others in this community. Its a fight for attention. 
This is the first hurdle you have to make sure that other get over it.
_______________
Also, you have to ask yourself following question.
**Who do you want to target?**
_______________

There is a difference between your followers and trying to get new followers. Why?

Because your followers they know you already a bit. Some better some less but they know what they can expect. And they are following you because you have interesting stuff to share. So that means when your followers see that you post something the probability is high that they will read it. It's not for sure, but the probability is high.
____________

It's like: Oh modernpastor published a new Post, or Video lets see.
They are clicking mostly not because of the title which is also important, don't get me wrong but they will read your post primarily because of you. They already know you.
_____________________

**One reason why you should never take your followers for granted.**

People who follow you are easier to convince to pass the first hurdle to click on your post than people who even don't know you yet. 
_________________

This group of users is different. They don't know about the value you laying inside of your posts. You need to bait them with curious making titles. 

I am not saying you should do click-baiting. But be aware of that: Clickbaiting is just click baiting when you are not delivering what you promised in the title. When you deliver what you have promised its never click-baiting.
________________________
When you call the title: "How to become a millionaire in two easy ways" and then you write about your favorite meal. This would be fatal for you because people will classify you as a cheater or whatever. Your reputation would suffer. This would be click-baiting​​.
______________

Especially in the beginning, we want to gain new followers. You are building your name out in the Steemit Ocean. No one was waiting for you. You need to bring something, and the first contact comes trough interesting titles. 

These kinds of titles should fulfill two simple characteristics. At least in my opinion.

![ask a question.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcWu3ihcKD7D9DLK2XtvHLscrsimb2jkSYeYKa1U9j5oA/ask%20a%20question.png)

For example: Where will STEEM be at the end of 2018?
With a question, you activate the desire to know the answer.

Many People would like to know an answer to that question, means the desire to know the answer is already there. But with your questions in the title, you are activating or better you're bringing it up to the surface. 

People who are interested in that topic are curious​ to know what you have to say about that. Of course, now you have to deliver.


![2.Present A solution.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVmjUpixU738b6G4YkSRv8eMbDjTUdjtj3pN4vF81PYEs/2.Present%20A%20solution.png)

One example is my title on this Post or the Video I made.
How to's are very effective, because people feel that they will be lifted up to achieve something.
__________

You may now think, that you cant always make a title with How to do that and how to do this. And yes you are right. But you need to be creative. Play with words. How to is not the only sentence which makes people curious. They are several ways to do that.

![Examples.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPKFRQcmE2EpWUW36qKq8HQe72rBdknnoxrnCrAuxgA83/Examples.png)

**It​ was a long way, but I became a professional football player you can too? It's just an example.**

Another example:
**I should have invest earlier in this altcoin. This mistake I will not repeat again.**

Or: **Now I know how to trade and make huge profits. Be aware of that.**

All these titles trigger a specif emotion. **Curiosity!**
_____________

People want to know how they can also become a professional football player, people want to know what kind of mistake you did, people want to know how to trade beneficially. 

You are leading them to overcome the first hurdle keep that in mind. But now you have also to deliver. This is the second hurdle.
___________

My tips are not graved into stone, but I am convinced that catchy title increases the probability of potential new readers.

I hope I could elucidate how Important your titles are. For your followers but even more for people who don't​ know you.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: Do You Want To Get Better?
0.body:
![Constant.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmb7Pu2weAPc9K4RnGYew9S8XRmDyoeT3cphy9GDdyNCKH/Constant.png)

Hey, guys, I hope you are doing good today?

Today our team traveled to our training camp in Spain. 
Nice, warm weather compared to Austria.
____________

I don't know how many times I have flown already but whenever I am at the airport, and we are waiting for boarding I use this time to check some magazines and books.
____________

Today I picked this one up.

![IMG_1339.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZZfXsGVBoQntjEEynWokRv623KhexYJ7YNkReMEDbjg5/IMG_1339.jpg)

You know me. As professional athletes, we constantly need to train to keep our current level but also to get better. Its part of our Job to constantly improve ourselves for our profession.

I try to keep this also apart from my job, where the focus is more physically. Your mind, your character is just as important. Trying to become the best version of yourself not only physically, but also mentally.
________________

Excited to see what I will learn from this book. 

Use your resources you have and get better if this is something you want. And also in that area, play the longterm game. See yourself in several years not tomorrow. Life is a marathon, not a sprint.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: How To Write A Good Post? Written Format!
0.body:
![How to write a good Post.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNLo5gcocYfwUxHVSekuQ3AAREDorqff42YYhwrrgRom5/How%20to%20write%20a%20good%20Post.png)

I want to share also a written format about the topic I shared yesterday in my video in kind of a summary.

The question I handled while driving was: **"How to write a good Post."** 
If you're interested you can watch the video [here.](https://d.tube/#!/v/modernpastor/1o7juiz6)

___________

Of course, there is not the one major advice. It's an interaction of different factors together. But I focused in my car vlog only on one major Key. At least it is in my opinion.

That's not to rush yourself! You don't need to post just for the sake of posting. A good post takes time to prepare and even for newbies in the world of blogging it's even more important. 
___________

Don't get seduced by the high amounts you see on the trending page. Don't throw a load of unprepared content hoping that one will hit the lottery. Of course, you can do it like that, but this is not the way I would recommend.

Take your time, think about what you want to write about. And even when you think it's done, read it again. Before hitting the Post button, read it again.
___________

Maybe new Ideas are coming you can implement, or you are finding hidden mistakes. Don't put yourself under pressure.

Handle your contribution like a delicious cake. This is also not done in minutes. It takes time to bake one.
____________

I know that this is not a special writing hack, but I think you will benefit from it in the long run. Don't rush yourself. Take your time to write and create something where you can also be proud of. 

If it gets the response you expect is a different question, but I am convinced that your passion, your effort, and feelings will be seen in your contribution when you put them inside.
___________

I have more reasons why you should prepare your contributions.
Interested to know? Then stay tuned. I will bring a video about it in this evening or tomorrow morning.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: The World Is Changing#3. The Most Essential Skill For This Age!
0.body:
![The world is changing.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmU8AkgKrYq7r3ZiMNWAQz5QW8j8MeqG5EZ3eo4YFyj2gP/The%20world%20is%20changing.png)

This is the third part of the series: **The World is Changing?**
If you missed the prevoius posts, I recommend reading the [first](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/world-is-changing1-most-wanted-jobs-in-the-future-1514929829-436139) and [the second](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/world-is-changing-2-a-new-era-of-people) contribution before reading this one.
_________________

Let's dive directly into it.
Today we are living the age of virtual Influencers. 
I noticed that the opinions about what an influencer is are going apart. People have different opinions what an Influencer is.

![My opinion about.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQGfTnzEY81hcoqMakQezgYBWMBZUoRwVd34k9uQdazhT/My%20opinion%20about.png)

For me, an Influencer is a person who has an impact on other people. His voice has more value compared to others voices. But the number of people he could influence doesn't decide if a person is an influencer or not.
_________

When we look at the word **Influencer** it is simply someone who has **influence.** This word does not include a specific number which decides if someone is an Influencer or not. That's why I said that we are living in the age of virtual influencers.

Influencers have existed since the beginning of the world.
The past is full of those good and bad.

![the Age of Influencers.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPyRsVAdKCENvnmR2z71k2Tbq295w1QPikjRr7jpAWuxx/the%20Age%20of%20Influencers.png)

Today is the age of virtual influencers. People are following other people for a certain reason. A virtual Influencer needs something to reach a certain radius of people.

What is now the most essential skill for a virtual Influencer needs?
___________

**The skill to create!**
Creating useful, funny, serious, wise, lovely, entertaining content is needed to attract other people in the digital world and influence them.  
_______

Do you know why I like this so much?
The bible says that God created mankind in his own image.
The biblical God is a creator and if we are formed in his own image that means we are also creators or are able to create.
__________

And this does not have to be very elaborate content. 
Everyone can do that. Of course, there will be some who can make it better than others, but everyone can, and its possible to improve their creative skills.
__________

Also, the age doesn't really matter. I would even say that older people have better chances to create because they have more life experience.

I believe that the skill to create in the virtual world will become more and more a craft. Am I saying it will be definitely that way?
Of course not. These are just my thoughts.

Everyone can create today, and everyone can improve their creative​ skills. 
**You are already an Influencer!** Let's start creating!

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: World Is Changing#2: A New Era Of People!
0.body:
![The world is changing.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmU8AkgKrYq7r3ZiMNWAQz5QW8j8MeqG5EZ3eo4YFyj2gP/The%20world%20is%20changing.png)

This is the second post of a series. If you missed the first one I recommend you to read the first contribution: [World Is Changing #1: The Most Wanted Jobs In The Future!](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/world-is-changing1-most-wanted-jobs-in-the-future-1514929829-436139)
_____________


It all starts with the internet and the world wide web where people got access to an untouchable world. Also at this time, there was a kinda gold rush mood, because the world wide web brought with it unprecedented possibilities.

![apple.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZ4U3sUXFfxdt51YViQsKg4kvHPLZVKL2Fr2S4wfnzg5w/apple.png)

But a company like Apple and other in that section brought the world wide web in a more efficient way to us. Into our pockets! 

New forms of businesses were built and trying to use this unknown area. One of them Amazon survived the dot-com bubble and is today now the most significant E-commerce player. 

![ebay amazon.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaSBCaj7VThdbixm8bo4mpHZR3q1EjcGLbW6d6VVPFfa9/ebay%20amazon.png)

But eBay gave simple humans the opportunity to be also active in this realm, to sell old products easily. More and more businesses grew up. Today people are fulltime seller via eBay and Amazon. People don't need a physical store anymore. 

Today everyone can sell products online. Is it easy?
Of course not, but the possibility is there.

Social networks like Facebook and companies like Google gave the possibility to reach your target audience. I don't want to start a data debate right now here. ;)

![Facebook google.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVcX3WDc9GhPLd59BdR9kgWcvBVKg2KbLecWuuNJxSuxS/Facebook%20google.png)

Youtube became a platform where people are building a brand, sharing what they love, and it became a source of income.

The last decade brought massive online entrepreneurs out.
The possibility to reach financial freedom or a second income stream. In the coming years, it will grow more; people see chances trying to achieve independence. The Freedom to navigate their lives.
_______

![New Era.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSXMXRBZyQkW4DV6VH47GA6mBzSJMNBKC8xppHKxqpRkp/New%20Era.png)
With the blockchain technology and with their projects a new era has begun. I don't know how this journey will be, how far it will go and if there will be an end. It is still at a young age.

Projects like Steemit are worth looking at it, and in the future, this could be the next Generation of Entrepreneurs.

The good thing about it. Everyone can! 
You don't need to be young. If you are already older, it doesn' mean​ that's too late. N, ​ the possibility is there. 

![Others will see it not.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNt4PZSEYgkVExeVXFsfcjMm4fisQuF3dZ8Diav7cBPvy/Others%20will%20see%20it%20not.png)
Even when the society see many of those activities not as a real profession, its because some of them don't know and understand this whole space. Limited in traditional ways of thinking, but this shouldn't hinder you.

People will always talk!
Am I saying that traditional professions are wrong or stupid?
Of course not, far away with that!

And the world, the society, all of us need them. And its good that we have them otherwise some essential things wouldn't be here. Wouldn't even exist.
_________

But you see the opportunity, and you are trying to take it.
Steemit and The STEEM ecosystem is one of those projects that combines opportunity with social components. The benefits are flowing in different areas, for example, ​new acquaintances. 
____________

We are already in a new era friends, and **one thing** is indispensable.

Do you want to know what it is? So make sure to stay tuned for the next post. 

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: World Is Changing#1! Most Wanted Jobs In The Future!
0.body:
![Most wanted Jobs.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTxLqhurjPiqebWSpSmkATToLw42aXHu5zWq6XadCTxmP/Most%20wanted%20Jobs.png)

When I was young and sitting in school, our teacher asked us what we want to become when we grew up. You know this question right? Most children have a creative imagination. So I heard many things: **I want to be a lawyer, I want to be a princess, I want to be a doctor, I want to be a fireman, I want to be a pilot, I want to be a footballer and much more.**
__________

And becoming a professional football/soccer player was not me who said it. :D 

You know what I wanted to become? But don't laugh ok?
As I was young, I wanted to become a train driver :D
_________

You know what fascinated me about that, or what gave me the inspiration? 
One day I was traveling with my parents to Paris, and we were driving with the Thalys train.

![tgv-thalys-wallpaper-900x1440.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNXLZFiyXHinJsENb3dgR76trtiJ4QyqbsX1WN7LTGgCV/tgv-thalys-wallpaper-900x1440.jpg)

I will never forget this moment where this epic, win red train drove into the train station. For me, it was an epic moment this train was so majestic in my eyes, and the dream to drive one day this train was born.
________

But the answers to the question above has changed for many kids. I will not say totally changed there are still occupations which are still trendy like being a lawyer or a doctor for example. 

But today there are kids who want to become Youtubers!
Something that is not accepted as a real profession in our country. But we all now that many people are making a living from youtube. And its a matter of time until this will be accepted from the society as a profession worth working for. I believe that. The World is changing.
__________

But do you know what profession after that will be profoundly wished from kids?
**Being a Steemian!**

If the development of this social media platform based on the blockchain continues to be positive, I think this will be something young children want to become. 
____________

Do you want to know more about that, why I think so? I will explain it a bit more in detail so make sure to stay tuned.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: What A Huge Start for STEEM In 2018! This Is Why It Should Empower You!
0.body:
![What a huge start.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmey6ijhshxHxiAbAiB7Tc8yxkkPtJSTxNF3DPdzQJfWQq/What%20a%20huge%20start.png)

What a start for the STEEM ecosystem this year.
I was stunned as I saw which price STEEM already hit.
___________
This should be a motivation for all of us. 
I know that some people feel injustice in that system or are complaining about something they think it's not going the right way.
_________

Steemit is still young. This sites will continuously evolve. New features, which will make the Steemit journey more comfortable, easier, more efficient and user-friendly.

But that's, not the point!

You are part of this life changing game. 
And this is so important ladies and gentlemen. 

![Play and Think the longterm game.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRcyhXyoT75ppPV2aXB7acqaJoD6PhVaP6XFzyL3UQmKe/Play%20and%20Think%20the%20longterm%20game.png)

See yourself not where you stand now. Look where you and Steemit will stand after one year. Imagine where you and Steemit could be after three, four, five Years! Imagine what could happen​, and it will happen for sure that new users are coming to this site and are looking for help, for someone who guides them. This could be you. 

And people will be thankful and don't forget you. Because​ this whole space is new and all of us need time to get to know it.

![Useless comparison.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdSg587efujGsryuwzQ5uopHvC6gvLrQrHeojwpRBZ9dr/Useless%20comparison.png)
Don't compare yourself with the current whales how good they have it etc. Look yourself in a further stage where other users will look up to you, If......

This is the essential thing! If you played the game constantly!

Do you remember where I gave an example of the apple tree? For those who are interested can read it [here.](https://steemit.com/steemit/@modernpastor/what-is-the-best-posting-frequency-on-steemit-heres-what-i-think-1513810575-6114187) 

It takes time for the seed to actually bear fruits.
But in the meantime the right circumstances to reach that point are necessary. Without them it's impossible!
_________
Everyone who thinks he/she is small right now, let me tell you we all begin small. But Steemit gives an opportunity that can pay out 10.000X later in different ways if you stay and move on.
__________
From the rising price, we all benefit, but you have to keep going.
This start should motivate you. I think it's just the beginning and you are already part of it.

Minnows of today will be the whales of tomorrow, and when I say whales I don't mean only in term of much Steempower.
_________

So, don't complain, use that what you have. Multiplay the small things you have and one day, not tomorrow, not in six months, maybe also not in one year. But what is after that? There will be a day where it will pay out!
__________

Cryptocurrency is still at his young age, and you are already part of it. There will be much more people who will find their way into this community.

Be motivated for your coming Steemit journey and see your future self.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)

0.root_title: 1 Crucial Lesson You Can Learn While Flying!
0.body:
![1 lesson.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdAsWz8JkSbuTKqiPC7JZTVmaeNopuKmocqg6ofrtY7Qa/1%20lesson.png)

Last week I flew​ to Cologne to visit some old, good friends.
I don't know how much I've flown already in my life but whenever I am sitting in the aircraft and have a seat next to the window I have to look out. When the buildings are getting so small, but when we are standing in front of them, we are looking small.

![IMG_1251.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSzhwnbzCKwLaCm1NnYLMfjmDcHoW4sdAaQwesk3vkNSk/IMG_1251.jpg)
______________
![IMG_6188.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmakFeVHAFWpNgt5vcE2ndkrHS1CsibPupEuyLuyc7tH1e/IMG_6188.JPG)

And then when we are over the clouds the sun is shining. I love that artful and majestic picture. Watching the rigid cloud cover and the vast horizon. A view without limits.
_____________

Whenever I see this picture, it reminds me of one thing.
**How small I am.**
_________

You know sometimes we are taking us ourselves to important.
Especially in my profession when you are making a good game, and people are flying, thinking I am the best, I am so valuable. But not only in professional soccer, I believe in many areas of our lives we feel that we are maybe irreplaceable.
____________

Am I saying that to have self-confidence is a bad thing?
Of course not, far away with that.

Self-confidence is important, but when it's not flowing through the right tubes it could change into arrogance, and that is, in my opinion, a bad thing. Sometimes this process happens insidiously.
_______________

When I look through the window of the aircraft, it reminds me how small I am and how big the creator of this world is. 
_______________

I know that people have a different opinion about how the world came into being. I don't want to start a religious debate about this topic, but I believe in a transcendental act of creation. With that in mind I am proud what I have maybe achieved and want to reach more, but on the other way, I know that I am small, not better than everyone else.

![Follow, upvote, resteem gold 2.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZUKyvpjphQXgim2tcPs71TTuab9Kto6EjGSTkoT7EXJi/Follow%2C%20upvote%2C%20resteem%20gold%202.png)
0.title: 1 Crucial Lesson You Can Learn While Flying!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Why Good Resolutions Are Bullshit! Forget it!
0.body:
![good resolutions.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQBzbetL86inhaUVC7sDErJLTDsZ3rbtrL9PSzj5Dq5qT/good%20resolutions.png)

The first day of 2018 and I think some of you woke up late because the entered the new year with a huge celebration. :D
____________

For me its already a tradition what I will tell you now.
When I speak with people about a new year many say following things:
____________
**The next year I will finally begin to lose weight.**

**The next year I will definitely eat healthier.**

**The next year I will start to look for a girlfriend.**
____________
Next year....
Next year....
Next year...
_____________

Well, I always encourage those people. It was a time I had this attitude myself until I finally realized that this attitude is bullshit!

And I am telling it those people. Not in the drastic way I write it here but I ask the question: **Why did you wait so long to start a change?**

The answer I got sounds often like this: *A new chapter is beginning, and I want to start it right.*

![misguided.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbrca87GiWFHMZKbq5jxTrivezWc2a2Hi3qenZXukUyym/misguided.png)
Let me tell you, ladies and gentlemen, that this attitude is misguided. 
Why you have to wait until a new year begins to change something in your life? And honestly its a lack of responsibility?

Why? I will explain you why.
___________
When we do it like that, setting us goals for the next year we are limiting ourselves and giving control to the circumstances. We are allowing a change of the year to dictate our new goals although we can start them immediately whenever we want.

Let me ask you following question: **How often when you had a good resolution for the next year you kept it entirely?** Be honest with yourself. I know that I failed every time. Yes, every time!

![Illusion.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXLnYMFtifmAdPHrnf1rmqpmmFMoc1LFrJHh8YjTJCa6M/Illusion.png)

It's an illusion that a change of a year, or also a change of a month has more power to bring forth a difference and the matching result. A change of year has not this kind of power. You just think that it has that kind of power, but it doesn't have it. 

In my opinion, the only thing you lose is time. And time is precious. I am not saying that good resolution for a new year is bad. I am doing it myself, but it's a different thing when you put all your trust into it, believing that the new year will be different, because of its a new year. Folks it's just a new year! Do you feel different today compared to yesterday?

![alterntive attitude.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTs37MACYMkrumiknJo5Q3CpEZDDDn68upMrPRPvQ8381/alterntive%20attitude.png)

Instead to wait for a change of the year or month you could start immediately when you want to achieve something. A new year doesn't give you more power. Today its a day like yesterday but now we have 2018 and yesterday was 2017.

![Restarting.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeXjs3ALBrp4eQMAWLKPe1f2JKQQKby24f61AGtdVy6KS/Restarting.png)

We fail in our ways. Often we will fail. This is a human process and it's necessary to get wiser and better. 

One example: When you want to lose weight then start your journey of losing weight! And when you have a weak day and ate a lot of unhealthy food, don't condemn yourself. 
___________
Self-condemnation is the worst prison ever.
Restart again. **Restart! Restart Restart!**
_________

You are not beginning where you started; you are on a good way. Just because you had a weak day, it doesn't mean you have to start from zero. No, restart from your current point and go on. Restart every time until you reached your goals. The good thing is that you can do it when you decide it. 
__________

You don't need to wait for a special season, for a certain month or for a change of the year. You can start it right now.

Take the responsibility and start, when you have set your goal.
_________

Am I saying that this attitude will guarantee you success?
Of course not. Far away with that.

Nothing will guarantee you success, its more that you understand not to limit yourself, not to push the control to something that has not the power you believe it has.
_____

You know which attribute I like the most?

![The power to decide.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQaVmq7FFW1BVutavPbjAq7GCjy2eh6BLoLwV4Eh5f2eB/The%20power%20to%20decide.png)
0.title: Why Good Resolutions Are Bullshit! Forget it!
0.author: modernpastor

0.root_title: Congratulation! You Are Blessed!
0.body:
![happy new year.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmetGKVsZ93Y4KdmHB9avbfzpyaCbvFXAJzGQAMxPGzWny/happy%20new%20year.png)

We made it to the last day of this year. I want to congratulate you for that. You ask why I am congratulating you? Some people sadly didn't make it to this point. 

A reason to celebrate. You are healthy; you can breathe, you have enough to eat, you have a roof over your head? More reasons to celebrate. 

Yes, for some it was a good, great or even a brilliant year. For other people, it wasn't. Exactly a year ago I was one of those who said what a f****** year. Yes, its true 2016 was not a good year for me, but even in that situation I was thankful for reaching that point and was optimistic to enter the new year.
___________

When I look back on this year, I can say it was definitely better, and I am more excited for 2018.
____________

Dear Steemians, I wish all of you a happy new year.

I hope you will all reach your goals you've set for that coming year. :)

0.root_title: Finally I Got One! Increasing Security! What Are You Doing With Your Coins?
0.body:
![Finally I got one.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTrvsJCyS3dsbF1BEcLYDn5ogVw592YGVhrrBUJ15Ea4x/Finally%20I%20got%20one.png)

In this month I made the most investments in cryptocurrency so far.
I am coming more and more into this complex, but exciting topic. Still learning!
___________
With that, I also thought more and more about security. Something that is really important in this space. And finally, I got my Ledger Nano S​.

![IMG_6914.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNUgwZt4FTaPJ1KeScD6joLuMRwDu6w1GzKMNq58mpr4h/IMG_6914.JPG)

![What is a Ledger Nano S.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPrnSQFeb5QpMRB4GNGGG2g74iidUWSgPTTYd6j2ztm6h/What%20is%20a%20Ledger%20Nano%20S.png)

For those who don't​ know what this is:
The Ledger Nano S is a hardware wallet, what is also called cold wallet where you can store your cryptocurrencies.
_________
It looks like a typical USB stick, and simply defined; It is one.
With the difference that you are not saving files like music, videos, or other documents but rather your cryptocurrencies.

![Benefits of the Ledger nano.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTcFSHGas23g6Z9B8uxBXyLq5z3ka2tS6TcrhuJxa79wE/Benefits%20of%20the%20Ledger%20nano.png)
_________
**1.) It​ is easy to set up and also to use.**

**2.) Its possible to store multiple cryptocurrencies for example: ​Bitcoin, Etherum, Litecoin, Ripple and some more.**

**3.) The main reason: Definitely​ a higher security standard compared to online or desktop wallets. Your private Keys will never get exposed.**

**4.) The price of 69,90 euro is in my opinion acceptable​.**
__________

I am glad to have one and can recommend it to everyone who wants​ a higher security and especially​ when you are storing a high amount of​ cryptocurrencies. Are you storing your coins a different way? Then​ let me know in the comments.
________

Yesterday evening I wanted to know if there is any information about Appics presale.
The message I read on their website surprised me.
__________
<center>**Presale is sold out!**</center>
____________

Guys, this is a huge start in my opinion.
I don't know exactly how long it took we can definitely say that it took just one day to be sold out.

Keep in mind that for that round a minimum investment of 10k was required.
The site and whitepaper look professional and the whole appearance of the project is well made. But I was wondering why in my opinion not so many people were talking about that. On Steemit itself and also not on Youtube.
__________
This Project is great, the first time I heard of it I had the feeling this could be huge.
That the Presale is sold out so quickly is for me a positive​ sign. People are believing​ in this project and the Team behind it.
________
Recently I had a discussion​ with another steemians. The topic​ was, that the early investors had a huge advantage in term of power. Yes ​, ​that's​ true, but they were in the lucky position to knew about Steemit at this time, but also made the decision to invest in it. Even now, I am not sure how stable Steemit, or future blockchain based application will be. There is still a risk involved. But now you have also a great opportunity.

![Prepare yourself 1.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWasRjJWKrDXFokC863qC9weEYmK4bMpvrMhMb5p4Q7d7/Prepare%20yourself%201.png)

Everyone has to make his or her own decision and has to be responsible​ for that, but now you have the chance to be also an early investor in a project that could have a giant impact.

When you like shorter types of posts especially​ photos and videos ​than Appics could be something for you.

Of course, when the normal ICO is running :)

For me, ​it was an opportunity to buy at least one more bitcoin and I did.
